i3a1(nyi khri): ar+yA pan tam ha srika phrang nye bar myita/ bod skad
i3a2(nyi khri): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ dum bu dang
i3a3(nyi khri): bam po theg ma// / sangs rgyas de byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
i3b1(nyi khri): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig ni// bcom ldan 'das
i3b2(nyi khri): rgyal po'i khab kyi ri bya rked 'phungs pa la/ dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dag
i3b3(nyi khri): 'dun chen po dang thobs gcig ste/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zla
i4b1(nyi khri): stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di ltar slob pa// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa tshe dang ldan po dga'
i4b2(nyi khri): dge slong ma klags 'dzin dang / skye dgu'i bdag mo la sngags pa lnga brgya ma / dag pa
i4b3(nyi khri): dang / dge bsnyen ma shi nang tu mang ba kund kyang chos mthong ba sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
i4b4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po tshad myed grangs myed pa thams cad gang gzungs rab tu thob pa ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ stong pa nyid
i5a1(nyi khri): kyis rnam par spyod pa/ mtshan ma myed pa'i spyod yul can/ rtog pa myed pa'i smond lam dang ldan pa ches thas
i5a2(nyi khri): cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa/ chags pa myed pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa/ thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang ldan
i5a3(nyi khri): pa bstand pa zad mi shes pa la/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul khong du chud pa/ mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par btso ba
i5a4(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa shin tu ma nyams pa/ mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ le lo myed cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa
i5a5(nyi khri): lus dang srog la myil pa/ tshul 'chos pa snad du/ zugs ga myeng pa/ glags po dang / khye dang bkur gA'i ma
i5b1(nyi khri): myed pa/ zang zing myed pa'i chos stond pa/ chos zab me'i bzod pa dam pa rtogs pa/ khong du chud pa mi 'jigs pa chen po
i5b2(nyi khri): thob pa/ yid yongs su zhum pa myed pa/ bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ las kyi sgrib pa rgyu nad chud pa
i5b3(nyi khri): las dang nyon mongs pa dang / phyir rgol ba rab tu bcom pa pha rolang po'i rgol ba thams cad kyis zild kyis myi non pa/ 1na
i5b4(nyi khri): thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba/ chos rab tu rtogs pas rnam par dbye zhing bstand pa la mkhas pa
i5b5(nyi khri): bskal pa grangs myed pa nas smond lam shinang du brtsams pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/ sngon du smra ba/ khro mnyer myed pa/ snyan
i6a1(nyi khri): cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa la dbyangs su brjod pa la mkhas pa/ zhum pa'i sems dang bral ba spongs
i6a2(nyi khri): pA phun sum 'tshogs pa/ 'khor mtha' yas pa zild kyis gnon pa'i myi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/ bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par bstand pa'i ye she
i6a3(nyi khri): kyis 'byung ba la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig sgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmyi la ma dang / sgra brnyan dang / myig yor dang / nam mkha' dang / dri
i6a4(nyi khri): grong khyer dang / sprul pa dang / sgra brnyan lta bur khong du chud pa/ sems yongs su zhum po myed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud dang / 
i6a5(nyi khri): ba dang / spyod pa dang mos pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad la sdang ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bzod pa rlabs po che dang ldan pa
i6a6(nyi khri): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos nyid zab mo dang ldan pa'i gting dpag dka' ba/ rang gi sems la dbang rab tu thong
i6b1(nyi khri): pa ta chos thams cad la dbang shi nad tu thob pa// las dang nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ brtend pa rtogs
i6b2(nyi khri): par bstand pa la mkhas pa/ rte nad cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul zad myi shes pa la zhugs palta ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba
i6b3(nyi khri): thams cad dang bral ba/ kun tu sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa la mkhas pa/ bden pa rab tu rtogs
i6b4(nyi khri): par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par 'os pa/ chos kyi tshul bstand pa tshad myed pa la 'jigs
i6b5(nyi khri): pa myed pa/ bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par rnam par dgod pa'i smon lam gyis 'gro ba yang
i6b6(nyi khri): su zind pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs myed pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i/ ting nge 'dzinang rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par mngon du gyur pa/ 
i7a1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu myed pa la gsol ba gda' bar bya ba mkhas pa sems can gyi lta ba
i7a2(nyi khri): sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskyed pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi ba la mkhas pa/ ting nge 'dzind brgya stong mngon par bsgrub pa la rnam par brtse ba'i ye shes rtogs par bya ba la ma
i7a3(nyi khri): pa/ yon tan brjod pa skal da pa mtha' yas par myi zad pa dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs gcig ste// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong
i7a4(nyi khri): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che po rin chen 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po dang / rin cen byin pa dang / ded dpon
i7a5(nyi khri): dam pa dang / skyes bus byin dang / skyob sbed dang / chu bdag lha dang / dbang pos byin dang / bzang po'i stobs dang / blo gros dam pa dang / 'phags pa'i blo gros dang / blo gros
i7a6(nyi khri): 'phel ba dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / don yod mthong ba dang / smi'i myid blo gros dang / rab tu zhugs pa dang / mthu dam pas rnam par gnon pa dang / brtson 'grus mtha'
i7a7(nyi khri): yas dang / rtag tu brtson pa dang rtag tu sbyor ba dang / myi gtong brtson pa dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / zla ba'i snying po dang / blo gros dbye myed pa dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang
i7b1(nyi khri): mthu chen po thob pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / bdu rgyu stos rab tu 'joms pa dang / rdo rje blo gros dang / lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang / rtag tu lag brkyang dang / 
i7b2(nyi khri): snying rje cher sems dang / rgyan chen po dang / rnam par bkong ba'i rgyal po dang / ri bo'i zon dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / de dag las
i7b3(nyi khri): stsogs pa gzhan yang byang chub sems bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bangan seng ge'i khri za
i7b4(nyi khri): nas sku dang por bsrang ste/ dgongs pa mngon du bzhag nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so// der bzhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gang du/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du
i7b5(nyi khri): bdang / khongs su chud pa dang / rjes su 'brang ba dang / 'du bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting de 'dzind kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la mnyam par bdag go// de nas bcom ldan
i7b6(nyi khri): 'das dgongs shing yang dag par mkhyend pas/ ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ 'phrul gyi sbyin gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di la rnam par gzigs so// de ltar gzigs nas sku
i7b7(nyi khri): thams cad nas 'od rab tu bkye ste/ de'i zhabs kyi mthil kyi 'khor lo rtsi bis stong dang ldan pa gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu 'byung ngo // zhabs kyi
i8a1(nyi khri): sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug cu byung ngo // zhabs kyi long bu gnyis dang / zhabs byin pa gnyis dang / zhangs pus mo gnyis dang / 
i8a2(nyi khri): zhabs brla gnyis dang / sku sta zur gnyis dang / sku lte ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / sku rtsibs legs gnyis dang / thugs ka'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dpal gyi be'u las kyang / 'od zer bye ba
i8a3(nyi khri): khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // phyag gi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // de bzhin du phyag lag ngar gnyis dang / sku phrag pa gnyis
i8a4(nyi khri): dang / mgur dang / tshoms mche ba bzhi dang / tshems bzhi bcu dang / spyan gnyis dang / snyan gnyis dang / shangs kyi sbubs gnyis dang / smi ni mtshams kyi mchod spu dang / steng gi
i8a5(nyi khri): spyi gtsug dang / zhal gri sgo nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ste/ 'od gser bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu po de dag thams cad kyis steng gsum gyi steng
i8a6(nyi khri): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par
i8a7(nyi khri): byas so// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten
i8a8(nyi khri): gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang po chen pos khyab par byas so// sems can gang gis 'od gzer de mthong ba dang / 'od zer ngas gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad
i8b1(nyi khri): kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ba spu'i bu ga'i ske thams cad nas 'od gzer rab tu dgye ba mdzad de/ 
i8b2(nyi khri): 'od zer des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ shar phyogs su 'jig rte nang gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang
i8b3(nyi khri): bA chen pos khyab par byas so// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs su phyogs re ra
i8b4(nyi khri): zhing / 'jig rta nang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des rkang la reg par gyur pa de dag
i8b5(nyi khri): thams cad kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi/ 'od kyis stong gsum
i8b6(nyi khri): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/ shar phyogs su 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// 
i8b7(nyi khri): l-I dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gyi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rtend gyi khams
i8b8(nyi khri): gang ga'i klung gi bye mo snyed snang po chen pos khyab par mdzad de/ sems can gong gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur po de dag thams cad kyang / bla na myed pa ya
i9a1(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkran ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
i9a2(nyi khri): rte nang gi khams 'di thams cad ljags kyi dbang pos khyab par mdzad nas/ zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do// ljags kyi dbang po de las kyang / 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bya ba khrag khrig brgya
i9a3(nyi khri): stong du ma dang 'thon te/ 'od zer de dag thams cad la pad mo mang po rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgya las byung ba gser gi mdog tu snang ba/ mdab ma stong dang ldan pa/ 'dro chags su 'dug
i9a4(nyi khri): pa/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ kha dog bzang ba/ dri zhim pa/ 'jam pa/ ka tsa lin da ka ltar reg na bde ba sha stag kun nas gnas par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la
i9a5(nyi khri): yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyinid pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstand pa 'di nyid stend pa mdzad de/ de dag shar phyogs kyi 'jim
i9a6(nyi khri): rten gi khams/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag du byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstand pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de
i9a7(nyi khri): dag lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gi
i9a8(nyi khri): khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas kyang 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang / ldan pa'i chos bstand pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ ses
i9b1(nyi khri): can gang gis chos de dgra thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang // bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdan seng
i9b2(nyi khri): ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzi nad seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag ste/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do// rdzu 'phrul de mngon par 'du
i9b3(nyi khri): mdzad pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rte nang gi khams 'di rnam pa drug du g.yos te/ g.yos so// rab tu g.yos so// kun tu g.yos so// 'gul lo/ rab tu 'gul lo/ kun tu
i9b4(nyi khri): 'gul to/ ldeg go/ rab tu ldag go/ kun tu ldeg go// tshem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu chem chem mo// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur ro// shig shig/ rab tu shig
i9b5(nyi khri): shig/ kun tu shig shig go// mtha' mtho' na ni dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na ni mtha' ma' ste/ dal bus bags kyis nyams su bde bar sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba skyed
i9b6(nyi khri): par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig tsam cig yung thang cig la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rte nang gi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gyi skye gnas dang / gshin rdzo
i9b7(nyi khri): 'jig rtend dang / myi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba gang ji skad cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang rgyun chud cing stongs par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad
i9b8(nyi khri): kyang myi dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to// de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul
i10a1(nyi khri): dbang byed kyi lha dang / skal ba mnyam par gyur to// de nas lha de dag dang / myi de dag dga' ba dang / mos ma dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par
i10a2(nyi khri): gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong zhing / phyi nang nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ 
i10a3(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyar zhing 'dud par gyur to// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / 
i10a4(nyi khri): lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams rnams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snye
i10a5(nyi khri): kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ myi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te
i10a6(nyi khri): sems can de dag thams cad kyang / myi dang lhar bskal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas myi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe/ rabs rdzas
i10a7(nyi khri): su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa/ de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
i10a8(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nga bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
i10b1(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyar zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rtend gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmus long ji snyed yod pa de dag thams/ 
i10b2(nyi khri): cad kyang myig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to// 'on pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyurd to// smyon pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur to// sems 'khrugs pa rnams kyang 'khrun
i10b3(nyi khri): pa myed pa'i sems thob par gyur to// gos myed pa rnams kyis gos thob par gyur to// dbul po rnams kyang na ro thob par gyur to// bkres pa rnams kyang zas thob par gyur to// sgom pa
i10b4(nyi khri): rnams kyang btung ba thob par gyur to// nad kyis btab pa rnams kyang nad myed par gyur to// lus nyams pa dang / dbang po ma tshang ba rnams kyang lus dang dbang po tshang zhing rgyas par gyur pa to/ 
i10b5(nyi khri): ngal ba rnams kyang ngal sos par gyur to// lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba myi dge ba ma spangs pa rnams kyang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang
i10b6(nyi khri): 'tsho ba myi dge ba spangs par gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang / sems can thams cad la dper na/ pha dang / ma dang / phu nu dang / sring mo dang / mdza ba dang / gnyen pa dang / grogs po dang / 
i10b7(nyi khri): mtshungs pa'i sems kyis phan tshun sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang / gtsang ba bya dang
i10b8(nyi khri): nyes pa'i dri nga ba myed de/ myi dge ba'i rtog pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to// de'i tshe sems can thams cad bde ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyu rid te/ dper na dge slong bsam/ 
i11a1(nyi khri): pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba de lta bu'i bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe sems can thams cad rnam pa 'di lta bu'i shes rab dang ldan par gyur
i11a2(nyi khri): te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa ni dge pa'o// dul ba ni dge ba'o// zhi ba ni dge ba'o// sdom pa ni dge ba'o// dben pa ni dge ba'o// bag myed pa ni dge ba'o// byams pa ni dge ba'o// snying
i11a3(nyi khri): ni dge bya'o// tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa ni dge ba'o// srog chags su gyur pa thams cad la myi 'tshe ba ni dge ba'o// zhes bya bar shes par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ba ngan seng
i11a4(nyi khri): ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs pas/ 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma bsgribs pa myed pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su dag pa la 'dug pa 'am/ zla ba nye ba'i dkyil 'khor lhor stong gsum
i11a5(nyi khri): ba la snyoms par gr-I stong chen po'i 'jig rte nad gyi khams ri rab dang bcas pa/ 'khor yug dang bzlas pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa// dang byed dang bcas pa/ 
i11a6(nyi khri): lha dang / lha me yin gyi risi dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa 'di zil gyis mnan te bzhugs na/ 'og dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal
i11a7(nyi khri): gyas mdzes shing / lham me/ ldan ne/ lhang nge'o// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams zil kyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / 
i11a8(nyi khri): gzi' brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ ldan ne/ ljang nger bzhugs pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil kyis mnan
i11b1(nyi khri): 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / lAm me/ wAn ne/ lcang nger bzhugs so/ lho dang / nub dang / khyad dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / 
i11b2(nyi khri): nub byang gi phyo gos mtshams dang / 'og dang / stang gi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rtend gi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zal kyisi mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / 
i11b3(nyi khri): dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne// lteng ngosu bzhugs so// 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po rI rab/ rA nig po gzhan thams cad zild kyis gla rnon pu ru gnas pa ni mdzes
i11b4(nyi khri): shing / lham me lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba'i 'khyil 'khor skar ma'i gzugs thams cad zil kyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham mi/ lha na ni/ lhang nge'o/ 
i11b5(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od gzhan thams cad zil kyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing / lham me// lhan no// lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i
i11b6(nyi khri): 'jig rtend lha dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ zil kyis non par bzhugs pa yang 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham
i11b7(nyi khri): me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rte nang gi khams 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi sku ji 'dra ba de bzhin du
i11b8(nyi khri): bstan to// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rta nang gi khams 'di'i gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha'i ras dang / kun snang dang ba dang / tshangs ris dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'phrul
i12a1(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bangan seng ge'i dri la bzhugs pa mthong nas/ dga' zhing spro ba dang / yid bang zhing rab tu dga' la/ nyams bde ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ lha rdzas
i12a2(nyi khri): kyi me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi zug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi ud pA l+la dang / pad mo dang / ku nu ta dang / pun d+ha ri ka dang / na li na dang / so
i12a3(nyi khri): gan d+hi dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ke swa ra dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thegs nas/ bcom
i12a4(nyi khri): ldan 'das gang gang na ba der dang ste phyi ning nas/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gdug spos dang / ud pA lA dang / pad mo dang / ku mu ta dang / pun da ri
i12a5(nyi khri): ka dang / ni li na dang / se'u gan d+hi dang / me tog ke sa ru dang / ta mA la'i lo ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzasa'i ba dan dag gis btsu
i12a6(nyi khri): ldan 'das la gtor to// mngon par gtor to// rab tu gtor to// stong gsum gyi snong chen po'i 'jig rten du gi khams 'di na 'dul ba dang / snod du gyur pa'i myi ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thus
i12a7(nyi khri): cad kyang / me tog chu las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa mang po khyer nas / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyinang nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to// me tog pa
i12b1(nyi khri): 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / spos dang / phye ma dang la stsogs pa dang / na bza' dang / rgyun dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / kha dran de dag thams cad kyang de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi byin
i12b2(nyi khri): gyi rlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi nam mkha' la/ me tog la bsdogs pa'i gang brtsegs pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtenang gyi khams tsam du ring po gnas pa
i12b3(nyi khri): gyur to// khang pa brtsegs pa de las kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / dar gyi lnga ldi mang po 'phyang bar gyur te/ mngon par 'phyang bar gyur to// rab tu 'phyang bar gyur to// me tog dang / dang gi lnga gyi
i12b4(nyi khri): de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtenang gi khams 'di shi nang tu mdzes par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser gyi kha dog lta bu des kyang shi nang tu mdzes shing / lham me/ ldan ne/ 
i12b5(nyi khri): ljang nger gyur te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rtenang gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba
i12b6(nyi khri): des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'od dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rtend gyi
i12b7(nyi khri): khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// de la 'dzum bu'i gling gyi myi rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog myi
i12b8(nyi khri): shes pa de mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos stonang to snyam me/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi rnams ji ltar sems la de bzhin
i13a1(nyi khri): nub kyi bal yang spyod dang / shar gyi lus 'phags po dang / byang gis myi snyan dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'og sbyin gyi lha rnams kyi bar dang / de bzhin du snang
i13a2(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtenang gi khams kyi myi rnams dang / lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
i13a3(nyi khri): blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos stond to snyam mo// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
i13a4(nyi khri): bdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du 'od rab tu dkye ba mdzad do// yang 'od ngas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di rab tu snang bar gyur to// shar phyogs dang / 
i13a5(nyi khri): nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rtenang gi khams gang ga'i klung ga byi
i13a6(nyi khri): ma snyed rab tu snang bar gyu da to// 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rte nang gi khams 'di na sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ sher phyogs kyi 'jig rtend kyi
i13a7(nyi khri): khams gang gi klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos kyis bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas
i13a8(nyi khri): mang po mthong bar gyur to// nub kyi bal lang spyod dang / shar gyi lus 'phyogs kyi 'jig rten du gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag
i13b1(nyi khri): gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kya thub
i13b2(nyi khri): pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / sha
i13b3(nyi khri): lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung ga bye ma snyed de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig 'khrod
i13b4(nyi khri): pa de dag kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pas/ dge
i13b5(nyi khri): slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// de nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
i13b6(nyi khri): 'das pa kun gyi pha rol tu na/ 'jig rtend gyi khams rin chen yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas shes bya
i13b7(nyi khri): ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rtenang gyi khams de na byang
i13b8(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ad zer kun nas 'byung ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa de mthong nas
i14a1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gang na bder sang ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin grashes
i14a2(nyi khri): ba rin chen 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces gsoyong to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / ngogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra 'di
i14a3(nyi khri): lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu/ ci'i rkyen de skad ces gsolang pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnyan chen 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dri zer kun
i14a4(nyi khri): nas 'byung ba 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya mjed ces bya ba yod de/ 
i14a5(nyi khri): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes
i14a6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
i14a7(nyi khri): gshegs pa rin cen 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa
i14a8(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de lta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi 'dri bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon/ 
i14b1(nyi khri): nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin du dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom
i14b2(nyi khri): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis bka' stsald pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar da'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis
i14b3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te rigs kyi bu
i14b4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kya thub pa la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun myi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sim/ zo mdog bde
i14b5(nyi khri): 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam bde ba dang / dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin cen
i14b6(nyi khri): 'byung gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bkur ro// zhes kyang gyis la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i
i14b7(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/ 'jig rtenang gi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur te ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
i14b8(nyi khri): chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin can 'byung gnas de las/ pad mo gser gi mdog
i15a1(nyi khri): can 'dab ma dang dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung bya dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
i15a2(nyi khri): du ma dang dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas/ myi snang bar gyur nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bshugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad
i15a3(nyi khri): la me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phyi ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gas rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / sti
i15a4(nyi khri): bstang du bya ba dang / phu dung du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco
i15a5(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste/ phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems
i15a6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bong gzer kun nas byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag gya thub pa la 'di skad ces
i15a7(nyi khri): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas bcom ldan 'das la snyan myi mnga' 'am/ 
i15a8(nyi khri): gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ skra nyams dang ldan nam/ dade ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag
i15b1(nyi khri): kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin cen 'byung gnas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
i15b2(nyi khri): shAg kya thub pas/ pad mo de dag bzhes nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rte nang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
i15b3(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gterang to// de nas pad me de dag gis 'jig rte nang gi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag lo de bzhin gshegs
i15b4(nyi khri): pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'di ltar/ pha rold tu phyind pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstand pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla
i15b5(nyi khri): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag kyang rang rang gi
i15b6(nyi khri): dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhini gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// sti stang du
i15b7(nyi khri): byas so// mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rte nang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gi khos
i15b8(nyi khri): mya ngan las myed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan myed pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skong ste/ de byang chub
i16a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa nyid yang dag par stond pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
i16a2(nyi khri): chen po mya ngan las myed pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dag dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mya shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'ad
i16a3(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan myed pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyi nang nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan myed pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces
i16a4(nyi khri): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rte nang du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen de skad ces gsol pa
i16a5(nyi khri): dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan myed pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan myed pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang
i16a6(nyi khri): phyogs logs su 'jig rte nang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rtenang gi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
i16a7(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stonang te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te/ 
i16a8(nyi khri): da 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan myed pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan myed pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
i16b1(nyi khri): kyang 'jig rtenang gi khams myi mjed der/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de lta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang
i16b2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher bzhon nur gyurd pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzind dang snyoms par 'jug pa thus
i16b3(nyi khri): cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan myed pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes na srong shig/ 
i16b4(nyi khri): nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan myed pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan myed pa la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong
i16b5(nyi khri): dang ldan pa stong bkur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kyi thub pa de la/ pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rags kyi bu
i16b6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par/ 
i16b7(nyi khri): gyurard ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan myed pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan myed pa'i dpal de las
i16b8(nyi khri): pad mo gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang / 
i17a1(nyi khri): 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi snang bar gyur nas/ lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog
i17a2(nyi khri): dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir
i17a3(nyi khri): bya ba dang / sti bstang du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag
i17a4(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa gang ba der ste phyi nang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do
i17a5(nyi khri): phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan myed pas/ bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
i17a6(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun myi mnga' ma/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mngag bde'am sku nyams dang
i17a7(nyi khri): ldan nam/ bde ba dang bgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan myed pa'i
i17a8(nyi khri): dpal gis / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas/ pad mo de bzhes nas/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig
i17b1(nyi khri): rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der gtor nga to// de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rtenang gi khams de dag thams cad
i17b2(nyi khri): rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'di ltar pha rold tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos stonang to// chos bstan
i17b3(nyi khri): pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyam pa dang / rab
i17b4(nyi khri): tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa/ de dag gis kyang ring rang gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
i17b5(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa la rim 'gror byas so// bstar stir byas so// sti stang du byas so// mchod pa byas na ga phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas nub phyogs logs
i17b6(nyi khri): 'jig rte nang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rtenang gi khams rin chen yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
i17b7(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ra ni cen 'od 'phro zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
i17b8(nyi khri): pa 'di nyid yang dag par stond pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po
i18a1(nyi khri): de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na tshig myi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
i18a2(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'od 'phro gang na ba der dong ste phyi nang nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin ce na 'od 'phro de la 'di skad ces gsolang ngo to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po
i18a3(nyi khri): 'di ltar bu 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rgyu tsa'i rkyen de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rin
i18a4(nyi khri): cen 'do 'phros/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsa la da to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni shar phyogs logs su 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye
i18a5(nyi khri): ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rte nang gi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho
i18a6(nyi khri): skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stond te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
i18a7(nyi khri): spyod pa'i blo gros gis bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
i18a8(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher
i18b1(nyi khri): gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang sos yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzind dang snyoms par 'jug pa dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das
i18b2(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa rin cen 'od 'phros bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la dab par shes na song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin cen 'od 'phros// byang chub sems dpa'
i18b3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gse gi mjog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
i18b4(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kya thub pa de la pad mo de dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing drer bag yod par spyod cag/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
i18b5(nyi khri): 'jig rten gi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par gyurd te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
i18b6(nyi khri): chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas Da ni chen 'od 'phro de las/ pang po gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang / 
i18b7(nyi khri): ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
i18b8(nyi khri): de nas myi snang bar gyur nas/ nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong bu de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / 'phreng ba
i18b9(nyi khri): sa kyis ma na 'i na da / 'i kyi rnapa'i nga
i19a1(nyi khri): dang ta byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / sti stang du bya ba dang / mched
i19a2(nyi khri): byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa gang
i19a3(nyi khri): na pa der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod
i19a4(nyi khri): ba'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das shag kyi thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro/ bcom
i19a5(nyi khri): ldan 'das la snyun myi mnga' 'om/ gnod pa ma mchis sam nr-i zlo mngagau bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dung dgyes par spyod dam/ zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma steng dang ldan pa
i19a6(nyi khri): 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshedras pa rin chen 'od 'phros/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes/ 
i19a7(nyi khri): nas/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rte nang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed pa de dag gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas
i19a8(nyi khri): pad me de dag gis 'jig rtenang gi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di dag brtses
i19b1(nyi khri): te chos stond to// chos pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / 
i19b2(nyi khri): rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
i19b3(nyi khri): shig kya thub pa la rami rim gror byas so// bskur stir byas byas so// sti stang du byas so// mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gi khams gang
i19b4(nyi khri): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa nas kun gyi pha rolang na/ 'jig rten gi khams rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba/ 
i19b5(nyi khri): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid yang dag par stonang par mdzad do// de nas 'jig rte nang gi khams de na/ byang chub
i19b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta na chog myi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das
i19b7(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po gang na ba dar song ste phyi nang nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po de la 'di skad ces gso/ 
i19b8(nyi khri): to/ bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol
i20a1(nyi khri): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs
i20a2(nyi khri): kyi bu 'di ni lho phyogs logs su 'jig rtend gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
i20a3(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skang ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stond te/ 'di ni de'i
i20a4(nyi khri): mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po la/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
i20a5(nyi khri): ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kya thub pa de lta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing snyen
i20a6(nyi khri): bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzho nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzind dang snyoms
i20a7(nyi khri): par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom rgyal ba'i dbang pos bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la
i20a8(nyi khri): bab par shes na song shig// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la phrang mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gi
i20b1(nyi khri): mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de la pad mo 'di dag
i20b2(nyi khri): gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod ciganado ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rte nang gi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mthu
i20b3(nyi khri): bar dka' ba yin gis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
i20b4(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su
i20b5(nyi khri): 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi snang bar gyur nas/ byang phyogs logs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing
i20b6(nyi khri): 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / sti stang du bya ba dang
i20b7(nyi khri): mchod pa byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu' chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
i20b8(nyi khri): rgyas shag kya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyi ning nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyog gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dang
i21a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsel to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
i21a2(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po/ bcom ldan 'das la snyan myi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dges par spyod de
i21a3(nyi khri): zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskoro// 
i21a4(nyi khri): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas/ pad mo de dag bshes nas/ byang phyogs kyi 'jag rtend gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi/ sangs rgyas
i21a5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sku mang po bzhugs shing / 
i21a6(nyi khri): 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te ches ston to// chos bstand pa de dag gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ 
i21a7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang rlung gi dge ba'i rtsibs/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
i21a8(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa la ram gror byas so// bkur stir byas so/ ste bsnyad du byas so// mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas byang shar gyi phyogs mchis
i21b1(nyi khri): su 'jig rte nang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun kyi pha rol du na// 'jig rtenang gi khams ting nge 'dzi nang gis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang
i21b2(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin de gi glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho stong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
i21b3(nyi khri): 'di nyid yang dag par stond pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rtenang gi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas/ rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen
i21b4(nyi khri): bo de dngas cher g.yos pa de dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na cho ga myi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting
i21b5(nyi khri): nge 'dzind gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyi ning nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin kyi glang po dam pa'i dpal 'di skad ces gsa'o to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen
i21b6(nyi khri): po 'di lta bu 'jig rtenang du 'byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar char g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen de skad ces gsolang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe
i21b7(nyi khri): pa ting nge 'dzi nad gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni lho nub
i21b8(nyi khri): kyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rtenang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
i22a1(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kyi thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyeng po// de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa
i22a2(nyi khri): stond te/ 'di ni de'i mthu' yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzi nad gyi
i22a3(nyi khri): glang po dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang / 'jig rtenang gi sangs rgyas khams myi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
i22a4(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs
i22a5(nyi khri): dang se so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa ting nge 'dzi nad dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das ting d+he bad+d+hi nAd
i22a6(nyi khri): bam po gnyis pa// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pra ting nge 'dzind gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la pad
i22a7(nyi khri): mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gi mdog can 'dab me stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
i22b1(nyi khri): rgyus shag kya thub pa/ de la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rtenang gi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
i22b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur da ta ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pos/ bcom ldan 'das de
i22b3(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin glang po dam pa'i de lus/ pad mo gser gi mngag can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems
i22b4(nyi khri): dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi snang bar gyur nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs
i22b5(nyi khri): mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji skad cig bzhugs shing / 'tshe skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / 
i22b6(nyi khri): bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / sti bstang du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po
i22b7(nyi khri): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan
i22b8(nyi khri): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bis phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs cig tu 'khod ngo // phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon
i23a1(nyi khri): pas/ bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting
i23a2(nyi khri): 'dzi nad gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyun myi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ skra nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dges par spyod dam zhes
i23a3(nyi khri): 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdag can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzind gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod
i23a4(nyi khri): pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kyang thub pas/ pad mo de dag bzhes nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rte nang gi khams gang ga'i
i23a5(nyi khri): bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gta rod to// de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rte nang gi khams de dag
i23a6(nyi khri): thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug mo 'di nyid brtsams te chos stonang to// chos
i23a7(nyi khri): bstand pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu
i23a8(nyi khri): byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rnyeng rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
i23b1(nyi khri): shag kyi thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// sti stang du byas so/ mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu bzhugs 'khod do// de nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtenang gi
i23b2(nyi khri): khams gang gi klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha ro long tu na 'jig rten gi khams snying po byang chub kyi rgyan shi nad tu 'ong ba zhes bya ba yod do// de na de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs
i23b3(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par
i23b4(nyi khri): stond pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mo zhes bya bas snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs
i23b5(nyi khri): pa'i sku blta na chog myi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste
i23b6(nyi khri): phyi nang nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen
i23b7(nyi khri): mo 'di lta bu 'jig rtend du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
i23b8(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' lag na pad mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsa lad to// 
i24a1(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu 'di ni nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su/ 'jig rta nang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed ces bya ba
i24a2(nyi khri): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnas
i24a3(nyi khri): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo
i24a4(nyi khri): dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rta nang gi khams myi mjed dar/ bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa de lta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen
i24a5(nyi khri): bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang / phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang soso yang dag par rig pa rab tu bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa
i24a6(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzind dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das pad mo dam pa'i dpal gis bka' stsa lang pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar
i24a7(nyi khri): de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pangad mo dam bya'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mo la/ pad mo rin po che sna
i24a8(nyi khri): tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te// rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
i24b1(nyi khri): rgyas shig kya thub pa de la pad mo de dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der brag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rtenang gi khams der skyes pa'i
i24b2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur ta ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mos
i24b3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal de las/ pad mo gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag
i24b4(nyi khri): blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mo dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi
i24b5(nyi khri): snang bar gyur nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang
i24b6(nyi khri): phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / sti bstang du bya ba dang / mchod pa
i24b7(nyi khri): byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub
i24b8(nyi khri): pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhibs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i
i25a1(nyi khri): chen po lag na pad mos/ bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
i25a2(nyi khri): dadang mo dam pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyan myi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dra ste/ pad mo gser gi mangs
i25a3(nyi khri): can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du
i25a4(nyi khri): bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pas/ pad me de dag bzhes nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten
i25a5(nyi khri): gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gangan ba der gtor to// de nas pad ma de dag gis 'jig rtenang gi khams deng
i25a6(nyi khri): thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te// pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mo bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid mtshams te chos ston to// myosmra pa nga sems can gang
i25a7(nyi khri): thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa
i25a8(nyi khri): de dag gis kyang rung rang kyi rig pa'i rtsi bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhan ga shegs pa sa gnom pa sring dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thu pa la/ rim gror byas so// bkur sti byas so/ 
i25b1(nyi khri): mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rtenang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gi khams rdul
i25b2(nyi khri): gi tsho gas dang ma bral ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de nas de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dbul zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyeng
i25b3(nyi khri): ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di yang dag par stond pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rtenang gi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshan
i25b4(nyi khri): pa nyi ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ sa tsher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhini gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog myi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
i25b5(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyi nad nasabacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
i25b6(nyi khri): snang ba dam dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rte nang du byung ba dang / dge sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta
i25b7(nyi khri): bu ganga' ba 'ang ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba
i25b8(nyi khri): pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba de la 'di skad ces bka' stsa lad to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'dzin
i26a1(nyi khri): rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa ni/ 'jig rtenang gi khams kyi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
i26a2(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'che skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha ra long tu phyind pa ston te/ 'odi
i26a3(nyi khri): de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nya mi rab snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces
i26a4(nyi khri): gsol de to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rte nang gi khams myi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig
i26a5(nyi khri): kyu thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang soso yang dag par
i26a6(nyi khri): rig pa sgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa/ de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dkyil
i26a7(nyi khri): 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal po/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
i26a8(nyi khri): rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dngal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i rab tu snang ba la/ yid mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi sku las zung ba gseng gi mngog
i26b1(nyi khri): can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa/ de la pad mo 'di dag
i26b2(nyi khri): gis gtor cig rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rtenang gi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni
i26b3(nyi khri): mthu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par gyurd ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i
i26b4(nyi khri): dpal de las pad mo gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugasu 'dug pa bye ba khrag
i26b5(nyi khri): khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi snang bar gyur nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho/ 
i26b6(nyi khri): skyong ba dag thams cad la/ me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim
i26b7(nyi khri): gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / sti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
i26b8(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyi nang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis las spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs
i27a1(nyi khri): gcig tu 'khod/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das shig kya thub pa la 'di skad gsol
i27a2(nyi khri): totabacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun myi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa
i27a3(nyi khri): ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgas par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ bad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das
i27a4(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro// de nas bcom ldan
i27a5(nyi khri): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhengs nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang gA'i
i27a6(nyi khri): klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dgra gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gi khams de
i27a7(nyi khri): dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad ma de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan
i27a8(nyi khri): pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na myed bya yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang / 
i27b1(nyi khri): khyo'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa la rim gro
i27b2(nyi khri): byas so// bkur stor byas so// sti stang du byas so// mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod ngo // de nas nub byang gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rte nang gi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed
i27b3(nyi khri): 'das pa kun kyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gi khams dbang du gyur pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa zhes bya ba bzhug
i27b4(nyi khri): shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di nyid yang dag par rdzog snyan pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gi khams de na/ byang chub sems
i27b5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rini cen mchog ces bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa ches g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta na cho ga myi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'ad
i27b6(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pa gang na ba der song ste phyind nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas de la 'di skad ces
i27b7(nyi khri): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu mi'i rkye nang de skad ces gsolang pa dang / 
i27b8(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gdugs dam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin cen mchog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni shor lho'i phyogs mtshams
i28a1(nyi khri): logs su 'jig rte nang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rtenang gi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ 
i28a2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stond to// 'di ni 'di'i mthu yin te de
i28a3(nyi khri): 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin ce na mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pa la 'di skad ces gsolang ngo to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang
i28a4(nyi khri): 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de lta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang
i28a5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal chen gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang soso yang dag par rig pa rlab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzind dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la
i28a6(nyi khri): dbang rab tu thob pa/ de ba lta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das nga bzhon gshegs pa gdugs dam pas bka' stsalang gi/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes ni song shig/ de nas
i28a7(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/ byang chub sems dpa sems dpa' chen po rini tsan mchog la nga mo ni po che sna tshogs kyi rgyusku las zung
i28a8(nyi khri): gser gyi midog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shig kya thub pa de la pad mo 'di dag gis gtorang cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi
i28b1(nyi khri): zhing der bge yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na// 'jig rtenang gi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis drir nyams par gyur tu
i28b2(nyi khri): ri ta de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rani cen mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de las byung/ 
i28b3(nyi khri): mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrag brgya stong du ma dang min
i28b4(nyi khri): tetesangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi snang bar gyu rang nas/ nub byung gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji skad cig bzhugs shing 'tsho ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang
i28b5(nyi khri): spos dang / bdug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phyi mI dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / sti
i28b6(nyi khri): bsteng du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing // byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par/ 
i28b7(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kyu thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyi nang nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod
i28b8(nyi khri): nas// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rini can mchog gas// bcom ldan 'das shig kya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
i29a1(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun gyi ma ma ma/ gnod ba ma mchis sam tho mngog bye 'am/ swA nyams dang ldam ma/ ba
i29a2(nyi khri): dges par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ bang mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
i29a3(nyi khri): gdugs dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pas/ pad
i29a4(nyi khri): me de dag bzhes nas/ nub byang gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rte nang gi khams gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
i29a5(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par gyur to// pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po
i29a6(nyi khri): bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyinang pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos stonang to// chos bstan pa de sems can gtogs thos par gyur pa de thams cad kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog
i29a7(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ 
i29a8(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kya thub pa la rim gror byis so// bkur stor byas so// sa bi stang du byas so// mchod pa byas nas/ 
i29b1(nyi khri): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dres pa kun kyi pha ra lod na/ 'jig rten ni khams pad mo zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
i29b2(nyi khri): pa pad mo'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'dzin
i29b3(nyi khri): gi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug byas/ snang ba chen po dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mya shes pa
i29b4(nyi khri): de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyi nang nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs dgra bco
i29b5(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin
i29b6(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu ganga' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsoyong pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gyis/ 
i29b7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gi khas
i29b8(nyi khri): mya mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shog kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems rapa
i30a1(nyi khri): chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam pas/ bcom
i30a2(nyi khri): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i dpal la 'di skad ces gas lod to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rtenang gi khams myi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag
i30a3(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyed bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher
i30a4(nyi khri): gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzind dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa/ de dag blta ba'i slad du
i30a5(nyi khri): mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes
i30a6(nyi khri): na song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pa'i la/ bang mo
