i73b6(nyi khri): 'dri dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug cing / de dag gi dbang gis myi skye ba ying myed de/ de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams
i73b7(nyi khri): bsnyen bkur cing / de dag du tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de dga' ldan gyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skyes te/ de dag der tshe'i tshul bzhin du gnas dbang po ma nyams pa dang / dran zhing shes bzhin du lha
i73b8(nyi khri): bye ba khrag shig brgya stong du mas bskor te/ mdun du byas nas 'dir skye ba bstand te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs/ 
i74a1(nyi khri): 9/ dag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag kyang yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dge 'dod pa'i khamasu yang myi skye/ 
i74a2(nyi khri): gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams su mi skye bar de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rimi gro dang / bkur sti dang / sti stang dang / 
i74a3(nyi khri): mchod pa byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhi'i du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag mngon
i74a4(nyi khri): par shes pa drug po thob pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na theg pa chen po ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sgra yang myi grag pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas
i74a5(nyi khri): kyi zhing nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par
i74a6(nyi khri): rtse zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na sems can rnams kyi tshe dpag tu myed pa de lta bu'i/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub
i74a7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag 'jig rten gi khams na/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra myi grag pa dang / chos kyi sgra myi grag pa dang / dge 'dun gi myi grag pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten
i74a8(nyi khri): gi khams nas/ 'jig rten gi khams su dong zhing / sangs rgyas kyi legs pa brjod/ chos kyi lcogs pa brjod/ dge 'dun gyi legs pa brjod cing sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos
i74b1(nyi khri): kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des/ sems dang ra 'gyur te/ gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dag du skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sas
i74b2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyi nad chad/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag
i74b3(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
i74b4(nyi khri): pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang thob nas// de dag ni
i74b5(nyi khri): yang 'dod pa'i khams su yang myi skye/ gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i kham su yang myi skye zhing de dag tu yang sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar byang chub
i74b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dag dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs nas/ phyir myi ldog pa'i sa thob pa yod do// 
i74b7(nyi khri): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing / mngon par sangs/ 
i74b8(nyi khri): rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can grangs myed tshad myed pa'i don byas nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'da' zhing de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / 
i75a1(nyi khri): dam pa'i chos bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar gnas pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed
i75a2(nyi khri): pa nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor de la snyoms par 'jug cing / de dag byang chub sems dpa' bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs
i75a3(nyi khri): rgyas kyi zhing du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do// 
i75a4(nyi khri): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ bsam gtan bzhi thob pa/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
i75a5(nyi khri): bzhi thob pa dag/ bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa bdang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis tshul du mar rnam par brtse zhing 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go// 
i75a6(nyi khri): de dag bsam gtan dang po de las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhag/ 'gag pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug
i75a7(nyi khri): gto bsam gtan gnyis pa la langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go// de las langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go// de las langs nas 'gog/ 
i75a8(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go// de las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go// de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ 
i75b1(nyi khri): de la las nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go// de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gnog go// de las langs nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye
i75b2(nyi khri): mched la snyoms par 'jug go// de las langs nas 'gog pa'o snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go// de las langs nas cung zad myed pa'i skye la snyoms par 'jug go// de las langs nas
i75b3(nyi khri): 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog/ de las langs nas 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go// de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
i75b4(nyi khri): mnyam par gzhog go// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa rnams bsam gtan dang / tshang
i75b5(nyi khri): myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag yang dang yang du rnam par mnan pa cing snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' seMs
i75b6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
i75b7(nyi khri): ba thob pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis
i75b8(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo
i76a1(nyi khri): rnams thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob pa dag/ rnam po
i76a2(nyi khri): tha rad pa'i snyom sgo gsum po thob kyang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par myi byed kyi
i76a3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod cing / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung bas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sems can rnams la ston par byed de/ sems can de dag kyang des
i76a4(nyi khri): rgyan tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur bar byed pa de dag kyang ya
i76a5(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa yin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang
i76a6(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bus de ltar rnam par spyod pa de dag ni/ phyir myi ldog pa ma yin par shes par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang
i76a7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa drug la gnas shing / dga' ldan gyi gnas yongs su sbyong ba dag kyang yod de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
i76a8(nyi khri): de dag ni bskal pa bzang po par shes par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ bsam gtan bzhi thob pa tshad med pa
i76b1(nyi khri): ba'i thob pa/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun thob pa/ mngon par shes pa drug thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mya lA / 
i76b2(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / sos yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob pa dag/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par bya ba'i don du spyod kyang / bden pa bzhi rtogs par myi
i76b3(nyi khri): byed pa dag kyang yod de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni tshe gcig gis thogs par shes par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po pha rol
i76b4(nyi khri): tu phyind pa drug la spyod pa dag 'jig rten ga khams nas 'jig rten gi khams su 'dong zhing de dag gi sems can rnams byang chub tu yang dag par skul ba byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag kyang
i76b5(nyi khri): yod de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bskal pa grangs myed tshad myed pas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
i76b6(nyi khri): 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don du brtag par brtson te/ nam yang gdon par 'gyur ba'i tshig myi smra/ gdon pa dang
i76b7(nyi khri): ldan pa'i lus kyi las dang / yid kyi las myi byed pa dag kyang yod/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po pha rolang tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / seMs can gyi don du rtag tu brtson
i76b8(nyi khri): pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / sems can rnams kyi ngan song gsum po rgyan gcod pa dag kyang yod/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub ses dpa' seMs dpa' chen po phad
i77a1(nyi khri): rol tu phyinang pa drug la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar sgrub cing / zas 'dod pa rnaMs la zas/ sgo 'dod
i77a2(nyi khri): pa rnams la skom dang / bzhon pa 'dod pa dang rnams lta bzhon pa dang / me tog dang spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mal stan dang gos dang / rgyan dang / 'tsho ba dang / khyim 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim gyis
i77a3(nyi khri): yongs su sdud cing 'tsho ba'i yo byad skyon myed pa yongs su sgrub pa dag kyang yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa lhur byed/ sems can rnams lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi sdom pa la rab tu 'gog pa dag
i77a4(nyi khri): kyang yod do// bzod pa'i pha rold tu phan pa lhar byas te/ sems can rnams khro ba med pa dang / gnod sems myed pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lngar byas te/ sems
i77a5(nyi khri): can rnams dge ba'i chos thams cad la mngon par brtson pa la rab tu dgod par dag kyang yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa lngar byas te/ sems can rnams zhi gnas rtse gcig tu bya ba dang
i77a6(nyi khri): 'dod pas dben pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rold tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / shes rab kyi pha rold tu
i77a7(nyi khri): phyin pa lhar byas te/ de bzhini gshegs pa'i sku ji 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul da te/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams dang / byol song gyi ske gnas pa'i ses
i77a8(nyi khri): can rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i seMs can rnams la/ ngan song thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba'i phyir chos ston pa de dag kyang yod/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems
i77b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i ci 'dra bya de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi
i77b2(nyi khri): mu skyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhini gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi
i77b3(nyi khri): kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
i77b4(nyi khri): mang po yongasu sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag du/ byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa/ sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang
i77b5(nyi khri): shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steg gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la ches ston pa dang / de bzhin ga
i77b6(nyi khri): pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi/ 
i77b7(nyi khri): mtshan ma myed yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag du byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po che gcig/ 
i77b8(nyi khri): gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod // sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po pha ro long tu phyinang pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/ myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan/ 
i78a1(nyi khri): las kyi lam rnams la sems can rab tu 'god pa dang / skyon pa dang ngag snyan pas sems can yongs su snang ba dag kyang yod do/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen
i78a2(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid yongasu bzung ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid brgya stong pa la gnas shing
i78a3(nyi khri): de dag la gnas nas/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya steng du ma mnyes par byed do// sangs rgyas de dag thams cad la yo byad thams cad dang / mchod pa sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti
i78a4(nyi khri): dang / sti bstang dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag kyang yod/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing sems can log par lta / 
i78a5(nyi khri): mun pa can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis snang byed cing / bdag nyid kyang nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi chos de snang / 
i78a6(nyi khri): ba de dang / nam yang 'bral bar myi byed pa de dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang dag par byung ba yin// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta
i78a7(nyi khri): byas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shas rab kyi pha ro yid tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las rnams kyi go myi 'byed/ 
i78a8(nyi khri): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub seMs dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i lus kyi las kha na ma
i78b1(nyi khri): par byas te/ dbang po gsal zhing yongs su dag pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ de dag lus yongs su dag pa de dag gis/ skye bo mang po'i dga' ba dang mos pa skyes pa de dag 'gro ba mang po'i snying du
i78b2(nyi khri): sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang / sems can de dag kyang sems mos par gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag nyid kyis theg pa gsum gis yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dag kyang yod/ sha ra d+hA ta
i78b3(nyi khri): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus yongs su dag pa dang / yid yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o// shwa ra dwa ti'i
i78b4(nyi khri): bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa drug la spyod pa dag/ dbang po shin tu gsal ba de dag gis// thob nas// de dag dbang po shin tu gsal ba de dag gis
i78b5(nyi khri): bdag myi stod cing gzhan myi ston pa dag kyang yod/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed phyin chad sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims
i78b6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing phyir myi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du nam yang dbul por myi 'gyur zhing log par 'gro ba dang / ngan song du mi ltung ba dag kyang yod/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang
i78b7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed phyin chad phyir myi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du nam yang dge ba'i bcu'i las kyi lam myi gtong ba dag kyang yod do/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar
i78b8(nyi khri): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rolong tu phyinang pa dang // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas de dag dge ba bcu'i
i79a1(nyi khri): tho ba dang bcas pa dang / ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i
i79a2(nyi khri): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du ses/ shing 'di ni lus yin gyis des ni lus kyi las shig brtsam/ 'di ni ngag yin gyis des ni ngag gi las shig brtse/ 'di ni yid yin gis de
i79a3(nyi khri): ni yid kyi lis shig brtsam snye na/ de ni sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rtsom pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub seMs
i79a4(nyi khri): dpa' ses dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni/ lus gang dang / ngag gang dang / yid gang gis 'jungs pa'i ses bskyed pa 'i/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems bskyed pa 'am
i79a5(nyi khri): gnod seMs kyi sems bskyed pa 'am/ le lo'i sems bskyed pa'o// shes rab 'chal pa'i sems bskyed par bya ba de lta bu'i lus myi dmyigs so// ngag mi dmyigaso// sems myi dmyigs so// 
i79a6(nyi khri): sha ra dwa ti'i ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi phar ldod tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi las gnas ngan len spyod pa tsam du ni shes par myi bya ste/ de ni
i79a7(nyi khri): gnas mya / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro 'ad tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi las gnas ngan lan yongasu
i79a8(nyi khri): spong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnaMs kyi las dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kha na tho ba dang myed pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub ses dpa'
i79b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po/ lus kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba dang / ngag gi gnas ngan len yongasu sbyong ba dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len yongasu spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam/ 
i79b2(nyi khri): pratA sha ra dwa ti'i bu gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po lus myi dmyags pa dang / ngag dang seMs myi dmyigs pa'i tshe/ byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas/ 
i79b3(nyi khri): ngan len yongasu sbreng ba yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin cad/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnaMs yang dag par blangs te gnas shing nyin
i79b4(nyi khri): thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskrad pa myed par de rtag tu rkyen myi chad par sems can thos cad+ha li snying rje chen po'i seMs nye bar gzhog na/ de ni byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i
i79b5(nyi khri): lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan lan yong su dag pa zhes ngas bshad// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub ses dpa' ses/ dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa/ byang chub kyi lam yongs su
i79b6(nyi khri): sbyong zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
i79b7(nyi khri): tu phyi nad pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dag kyang yod do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang lags/ bco ldan
i79b8(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam lus la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / ngag dang yid la dmyigs pa myed pa dang sbyin pa'i
i80a1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyind pa la myigs pa myed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang dutu phyin
i80a2(nyi khri): pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dmigs pa myed pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la dmigs pa myed pa dang / rang sangs
i80a3(nyi khri): rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmyigs pa myed pa
i80a4(nyi khri): 'gyur ba de ni/ sha ro dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam de lta bus yin te/ de ltar chos thams cad la dmyigs pa myed cing / blang ba myed pa dang / dor ba myed pa
i80a5(nyi khri): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam de lta bus pha rol tu phyind pa drug la spyod cing / nan tan du byed pa de dag ni sus kyang thub pa med do// gsol pa bcom
i80a6(nyi khri): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul ji lta bur spyod pa thub pa ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
i80a7(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la rlom sems myed pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rlom sems myed pa dang / myin
i80a8(nyi khri): dang / gzugs la rlom sems myed pa dang / rna ba dang / sgra dang / sna dang / dri dang lce dang / ro dang lus dang / reg bya dang / yid dang / chos la rlom sems myed pa dang / sa'i khams la rlom sems
i80b1(nyi khri): myed pa dang // chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dngag/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / myig gi khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / 
i80b2(nyi khri): gzugs kyi khams kyi dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam por shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang
i80b3(nyi khri): dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya nga'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam
i80b4(nyi khri): par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi rnams la rlom sems med pa dang / chos kyi khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / rtend cing 'brel
i80b5(nyi khri): par 'byung ba la rlom sems myed pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la rlom sems myed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
i80b6(nyi khri): rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang rlom sems myed pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
i80b7(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi myur du rlom sems myed pa dang // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
i80b8(nyi khri): bdun dang // 'phags pa'o lam yan lag brgyad la rlom sems myed pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la rlom sems myed pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rlom sems myeng pa dang / tshad myed pa
i81a1(nyi khri): dgul rlom sems med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams 'tsham sems med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs
i81a2(nyi khri): sgo rnams la rlom sems myed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rlom sems myed pa dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang
i81a3(nyi khri): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la rlom sems myed pa dang / rgyu nang du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rlom sems myed pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu da
i81a4(nyi khri): snying rje phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / rlung byang chub la rlom sems myed pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / bla
i81a5(nyi khri): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rlom sems myed pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la rlom sems myong bar gyur du pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
i81a6(nyi khri): chen po de ni pha rolang du phyind pa drug gi rnam par 'phel ba yin te/ sus kyang thub po myed do// shA rA dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin
i81a7(nyi khri): pa drug la gnas te/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / ye shes de dang ldan pos nam yang ngan song rnams su myi skye/ myi dbul zhing 'phongs pa
i81b1(nyi khri): rnams su myong b+h+ri 'gyur te/ lus gong dang ldan pas lha dang myi dang mA ma na dang bcas pa'i 'jig rtenang gi nang na// smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba
i81b2(nyi khri): dag kyang yod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems
i81b3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar myi 'gyur ba dang / myi dbul zhing 'phongs pa nyams su myong bar myi 'gyur ba dang / lus gang dang ldan pas lha dang myi dang
i81b4(nyi khri): ma yin gi nang nas smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzind par myi 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes de gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
i81b5(nyi khri): ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang / ldan pa ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag
i81b6(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ba snyed dag mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan to byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhing gi
i81b7(nyi khri): yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngon de bzhin gshegs/ lho dang nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs re re zhing
i81b8(nyi khri): 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang
i82a1(nyi khri): nyan te byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' seMs
i82a2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes myi bskyed do// chos kyi 'du shes dang / dge 'dun gi 'du shes mi skyed do// nyan thos kyi 'du shes dang / rang sangs kyi 'du shes dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
i82a3(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / sangs kyi 'du shes myi bskyed do// bdag gi 'du shes mi skyed do// gzhan gi 'du shes myo bskyed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes myi bskyed do// ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa
i82a4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinod pa la spyod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ tshul khris
i82a5(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs// bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod de/ bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa myi dmyigaso// brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod de/ brtson 'grus kyi pha
i82a6(nyi khri): rold tu phyind pa myi dmyigaso/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigaso// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
i82a7(nyi khri): phyind pa myi dmyigaso// nang stong pa nyid sgom ste/ nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigaso// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgom ste/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigaso// dran pa nye ba
i82a8(nyi khri): gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par rje gaslong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gau rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom snga
i82b1(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnams par
i82b2(nyi khri): thard pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams sgom se/ mngon par shes pa rnams rgya
i82b3(nyi khri): dmyigaso// ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs gi sgo rnams sgom ste/ gzugs kyi sgo rnams myi dmigaso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig
i82b4(nyi khri): bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres bcwo brgyad sgom ste/ sangs rgyas bkyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad myi dmig so// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig
i82b5(nyi khri): 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang rang sangs rgyas dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar la myi dmyigs// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myi dmyigaso// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dzin
i82b6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes te/ ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang yongasu rdzogs par byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi
i82b7(nyi khri): chos thams cad kyang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myig lnga rab tu thob
i82b8(nyi khri): pa dang / yongs su spyod pa yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sha'i mig dang / lha'i myig dang / shes rab kyi myig dang / chos kyi myig dang / sangs rgyas kyi myig go// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang
i83a1(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i myig yongs su dgu pa gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du po/ sha ra dwa ti bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
i83a2(nyi khri): bo sha'i myig gis dpag tshad brgya stong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i myig gis dpag tshad nyis brgya dang sum brgya dang / bzhi brgya dang / lnga brgya dang / 
i83a3(nyi khri): stong gi bar du mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i myig gis 'dzam bu'i gling mthong ba yod do// sha'i myig gis gling gnyis pa dang / gling gsu
i83a4(nyi khri): dang / gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khams mthong ba yod do// sha'i myig gis stong gi 'jig rten gi khams mthong ba yod do// sha'i myig gis stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gi khams mthong ba
i83a5(nyi khri): yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sha'i myig gis stong gsum gi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gi khams mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub ses
i83a6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o// sha'i myig yang dag pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lnga'i myig yongs su dag pa gang lags// bcom ldan 'das
i83a7(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rgyal po chen po bzhi ris kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' tu shes so// sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / 'tshe ma dang dga' ldan dang 'phrul
i83a8(nyi khri): dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs la nye phan dang // tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dad pa dang dge
i83b1(nyi khri): dang chung dge dang chad myed dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang che ba dang / chung che dang tshad myed che ba dang 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myo gdung ba dang / shi nang tu mthong ba dang / gyi non snang ba dang / 'og myin gi lha rnas
i83b2(nyi khri): kyi lha rnams myig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni rgyal po chen po'i bzhi'i ris kyi sgra rnams kyis
i83b3(nyi khri): mya nganas so// sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams dang / mtsham dang dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa
i83b4(nyi khri): 'khor dang / mangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / chang myed snang ba dang / kun sdang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dag dang / tshad myed dge pa dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chub che dang / chang myed me ba dang
i83b5(nyi khri): bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shind tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gi lha rnams kyis myi shes te/ lha'i myig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
i83b6(nyi khri): chen po ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'phos dang / skye ba rab tu shes so// lha dang nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lha nub
i83b7(nyi khri): dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba rab tu shes so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub
i83b8(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig yongs su dag pa'o// gsol du pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi myig yongs dag pa gang lags/ 
i84a1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 'ape'i shes rab kyi myig dang ldan pas 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas su
i84a2(nyi khri): dge ba 'am/ myi dge ba 'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba myed pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa 'am/ 'jig rten pa 'am// 'jig rten
i84a3(nyi khri): 'das pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa myed pa'i chos gang yang myi shes pa myed pa dang / shes rab kyi myig dang ldan pas chos gang yang ma mthong ba 'am/ ma thos pa 'am/ ma byas so/ 
i84a4(nyi khri): pa 'am/ khong du chud pa myed pa 'di ni/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi myig yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
i84a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi myig yongs su dag pa gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi myig gis
i84a6(nyi khri): gang zag 'di ni dad pa'i rjes su 'gro ba/ gang zag 'di ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di ni dbang po lnga ni rnam par tha rad pa'i sgong pa nyid kyis skyes par 'gyur ro// dbang po lngas
i84a7(nyi khri): de ma thag tu ting nge 'dzind thob par 'gyur ro// de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzind gis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs
i84a8(nyi khri): kha lta ba dang / the tsom dang tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'di ni rgyu nad tu zhugs pa zhes bya'o// des sgom pa'i lam rab tu
i84b1(nyi khri): thob nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spangs par byed de // gang zag 'di ni len cig phyir 'ong ba 'o// de la de nyid de bas kyang shi nad tu bsgoms nas// 'dod pa'i 'dod
i84b2(nyi khri): chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'o// de lam de nyid de bas kyang shi nang tu bsgoms pas/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs
i84b3(nyi khri): myed pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong ste/ gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// gang zag 'di ni mtshan ma myed pa la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di ni dbang/ 
i84b4(nyi khri): bo lnga ni rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo mtshan ma myed pas skye bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzind thob par 'gyur ro// de ma thag tu pa'i ting nge 'dzind thob par grol ba'i ye shes
i84b5(nyi khri): skye bar 'gyur ba nas/ gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'i bar zhes bya'o// gang zag 'di ni smond pa la gnas 'di'i dbang po lnga ni/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo smond pa myed pas skye bar 'gyur ro/ 
i84b6(nyi khri): dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzind thob par 'gyur ro// de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ba nas/ gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/ 
i84b7(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i bar du rab tu shes te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi myig yongs su dag pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
i84b8(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen pos gang ci yang rung ste/ kun 'byung ba'i chos tsan de dag thams cad ni 'gag pa'i chos can no// zhes bya ba'i shes pasadabang po lnga thob par 'gyur ro// 'di ni shA ra dwa ti
i85a1(nyi khri): 'i bu byang chub sems dpanga' sems dpa chen pa'i rnyog yongs su dag pa'o// / ladwa po bu gzhan yang byang chub sems rapa' sems dpa' chan pa nas kyi mas zhes byang chub sams
i85a2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni sems dpo bskyed pa ste/ smin pa'i pha'i ldang tu phyind pa dang / tshu khrims kyi pha ro lang du byind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha ro yang du phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rolapa/ 
i85a3(nyi khri): tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de'i rgyu su dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang ldan te/ thabs mkhas pas
i85a4(nyi khri): du bsams te/ lus yongs su 'dzin to// dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o// bram ze'i che zhing mtho ba'i rigs
i85a5(nyi khri): dang khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o// rgyal chen bani 'a ros kyi lha'i nang du skye'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum gri lha'i nang du skye'o// 'tshe ma'i lha'i nang du skye'o// dgo' ldan gi lha'i nang du skye'o// gzhan 'phru
i85a6(nyi khri): dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du skye'o// de dag ni gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smind par byed par 'gyur te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis/ de dag la rim 'gro byed par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
i85a7(nyi khri): yang yongs su dag par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / sti snang dang
i85a8(nyi khri): mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang myi ltung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma
i85b1(nyi khri): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ phyir myi ldog par myi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi myig yong su dag pa
i85b2(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand pa'o// 'di ni lung
i85b3(nyi khri): ma bstand pa'o// 'di ni nges pa'o// 'di ni ma nges pa'o// 'di ni lung bstand pa'o// 'di ni lung bstand par myi 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni phyir myi ldog pa ste/ 'di dag ni phyir myi ldog pa ma yin ste/ dbang po ma
i85b4(nyi khri): thob pa'o// 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang gA'i
i85b5(nyi khri): klung gi bye ba snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / sti stang dang / mchod pa byed do// lho dang
i85b6(nyi khri): nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs
i85b7(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / mchod pa byed do// 'di ni mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'dis ni mngon par shes
i85b8(nyi khri): thob par myi 'gyur ro// 'di ni bzod pa'o// 'di ni thob pa thob pa ma yin pa'o// 'di ni dbang po thob pa'o// 'di ni dbang po thob pa ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong
i86a1(nyi khri): dag par 'gyur ro// 'di na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par myi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpang sems dpa' chen po 'di ni smad las chen po dang ldan pa'on 'dzin sngon lam chen po dang
i86a2(nyi khri): ldan pa'o// 'di ni sems can yongs su smind par byas so// 'dis ni sems can yongs su smind par ma byas// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams
i86a3(nyi khri): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams legs par brjod pa mdzad do// 'di ni legs par rjod pa myi mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni sangs rgyas bco
i86a4(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// 'di dag ni nye bar myi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' thob nas tshe dpag tu myed par 'gyur ro// 'di'i tshe
i86a5(nyi khri): dpag tu yod par 'gyuraro// 'di'i 'od dang dbyangs dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun ni tshad myed par 'gyuraro// 'di ni tshad yod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni na bla na myed pa yang dag pa
i86a6(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'di ni ldan par myi 'gyur ro// 'di ni dka' ba spyod par 'gyur
i86a7(nyi khri): 'di ni spyod par myi 'gyur ro// 'di ni srid pa tha ma'o// 'di ni srid pa tha ma yin no// 'di ni snying po byang chub la 'dug par 'gyur ro// 'di ni 'dug par myi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
i86a8(nyi khri): 'di dag la ni bdud yod par 'gyur ro/ 'di dag la ni bdud yod par myi 'gyur ro// zhes bya bar rab tu shes/ de ltar na sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su
i86b1(nyi khri): pa yin no// gsold pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi myig yongasu dag pa gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal de pa// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang
i86b2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi rjes su rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind la mnyam par gzhag nas/ rnam pa thams cad pa khyind pa nyid thob par byed do// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
i86b3(nyi khri): stobs bcu dang ldan pa yin/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs
i86b4(nyi khri): rgyas kyi rnam par tha rad pa bsgribs pa myed pa dang ldan pa yin pa de ni de myig ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myig de dang ldan pas/ rnam pa thams cad du mthong ba 'am/ ma zos pa 'am/ 
i86b5(nyi khri): ma shes pa 'am/ khong du ma chud pa gang yang myed de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs
i86b6(nyi khri): rgyas kyi myig yongasu dag pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myig lnga yongs su sbyang bar 'dod pa dang / thob par 'dod pas pha rol tu phyind pa drug la brtson par
i86b7(nyi khri): bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug gi dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa myed de// nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / 
i86b8(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ma 'dus pa myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu la la zhig yang dag par smra bas/ dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus par brjod pa zhig du dgos na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
i87a1(nyi khri): pa yang dag par smra ba brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi phyi rold tu phyind pa ni myig lnga bskyed pa'o// mig lnga'o de lnga bslab pa'i byang chub sems dpa' seMs/ 
i87a2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la spyod pa'i/ byang chub
i87a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par shes pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa rab tu thob ste/ rdzu 'phrul gi rnam pa du ma nyamasu myong bar byed do// de ni sa chen po 'di yang rab tu g.yo bar byed do/ 
i87a4(nyi khri): gcig tu gyur da cing mang por 'gyur ro// mang por gyurd cing gcig tu 'gyuraro// snang ba dang myi snang ba yang nyams su myong bar byed do// rtsig pa las thal ba dang / ra ba las thal ba dang / ri las thal
i87a5(nyi khri): bar thogs pa myed pa'i lus kyis 'gro ste/ dper na na mkha' la yang bya ba bzhin no// nam mkha' la yang bskyil mo dkrung gis 'gro ste/ dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no// sa la yang gyen du 'byung
i87a6(nyi khri): ba dang / 'og tu 'dzul ba byed de/ dper na chu la bya bzhin no// chu la yang bying ba myed par 'gro ste/ dper na sa l-i bya bzhin no// du bar 'thul zhing mer 'bar te/ dper na me'i phung po chen po bzhin no/ 
i87a7(nyi khri): nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che la 'di ltar mthu che zhing / 'di ltar dbang che zhing lag pas byugs shing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gi bar du lus kyis dbang sgyur te/ rdzu 'phrul des rlom semasu 'gyur
i87a8(nyi khri): ba myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid gri stong pa dang / rang bzhin gis dben pa dang / rang bzhin gis ma skyes pa'i phyir/ des rdzu 'phrul gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul de lta bu
i87b1(nyi khri): myi dmyigs// de thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yid la bya ba ma rtogs par rdzu 'phrul lam// rdzu 'phrul mngom par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mye bskyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
i87b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul go rnam pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa sgrub pa yin no// de lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pa/ 
i87b3(nyi khri): lce dang myi dang gnyis ka'i sgra thos te/ lha'i rna ba'i khams des bdag ni sgra nyan ces bya bar rlom sems su 'gyur ba myed do// de ni 'di ltar des rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin
i87b4(nyi khri): ma skyes pa'i phyir rna ba dang / sgra dmyigs pa myed de/ de thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la bya ba ma rtogs par lha'i rna ba'i khams la bsam pa yang myi skyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems
i87b5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lha'i rna ba'i khams mngon par du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no// 
i87b6(nyi khri): bam po / des sems can pha rold tu dang / gang zag pha rol kyi sems sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems la
i87b7(nyi khri): 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i semaso zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sheso// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa rdzi
i87b8(nyi khri): lta ba bzhin du rab tu sheso// zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i snyems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bar shes// zhe sdang dang myed pa'i sems la zhe
i88a1(nyi khri): sdang myed pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba
i88a2(nyi khri): bzhin du rab tu shes so// gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems la skyid pa'i dang
i88a3(nyi khri): ldan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// srid pa dang bral ba'i sems la srid pa dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes// nye bar
i88a4(nyi khri): lend pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nye bar lend pa dang bcas pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes// nye bar len pa myed pa'i sems la nye bar len pa myed pa'i sems shes
i88a5(nyi khri): bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// kun nas 'dus pa'i sems d+haHsu bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes// rnam par 'phros pa'i sems la rnam par 'phros pa'i sems shes bya
i88a6(nyi khri): bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rgya chung ngu'i sems la rgya chu ngu'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes// rgya che ba'i sems la rgya che ba'i sems shes bya bar
i88a7(nyi khri): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes// yangs pa'i sems la yangs pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes// che bar gyur pa'i sems la che bar gyur pa'i sems shes
i88a8(nyi khri): bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshad myed pa'i sems la tshad myed pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam pa
i88b1(nyi khri): bzhag pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mnyam par ma bzhag pa'o sems la mnyam par ma bzhag po'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes// 
i88b2(nyi khri): rnam par grol ba'i sems la rnam par grol ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes// rnam par ma grol ba'i sems la/ rnam par ma grol ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa
i88b3(nyi khri): lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems la/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zag pa myed pa'i sems la zag pa myed pa'i skyes/ 
i88b4(nyi khri): shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nyon mongs
i88b5(nyi khri): pa myed pa'i sems la/ nyon mongs pa myed pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bla na myed yod pa'i sems la/ bla na yod pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
i88b6(nyi khri): rab tu shes so// bla na myed pa'i sems la/ bla na myed pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes ste/ gzhan gi sems shes pa des rlom semasu 'gyur ba myed pa dang / de ni 'di ltar sems de nyid/ 
i88b7(nyi khri): bsam gis myi khyab pa'i phyir te/ de ni bdag shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur
i88b8(nyi khri): ba de lta bu'i sems myo dmyigs te/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la bya ba ma rtogs par sems shes bya bar bsam pa 'am/ sems shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang myi skyed do// sha ra dwa tiH
i89a1(nyi khri): bu de ltar na byang chub sems sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa mngon du bya bangon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin/ 
i89a2(nyi khri): no// de ni sngon gi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes rnam pa du ma mngon par sgrub ste/ sems cag kyang rjes su dran pa nas/ sems brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no// nyi ma gcig
i89a3(nyi khri): nas nyi ma brgya dang / zla ba gcig nas zla ba brgya dang / lo gcig nas lo brgya dang / bskal pa gcig nas bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du nas bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag
i89a4(nyi khri): khrig brgya stong du ma rjes su dran te/ bdag ni de lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug ste ming ni 'di zhes bya ba rus ni 'di zhes bya/ rigs ni 'di zhes pa/ kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/ yun 'di srid cig tu 'dug 'dug
i89a5(nyi khri): tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/ de ltar bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig du skyeso// zhes bya ba nas de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas gtan tshigs
i89a6(nyi khri): dang bcas/ dan rtags dang bcas par bdag dang gzhan gi sngon gi gnas rnam par du mar rjes su dran te/ sngon gi gnas rje su ngan pa dran pa mngon par bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes des kyang rlom
i89a7(nyi khri): sems su 'gyur ba myed do// de ni 'di ltar ye shes de ye shes ma yin te/ bsam gis mi khyab pa'i phyir de ni bdag gis rab tu shes zhes bya bar rlom sems myed de/ 'di ltar des ye shes de nyid kyang
i89a8(nyi khri): rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ye shes myi dmyigs// de ni thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yid la bya ba mu rtogs
i89b1(nyi khri): par rjes su dran pa'i ye shes kyi don du bsam po tsam yang myi skyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sngon gi gnas rjes su
i89b2(nyi khri): dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no// de ni lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myo lus 'das pas sems can 'chi 'bo dang / skye ba dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / 
i89b3(nyi khri): dog myi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngan song na gnas pa dang / bde 'gro na gnas pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis ngan du spyod pa
i89b4(nyi khri): dang ldan/ yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang / ldan 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa log par lta ba rnams te/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyend kyis lus zhig nas ngan song dang / ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can
i89b5(nyi khri): dmyal ba dag tu skye'o// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang / yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams lha skur
i89b6(nyi khri): pa myi 'debs pa yang dag par lta ba rnams te/ de'i rgyu de'i rkye nad kyis lus zhig nas/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ de ltar phyogs
i89b7(nyi khri): bcu kun kyi 'jig rten gi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dge ba'i 'gro ba drug drug du 'khor ba rnams kyi skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
i89b8(nyi khri): rab tu shes te/ des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba myed do// de ni 'di ltar myig de myig ma yin zhing / bsam gis myi khyab pa'i phyir te/ de bdag gis mthong ngo zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// de yang 'di
i90a1(nyi khri): sar rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i myig de lta bu des myi dmyigs te// de ni thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yod la byed pa ma
i90a2(nyi khri): gtogs par lha'i myig bsam pa 'am/ lha'i mig mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang myi bskyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
i90a3(nyi khri): tu phyind pa la spyod cing / lha'i myig mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no// de ni zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub kyang
i90a4(nyi khri): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thob par myi byed do// gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang yang myi mthong ngo // de mngon par she
i90a5(nyi khri): ba des kyang rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind thob par byas nas/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu sbyor bar byed do// zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba dang / mngon par shes pa des
i90a6(nyi khri): rlom sems su 'gyur ba myed do// de ni 'di ltar ye shes de nyid ye shes ma yin zhing bsam gas myi khyab pa'i phyir te/ de bdag gis rab tu shes so// zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// de yang 'di ltar
i90a7(nyi khri): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i zag pa zad pa'i ye shes mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa de lta bu myi dmyigaso
i90a8(nyi khri): de ni thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par zad pa zad pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi bsam pa 'am/ zag pa zad pa mngon par du bya ba'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi
i90b1(nyi khri): skyed do// de ltar sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par
i90b2(nyi khri): sgrub pa yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod cing mngon par shes pa drug yongasu rdzogs par byed pa ni/ bla na myed pa
i90b3(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis rnam par 'phel lo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// sbyin pa'i
i90b4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir chags pa myed pa'i sems nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// 
i90b5(nyi khri): shar dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa
i90b6(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi phyir ltung ba bya ba myed pa nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
i90b7(nyi khri): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshig bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi 'khrul pa nye bar bzung bas/ rna ba thams cad mkhyen
i90b8(nyi khri): nyid kyi lam/ spyod pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
i91a1(nyi khri): la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir lus dang / sems kyi brtson 'grus mi zhig pa nye bar bzung bar/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod
i91a2(nyi khri): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
i91a3(nyi khri): nyid kyi phyir 'khrug pa myed pa'i sems nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyor ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
i91a4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab 'chal pa'i sems myi dmyigs pa nye bar bzung bas
i91a5(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol tu phyin
i91a6(nyi khri): pa drug la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba myed pa nye bar bzung ba dang / yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa nye bar bzung bas/ rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam
i91a7(nyi khri): yongs su sbyong ba yin no// de la sbyin pa ni yongs su 'dzind pa nye bar bzung ba las gdas so// khrims ni tshul khrims ngan pa nye bar bzung ba las gdagaso// bzod pa'i 'khrug pa nye bar bzung
i91a8(nyi khri): ba las gdagaso// brtson 'grus ni le lo'i nye bar bzung ba las gdags so// ting nge 'dzind ni mnyam par bzhag pa nye bar bzung ba las gdagaso// shes rab ni shes rab 'chal pa nye bar bzung
i91b1(nyi khri): na do tu bya ba rlos sems spyad du/ spyan ma bya yi rnam sems byung du/ ston pa byed du nas bya bar rlom sems myed de/ smyon pa tu byed / 
i91b2(nyi khri): bya byang rlomasems myed do// chus khrims dang / ldan monas bya ba rlom sems myed do// mub khyims ngan mthon na zhes kyi bar rlom sems myed // 'khro ba can no zhes bya ba rlom sems myed du
i91b3(nyi khri): brtson 'grus brtsams so// zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// le lo can zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// mnyam par bzhag pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// mnyam par ma lags pa'o// zhes bya bar rlom
i91b4(nyi khri): sems med do// shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems myed do// shes rab 'tshal pa can no zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// skyes so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// phyag byas zhes bya rang rlom sems
i91b5(nyi khri): myed de// rom gror byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// rim gror ma byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na ka sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma skyes pa ni spyos so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// bya
i91b6(nyi khri): byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// rim 'gror byas so zhes bya bar nom sems myed do// rim gror ma byas zhes bya bar rlom sems skyed do// de ci'i phyir na na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha ro 'od tu phyin
i91b7(nyi khri): pa na rlom sems thams cad yang dag par rjod pa'i phyir te/ 'di la sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yon tan ji snyed cog yang
i91b8(nyi khri): pa de dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la myed de/ de yon tan 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su sbyinang par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongasu
i92a1(nyi khri): dag par byed la rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ni kyang thob par byed do// sha ra dwa ti bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa
i92a2(nyi khri): spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad mnyam pa'i sems bskyed do// sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed nas// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob bo// chos thams cad mnyam
i92a3(nyi khri): pa nyid rab tu thob nas// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la sems can thams cad rab tu 'god do// de ni tshe dang ldan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugasu byon cing dben par bya ba
i92a4(nyi khri): yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yid du 'ong zhing dben par bya ba ma yin no// de ni skye ba gang dang gang du skyes kyang
i92a5(nyi khri): de dag du nam yang myig gis yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs myi mthong ngo // rnabs yid du myi 'ong ba'i sgra myi thos so// rna bas yid du myi 'ong ba'i dri myi tshor ro// lces yid du myi 'ong ba'i ro myi myong ngo // lus
i92a6(nyi khri): kyis yid du myi 'ong ba'i reg bya myi reg go// yid kyis yid du myi 'ong ba'i chos rnam par rig pa myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la
i92a7(nyi khri): de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyam par myi 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la snyan pa 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ dge slong sum brgya sa go
i92a8(nyi khri): gyen gyon pa/ bcom ldan 'das la yon du gsol te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do// de na
i92b1(nyi khri): dang ldan pa dga' ba snad pams yangs na drugs phrag pa gas tu gabyung k+Sha sus mims ngo so la bcugs te/ smom ldan 'das dang na pa de logs su oM hU~M m+b+ha
i92b2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag ricom pa gang dgu par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya sa rnams ni myong rkyen mchis pa dzin
i92b3(nyi khri): myi mdzang de// dkyi rgyuchu'i rkyend kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/ de skad ces gsoladu ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo ma 'di skad ces ciga' su mad ti/ dag po na
i92b4(nyi khri): sum brgya po 'di dag ni bskal pa drug bcu rtsa gcig 'das nas/ bskal pa dpe skar ma lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' chen po
i92b5(nyi khri): zhes bya ba sha stag 'jig rtenang du 'byung ngo // 'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myi skul ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye
i92b6(nyi khri): 'o// 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag drug bcu kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'o/ 
i92b7(nyi khri): sangs rgyas byams pa mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// de nyid du rab tu byung nas/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin bshegs pa byams pa des bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
i92b8(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand par 'gyur// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i tshe/ 'khor ba zhi po de dag 'di na 'khod bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong mthong bar gyur/ 
i93a1(nyi khri): te lho dang nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang snying gi phyogs re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing steng mthong bar 'gyur to// 'jig rten gi khams
i93a2(nyi khri): de dag nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gisangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba gang ji lta bur mthong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba de dag kyang myi mjed
i93a3(nyi khri): kyi 'jig rten gi khams 'di dag na yod par mthong ngo de nas 'khor de'i nang nas srog chags stong phrag bcus bdag cag gis las gang byas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur
i93a4(nyi khri): ba de lta bu'i las kyi spyad par bya'o zhes smon lam btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud nas zhal 'dzum mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dag
i93a5(nyi khri): bo bstand las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i ljang nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang ba der log su thel mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das
i93a6(nyi khri): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu dang rkyend ma mchis par bzhad pa myi mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ dga' bo
i93a7(nyi khri): srog chags stong phrag bcu po 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsold pa bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo srog chags stong phrag bcu po 'di dag ni 'di
i93a8(nyi khri): nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / nam du yang myi 'bral te/ phyi mang
i93b1(nyi khri): dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri dwa ti'i bu
i93b2(nyi khri): rung / tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal che bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun shes pa'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan 'ab 'od bsrungs chen po dang / dge slong gzhan dag kyang kun kI
i93b3(nyi khri): mngon par shes po shi nad tu mang ba dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu mang ba dag dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyend dang / dge bsnyend ma shin tu
i93b4(nyi khri): meng ba dag gis/ bco ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
i93b5(nyi khri): pha rold tu phyind pa chen po 'o nga bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yangs pa'o// pha rol
i93b6(nyi khri): tu phyind pa 'di ni dam pa'o// pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni rab bo// pha rold tu phyind pa 'di ni phul lo/ pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni mchog go// pha rold tu phyind pa 'di ni mnyam pa ma mchis pa'o gya na
i93b7(nyi khri): pa'o// pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni bzang ba'o// pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni bla na ma mchis pa'o// pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni lhag na ma mchis pa'o// pha rold tu phyind pa 'di ni/ pha rol tu phyind pa
i93b8(nyi khri): 'di ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni 'dra ba ma mchis pa'o// pha rold tu phyind pa 'di ni mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'o// pha rold tu phyind pa 'di ni nam mkha'o// bcom ldan
i94a1(nyi khri): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
i94a2(nyi khri): rnams kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni mya mchis pa'i dbye nyid sto
i94a3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dpon shes rab kyi rtse rol tu phyind pa 'di ni// byang chub ses
i94a4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thub pa ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnas
i94a5(nyi khri): kyis ni myi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i sbyin pa yongs su btang ba'o yongs su gtong ngo // yongasu gtong bar 'gyuraro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa yongasu
i94a6(nyi khri): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par 'gyuraro// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi
i94a7(nyi khri): mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// thob bo// thob par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
i94b1(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims srungaso// bsrung ngo // srung bar 'gyur roka de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
i94b2(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// yongs su rtogaso// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur te/ 
i94b3(nyi khri): thob bo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to// thob bo// 'thob par 'gyuraro// bcom
i94b4(nyi khri): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la spyod pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bzod pa bsgoms// sgom mo sgom
i94b5(nyi khri): par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// yongs su rdzogaso// yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang
i94b6(nyi khri): mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to// thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur da to// thob bo// thob pa
i94b7(nyi khri): 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni myi mnyam pa'i dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus brtsams
i94b8(nyi khri): rtsom mo// rtsom par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yongasu rdzogs par gyur to// yongasu rdzogaso// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
i95a1(nyi khri): de'i slang du sum rgyam bu'i sras thob par gyur to// theb po/ thob par 'gyur ro// skad du mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'dis ste/ blan myed pa yad dag par rdzogs pa
i95a2(nyi khri): byang chub thob par gyur to// thob po// thub par gyur du ti/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis na/ 
i95a3(nyi khri): myi mnyam pa dang bsam gtan bskyed do// skyed do// skyed par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to// thob bo// thob par gyur to// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa
i95a4(nyi khri): dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to// thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di
i95a5(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms so// sbom mo// sgom par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du
i95a6(nyi khri): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
i95a7(nyi khri): chos 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to// thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bcom
i95a8(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid la spyad pas/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs brnyes par gyur to// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba dang // 'du shes pa
i95b1(nyi khri): byed dang / phyim nyas pa pa chos rnams parnyes par gyur to// mnyam pa dang menyes pa byang chub tu mngon pa byang chub nas dmyi mnyas pa dang mnam brnams kyi mthor babam par gyur te ladu
i95b2(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu byas
i95b3(nyi khri): pa 'di nyid la spyad pas mnyam pa dang / myi mnyam pa'i gzugs brnyes par gyur to// brnyes so// brnyes par 'gyur ro// myi mnyam pa dang mernam pa'i tshor ba dang gi 'du shes dang // 'du byed do nin
i95b4(nyi khri): par shes pa brnyed par gyur to// brnyes so// brnyes par 'gyur ro// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ myi mnyam pa'i mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba
i95b5(nyi khri): bar gyur to// bskor ro// skor bar 'gyur ro// de lta lags pas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyind par 'tshal pas/ shes rab
i95b6(nyi khri): kyi phyind pa la brtson 'gyi'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la spyod pa 'de dag ni/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas/ 
i95b7(nyi khri): pa'i 'jig rtend gis phyag bgyi ba lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
i95b8(nyi khri): de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad skad du smras pa bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
i96a1(nyi khri): ro yang du phyind pa 'di la spyod pa dag re lnga dang myi dang / snga ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten go phyug bya bar 'ong ba'o// ci'i byor zhen byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod
i96a2(nyi khri): myo'i 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lho'i 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs tshe ning mtho ba'i rigs rlung ga khyim bdag che ning mtho ba'i tshogs dang / 'khor lo la sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / 
i96a3(nyi khri): rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / 'tshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs la nye phan dang / tshangs
i96a4(nyi khri): pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge' ba drang cung dge dang / dag rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang 'bras bu
i96a5(nyi khri): che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shinang du mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang
i96a6(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyu tu zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyi myi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa dang rang
i96a7(nyi khri): sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ bza' ba dang bzung ba dang gzhon pa dang / gos dang mal cha dang khyim dang
i96a8(nyi khri): ba dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / dung dang man shel dang / bya ro dang / gser dang / gdus dag kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad ma'i
i96b1(nyi khri): rkyen dang / b+ha rdzas su bya ba 'am/ yang dag par bral bar zad pa yang byed pa yang rung smra ste/ de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang na/ 'jig rten du 'byung ba
i96b2(nyi khri): 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i chen pha rold tu phyind pa drug la gnas te/ bdag sbyin pa
i96b3(nyi khri): yongs su gtong zhing / gzhan yang sbyin pa la sbyor ro// bdag tshul khrims srung zhing / gzhan yang tshul khrims la sbyor ro// bdag bzod pa sgom zhing gzhan yang bzod pa la sbyor ro// bdag brtson
i96b4(nyi khri): 'grus rtsom zhing gzhan yang brtson 'grus la sbyor ro// bdag bsam gtan skyed cing gzhan yang bsam gtan la sbyor ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rten cing / sems
i96b5(nyi khri): can rnams pha rol phyind pa drug la spyod pas/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phum sum tshogs pas thams cad thob bo// rigs kyi bu dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa'
i96b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du zhugs pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ zhal gi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste
i96b7(nyi khri): stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di khyab par mdzad do// de nas de'i tshe ljags kyi dbang po de las 'od 'phro ba kha dog du ma dang / kha dog sna tshogs su ldan pa mang po byung bar
i96b8(nyi khri): gyurd to// de byung nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas pos rgyas par gyur to// lho dang nub dang byang dang / byang shar dang shar lho dang / 
i97a1(nyi khri): lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re ro zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to// de nas shar phyogs rgya 'jig
i97a2(nyi khri): rjenang gi khyams gang ga'i klung gi bye ba snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom
i97a3(nyi khri): ldan 'das la zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos lham pa 'di su'i mthu lags shes yongs su dris so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi
i97a4(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni nub kyi phyogs logs na/ 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa dgra bcom rdzogs pa'i
i97a5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ des zhal gi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram sto/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
