i164a6(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gis rlob/ rna ba dang 'du she sna dang lce dang lus dang / maud la mos shing 'du shes te
i164a7(nyi khri): byin gas rdzob/ gzugs gling 'du shes byin zhes rlob/ spa dang dri dang / ro dang reg dang / chos la mos shing 'du shes te byin gis rlob bo// myig gi rnam par shes pa la mos na
i164a8(nyi khri): 'du shes te byin gis rdzob na pa'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par gyes pa dang / khri'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa
i164b1(nyi khri): mos shing 'du shes te byin gis rlob de/ myig gi 'dus te pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gos rlob rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg
i164b2(nyi khri): pa dang lus kyi 'das te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gis rlob bo// myig gi 'dus te reg par shes pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba la mos shing 'du
i164b3(nyi khri): shes te byin gis rlob / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus
i164b4(nyi khri): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang la mos shing 'du shes te byin gis rlob / khams rnams la mos shis 'du shes te byin gis rlob/ ma rig pa la
i164b5(nyi khri): 'du shes te byin gis rlob pa/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang len pa dang / srid pa dang skye ba dang
i164b6(nyi khri): rga shi dang la mos shing 'du shes te byin gis rlob / pha rol tu phyind pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang ka byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / 
i164b7(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang
i164b8(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang nad pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / myig lnga dang / ting nge 'and rnams dang / gzungs gi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skangs
i165a1(nyi khri): dang myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te byin gis rlob na / de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad/ 
i165a2(nyi khri): la mos shing 'du shes te byin gis rlob pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ma 'baco brgyad mngon par 'du bya ba spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang na ba dang / 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / 
i165a3(nyi khri): sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su myi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su 'grol bar brjod de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems da
i165a4(nyi khri): chen po de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yang mngon du bya ba'i skal pa phyin na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar la ci smos te de ni gnas myed do// tshe dang
i165a5(nyi khri): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar spyod na/ thabs myi mkhas pas shes par bya'o// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga byang chub sas
i165a6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas par shes par bya/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa'
i165a7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / gzugs la myi spyod/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la yang myi spyod/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma
i165a8(nyi khri): myi spyod/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la myi spong/ gzugs rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ gzugs myi rtag ces bya ba dang / gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang
i165b1(nyi khri): gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang / gzugs bdag myed ces bya ba dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / 
i165b2(nyi khri): gzugs myi stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / gzugs smonod pa yod ces bya ba dang / gzugs smond pa yod ces pa dang / gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang / gzugs myi dben
i165b3(nyi khri): zhes bya ba dang myi spyod na/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar myi spyod// myi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / 
i165b4(nyi khri): bdag myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang smond pa yod ces bya
i165b5(nyi khri): pa dang smond pa myed ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa de'i tshe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
i165b6(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs ma yin/ gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang
i165b7(nyi khri): gzugs/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang / rnam par shes pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rna
i165b8(nyi khri): par shes pa myed/ rnam par shes pa'i las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel
i166a1(nyi khri): bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyind pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang
i166a2(nyi khri): tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par tha rad pa rnams dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
i166a3(nyi khri): ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so
i166a4(nyi khri): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin
i166a5(nyi khri): stong pa nyid las gud na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams myed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid myed la/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang / 
i166a6(nyi khri): stong pa nyid do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o// / shes rab// 
i166a7(nyi khri): bam po// // tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
i166a8(nyi khri): tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod do// de ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod kyang spyod do zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// myi spyod kyang myi spyod do zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// spyod kyang spyod la
i166b1(nyi khri): myi spyod dang myi spyod do zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// spyod pa yang mya yin myi spyod pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar yang myi dmyigs so// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dang/ 
i166b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod ces bya bar yang myi dmyigs myi spyod ces bya bar myi dmyigs/ spyod kyang spyod la myi spyod kyang myi spyod do zhes bya bar myi dmyigs
i166b3(nyi khri): spyod pa yang ma yin myi spyod pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar yang myi dmyigs pa yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs
i166b4(nyi khri): pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na'adi ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni dngos po myed pa'i rang bzhin de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shi
i166b5(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod do zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// myi spyod do zhes bya bar yang myi dmyigs so// spyod kyang spyod la myi spyod kyang myi spyod do zhes bya bar yang myi dmyigs so// 
i166b6(nyi khri): spyod pa yang ma yin myi spyod pa yang ma yin no// zhes bya bar yang myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i rang bzhin du khong du chud cing ma blangs pa'i phyir te/ 
i166b7(nyi khri): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzinang chos thams cad skye ba myed pa zhes bya ba ste/ rgya che ba mchog du bya ba tshad myed par nges pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thas
i166b8(nyi khri): cad kyis myi 'phrogs pa ste/ ting nge 'dzinang des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya// 
i167a1(nyi khri): spras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byorang ting nge 'dzin 'di 'ab zhig gos rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
i167a2(nyi khri): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ 'on tam de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzinang gzhan dag kyang yod/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa tI'i bu ting nge 'dzind gzhan la rnam par spyod pas kyang
i167a3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang bar 'gyur ba yod do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ting nge 'dzind
i167a4(nyi khri): gzhan gang dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yin/ rab 'byor kyis
i167a5(nyi khri): spras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzind dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzind des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
i167a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de bzhin du rin can phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// seng ge rnam par
i167a7(nyi khri): rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi na du do// chos thams cad shin du 'phags pa zhes bya
i167a8(nyi khri): ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// spyi sdug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// chos kyi dbyings su nyes pa zhes bya ba'i
i167b1(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzind yod do// nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// / rdo rje lte bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting
i167b2(nyi khri): nge 'dzinang yod do// ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba/ 
i167b3(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzind yod do// yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// nges pa'i tshig la gdon myi za ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// tshig bla dgas pa la gdon myi za bar/ 
i167b4(nyi khri): 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// phyag rgya yongs su 'dzind pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// nyam pa myed pa zhe/ 
i167b5(nyi khri): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// nam mkha' rgyas par 'gyengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// rdo rje'i
i167b6(nyi khri): dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// rgyal mtshan rtse'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dbang po'i dpa' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// rgyu nad kyi rjes su
i167b7(nyi khri): song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// snrel gzhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya
i167b8(nyi khri): ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// gnas la rten pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// sems myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting
i168a1(nyi khri): du 'dus 'a skyed du sa ya du sa gas ba dza 'dzung nga// 'a byung ba zhes bya
i168a2(nyi khri): 'a dang 'dod// kun tu snang ba nas bya ba'i ting de 'dzin yong ngo // dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'azhind yod do// 'od drim byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yang ngo // dga' ba skyed pa zhes
i168a3(nyi khri): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang yod do// glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zad myi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// myi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// brjid
i168a4(nyi khri): yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// myi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang yod do// 'jig pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod
i168a5(nyi khri): nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zla ba dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang yod do// shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// sdang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting rje
i168a6(nyi khri): 'dzin yod do// snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// bya ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rdo rje la bu zhes bya ba'i ting
i168a7(nyi khri): nge 'dzin yod do// sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yong ngo // rin cen mtha' la
i168a8(nyi khri): zhes bya ring nga 'dzi mdang / ma sa pa'i byas rgyazhes bya ba'i stong thaM yang / chos 'angs kyad parnam pa kyis bya pa'i 'tshang 'ang // dga' ba gang bzhes
i168b1(nyi khri): g-i/ sa gnas pa gang bzhes bya nga la zhid 'ad/ garnam pa dang phrul bya zhes ba m-i nga la med ya // daphyogs pa gcang pa zhes bya ba lce 'a
i168b2(nyi khri): do// 'gyur ba myed pa zhes pa phyi ting nge 'dzin yod do// num pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// myong nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yang ngo // gnas myed par spyod pa zhes bya/ 
i168b3(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzind yod do// rab rib myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// g.yo ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// yul la/ 
i168b4(nyi khri): rgal ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// sems myed par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dge 'a
i168b5(nyi khri): kha'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod de
i168b6(nyi khri): chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yan do// yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// nem nur rnam par sel po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// gnas su
i168b7(nyi khri): bya ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gcig tu rnam par bkad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang yang // rnam par mngan par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i tshang nge 'dzin yong ngo // rnam par gcig
i169a1(nyi khri): mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// mngon par dmyigs pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rna ba'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
i169a2(nyi khri): yod do// bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de yod do// zad myi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// gzungs kyi glo gros zhes
i169a3(nyi khri): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yang dag pa dang ldog pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed
i169a4(nyi khri): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// mthun pa dang 'gal ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'od dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya bal
i169a5(nyi khri): dang 'dzin yod do// zla ba dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rgyan chen po dazhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nang pa thams cad du'ang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzid mi
i169b1(nyi khri): nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs srung par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i nga nge 'dzin yod do// gaganas dmyigs su myed pa la brtan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod/ 
i169b2(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems myed par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// gnas dmyigs su myed pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// de bzhin nyid
i169b3(nyi khri): la gnas shing sems myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel bas rab tu 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas
i169b4(nyi khri): nam mkha' lta bur gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu nem mkha' ltar chags myed pas rnam par grol zhing gros pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod do// ting nge 'dzin
i169b5(nyi khri): des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa ga ra dwa ti'i bu de
i169b6(nyi khri): dag ni byang ba sems dang sems dpa 'tshan pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin te/ nga 'ad de dag gi nas par spyod para'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen rnams mi byung du dran rje
i169b7(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngan par rdzogs par 'chang rgyas/ des tshang nge 'dzidzin dang / gzungami ga k+ko gang la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems pa
i169b8(nyi khri): pa mas nga 'o zugs par nga sa pa mas med pa ma nga/ 
i170a1(nyi khri): gyomathus ni dang ldan pa rab khyod kyis yang 'di skad ces smras pa// rtswa dang ldan pagar du rje jug byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'azhid de dag gis nam/ 
i170a2(nyi khri): par spyod pa de ni/ sman gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// da ltar phyogs
i170a3(nyi khri): bcu'i 'jig rten gro khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma skyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa yang dag par rdzogs pa yang da sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'che srung ba/ ji snyed/ 
i170a4(nyi khri): cig bzhugs pa de dag gis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lung bstand te/ des ting nge 'dzind kyang yang dag par rdzog su myi mthong ngo // bdag ni snyoms par zhug
i170a5(nyi khri): so zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind des rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang myed do// bdag ni snyoms par 'jug go// bdag gis mnyam par gzhag par bya'o// bdag ni mnyam par gzhag par gyur to// 
i170a6(nyi khri): zhes rnam sems su 'gyur ba byed de// de la rnam par rtog pa de dag kyang myed cing bya'o// smras pa che dang ldan pa rab 'byung// dring 'azhing 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/ 
i170a7(nyi khri): chen gyi sa bzhin gshegs pa ma pa yang dag pa'i mas sa kyi 'du baban pa 'di das sa sto kyis smra pa'i dang mun pa na nga ba na tha~Mng nga// ngas na
i170a8(nyi khri): ma sa kyi'i ma ga ma pa / byang chub sems sa gan shi
i170b1(nyi khri): dong 'dzid / nga nge 'dzid nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'o// byang chub nyid kyang dang 'dzin te/ smras pa che dang ldan pa rab 'byang dge 'di ya ting de 'dzin kyang gzhan pa
i170b2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med de// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de// chos thams cad kyang mnyam nyid kyi phyir/ ting nge 'dzin
i170b3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na/ de la ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus sam/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de na
i170b4(nyi khri): ma yin no// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga rigs kyi bu de/ ting nge 'dzind de la 'du shes su byed dam pa/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shesu byed pa myed do// 
i170b5(nyi khri): smras pa de ji ltar de la 'du shes su byed par myi 'gyur/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ rtog pa myed pa'i phyir ro// smras pa de ltar rtog pa myed pa yin// rab 'byor kyis smras pa
i170b6(nyi khri): chos thams cad myed pa'i phyir rtog pa myed de ga de ltar ting nge 'dzind de la rtog pa myed de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzind de la rnam par shes pa
i170b7(nyi khri): byed pa myed do// 'du shes su byed pa song do// smras pa che dang ldan paca phyir rnam pa rags par byed cing 'du shes su 'gyur ba myed/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ting nge 'dzin de yang myed la/ 
i170b8(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang sring pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa myed do// 'dugs su 'gyur ba myed de// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis me dang ldan pa rab 'byong la legs/ 
i171a1(nyi khri): btsun byed gang kA 'a' lags pa legs pa so// 'din legs par bgang gi gang ya sa namangs baspyad pa la rnam par snang ba'i ba mdun
i171a2(nyi khri): na na ma ngag du bgang ba/ dus bgad pa 'od yim do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang de la sashes rab kyi ba yod tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// bsam sa
i171a3(nyi khri): gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa
i171a4(nyi khri): la bslab par bya'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dre ba bco brgyad kyi bar la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis bslab par bya'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi/ 
i171a5(nyi khri): de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bslob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gi shes rab kyi
i171a6(nyi khri): pa ro yong tu phyin pa la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis bskyob bo// bsam gtan gi pha ro long tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha ro bang tu phyidang/ 
i171a7(nyi khri): pa dang / rdul khrims kyi pa ro mang tu phyinang pa dang / sbyin pa'i bla la stond pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis bslab gi// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgya
i171a8(nyi khri): gi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis slob bo// bcom ldan 'das bka' stsal pa shwa ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshe
i171b1(nyi khri): de ltar bslab pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis slob pa yin no// 6/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus gi pha rol
i171b2(nyi khri): tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis slob pa yin/ byang // 
i171b3(nyi khri): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis slob pa yin no// shA ri'i bus gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du myi
i171b4(nyi khri): myi dmyigs pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sha ra dwa ti'i bu shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag myi dmyigs so// sems can dang srog dang 'gro ba dang gso ba dang / 
i171b5(nyi khri): skyes bu dang / gang zag dang shed can dang // shed bdag dang // byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang ga mthong ba po myi dmyigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ phung po dang / 
i171b6(nyi khri): skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba myi dmyigs so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug sngal myi dmyigs so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog
i171b7(nyi khri): ba~M dang lam myi dan/ shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'ad pa'i 'ams m+b+hi dmyigs so// yon gyirnam par dag po'i phyir gzugs kyi khams myi dmyigs so// na durnam par dag
i171b8(nyi khri): phyir gzugs myeng pa'i khams du mya dmyigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i pha'i lad tu phyin pa rnams myi dmyigs so// zhon tu rnam par dag pa'i phying byang chub kyi phyogs kyi rnams pa
i172a1(nyi khri): 'dugs pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtanan rnaMs dang / chud myed pa rnams dang gzugs skyed po'o snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam pa'i tha rang pa rnams dang mtha
i172a2(nyi khri): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo nas/ 
i172a3(nyi khri): dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
i172a4(nyi khri): pa rnams myi dmigs so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyu nad tu zhugs pa myi dmyigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / 
i172a5(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas myi dmyigs so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' myi dmyigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' myi dmyigs so// shin du rnam par
i172a6(nyi khri): dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas myi dmyig ma myi dmyigs so// gsold pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang
i172a7(nyi khri): myi 'gag pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang ka dmyigs pa myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa de ni rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/ 
i172a8(nyi khri): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis slob pa yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems
i172b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad gang dang gang la slob pa lags pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su 'ang pa / sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar bslob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa'
i172b2(nyi khri): chen po ni chos gang la yang bslab pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bos ni khur mngon par bya ba de lta bu rnam par yod pa ma yin no// gsolang pa
i172b3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'o na chos 'di dag rnam pa gang gis mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa gang ji ltar myed pa ji ltar yod pa de/ de ltar yod pa ma yin pas de'i// 
i172b4(nyi khri): phyir myed ces bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mchis pa ma lags pa de la ma mchis pa zhes bgyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa ga ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs nang
i172b5(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gi phyir yod pa ma yin no// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
i172b6(nyi khri): nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// 
i172b7(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar kyi phyir yod pa ma yon no// de la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams myed pa
i172b8(nyi khri): la mngon par zhen pa myed pas pa/ sred pa la mngon pa de dag gis myeng pas yong su rtags pas/ myed pa la mngon par zhen cing 'di la ste chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' gnyis la chags/ 
i173a1(nyi khri): sa // myed pa sa dud yangasas bdags sdug cung dang gzugs las pa dang ba dag dra ba ba gnas rnasas sun
i173a2(nyi khri): zhen cing sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mngon pare zhen to// de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas/ yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yongs su rtog sre/ de dag myi shes myi mthong ngo // 
i173a3(nyi khri): ci myi shes myi mthong zhe na/ gzugs myi shes myi mthong zhe na/ gzugs myi shes myi mthong ngo // tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa myi mthong ngo // skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing
i173a4(nyi khri): 'brel par 'byung ba myi shes myi mthong ngo // byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun myi shes mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du myi shes myi mthong ngo // de ltar de dag gi byis pa
i173a5(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i drangs su 'dong ba ste/ de dag kyang 'byung ba ma yin no// gang nas 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs kyi khams 'anas 'byung ba ma yin no// 
i173a6(nyi khri): gzugs myed pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa nas 'byung ba ma yin no// de dag ni yid myi ches pa ste/ ji ltar yid myi ches zhe na/ gzugs gzugs
i173a7(nyi khri): kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// de dag ni sems ma yin pa ste/ ji ltar gnas ma yin zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
i173a8(nyi khri): phyi nad pa la gnas pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad dang bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / 
i173b1(nyi khri): na ma ma/ ji mang mngon par na// gzugs la mngon pa zhon pa yin zhen/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam pa gres pa la mngon par zhen pa yin// myig la madro/ 
i173b2(nyi khri): par zhen pa yin// rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'dod chag
i173b3(nyi khri): dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug la mngon par zhen pa yin// lta bar gyur pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ byang chub kyi lam la mngon par zhen pa ti// de'i phyir na byis pa zhes bya'o// gsol pa
i173b4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ltar bslob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi slob cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du myi 'byung ba lags sam
i173b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
i173b6(nyi khri): pa nyid du myi 'byung ba yin no// gsold pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir slad du byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi slob pa lags rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
i173b7(nyi khri): myi 'byung ba lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' suyang ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs myi khas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa
i174a1(nyi khri): kha dgas gang mngon par byen/ bsam gtan ga pa ni lang du na pa dang ma/ badzin 'grus kyi pa'i yang tu phyin pa dang brjod pa'i pha seb tu phyind pa dang ga chung
i174a2(nyi khri): kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha ro lang tu phyind pa la brtags gang mngon par zhen/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba nas
i174a3(nyi khri): dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 
i174a4(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par tha dad pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gan
i174a5(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms pa 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smod pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs gi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs/ 
i174a6(nyi khri): pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rnam pa thams cad
i174a7(nyi khri): mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar la brtags shing mngon par zhen pas/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi slob
i174a8(nyi khri): pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du myi 'byung ba yin no// gsol dpe bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolod/ 
i174b1(nyi khri): tu phyind pa la rnam par gang gis slob par 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar bslab na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni shar dwa
i174b2(nyi khri): ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la de ltar bslob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'byung ba yin no// 
i174b3(nyi khri): bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha ro// 
i174b4(nyi khri): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa de myi dmyigs shing / yang dag pa ra spong ba myi mthong rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas cad
i174b5(nyi khri): mkhyend pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni myi
i174b6(nyi khri): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // ka sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa spyod pa dang
i174b7(nyi khri): de ltar shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la slob pa ni myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
i174b8(nyi khri): gos rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs ma'i tshul dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
i175a1(nyi khri): tshul gas ma pa 'as pa ma 'ad panyid du byung ba sdus par bya// / shes rab kyi pha maladu tu na pa stong drug brgya ba
i175a2(nyi khri): le'u drug pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis blan ma ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dra zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
i175a3(nyi khri): tham bsrabyas shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur yi rnam pa rnams car mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur rom/ zhes mchin / bcom ldan 'a
i175a4(nyi khri): de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzla/ 
i175a5(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram
i175a6(nyi khri): sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram te/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
i175a7(nyi khri): 'dris pa rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi ni/ bcom ldan
i175a8(nyi khri): 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyibacom ldan 'das bka' stsa lad pa nga/ rab 'byor de de lta bas na khyod nyid la dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar bzod
i175b1(nyi khri): pa de ltar lung stond cig/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyang gzhan la sgyu mi yang gzhan zhig snyam 'am/ tshor ba dang 'du shes 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa 'ang
i175b2(nyi khri): gzhan la sgyu ma 'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsolang ba bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems
i175b3(nyi khri): myig kyang gzhan la sgyu ma 'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am dza/ gzugs kyang gzhan la sgyu ma
i175b4(nyi khri): yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'amasgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang ka chos kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ myig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan
i175b5(nyi khri): zhig yin snyam 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i 'dus rnam par shes pa dang gi lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan
i175b6(nyi khri): la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ myig gi 'dus te reg par yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhin zhig yon snyam 'am/ na nga'i 'dus te reg pa dang ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang // srong
i175b7(nyi khri): sa pa dang / 'dus sa pa dang / kyi yang seMman/ na / sa zhi 'dus pa ga ban kyis ba yang ga sgyu
i175b8(nyi khri): gi yin sum 'am/ da ba'i 'dus dag pa'i byad kyis tshor ba rjidag su'i 'dus te sa drung rnyan kyigatshor ba dang ma'i 'dus cig pa nga kyis sor ba dang / lus kyi
i176a1(nyi khri): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / yod kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lagaso// 
i176a2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa'o// rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa
i176a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags bka' stsalang pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang gzhan la
i176a4(nyi khri): sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsold pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyang gzhan/ 
i176a5(nyi khri): la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de la ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te
i176a6(nyi khri): gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so// bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang // rnam par shes pa yang ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par
i176a7(nyi khri): shes pa nyid kyang skye ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das myig kyang gzhan ma legs ka sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ myig nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang myig go// bco
i176a8(nyi khri): no 'das rna ba dang / sde dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma dang yang gzhan ma lags ting / yid nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang yid do// bcom ldan 'das gzugs
i176b1(nyi khri): kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so// bcom ldan 'das sna dang dri dang ro dang reg dang / chos kyang gzhan mA lag+na
i176b2(nyi khri): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chos nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang chos so// bcom ldan 'das myig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags / sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ myig gi
i176b3(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang myig gi rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang ka lus
i176b4(nyi khri): kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma legs te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// 
i176b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang myig gi gi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'ad
i176b6(nyi khri): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te rig pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te
i176b7(nyi khri): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma yid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang mnyan ma lags kasgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags
i176b8(nyi khri): te/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma bya sgyu ma nyid kyang myig kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba dang / 
i177a1(nyi khri): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / khre'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis no pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis/ 
i177a2(nyi khri): tshor ba yang ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das
i177a3(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags te/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid kyang skye ma sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams/ 
i177a4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang ma lags te / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgya
i177a5(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi bar yang ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ byang chub nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub bo// bcom ldan
i177a6(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa yod dam gsold pa bcom ldan 'das de ni mi mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
i177a7(nyi khri): stsa la pa// rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems gang la skye ba myed cing 'gag pa myed pa dang / sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de
i177a8(nyi khri): nam yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang pa// rab 'byor de ni ma lags so/ gang la skye ba myed cing 'gag pa myed pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba
i177b1(nyi khri): myang pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par 'gyur ram kyo rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa du 'byung bar 'gyur ram rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid theb par 'gyur ram

i177b3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya bar 'du shes dang / brda dang bdag pa dang / tha snyad du bya ba yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de lha ma
i177b4(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems te/ 'du shes dang / brda dang gdags pa dang / tha snyad tsam gi nye bar le nad pa'i phung po lnga skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am/ kun
i177b5(nyi khri): nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar yang dmyigs par 'gyur bar 'gyur ram/ gas lod pa bcom ldan 'das de ni myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bka' stsal pa rab 'byor
i177b6(nyi khri): de ji snyam du sems/ gang la 'du shes myed cing brda ba myed pa dang / gdags pa myed pa dang tha snyad myed pa dang / mying dang mying myed pa dang / mying du gdags pa myed pa dang / lus myed
i177b7(nyi khri): pa dang lus kyi las myed pa dang / ngag skyed pa dang / ngag gi las skyed pa dang / ying med pa dang yid kyi las skyed pa dang ga skye bskyed pa dang / 'gag pa dang / kun nas nyon myongs pa
i177b8(nyi khri): pa dang / rnam par byeng ba med pa zhes 'dri sgo ma ba tu phying du pa gsub ma shing ma nas pa thams par ma byid pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ras ni rnam pa thamasas pa nyid du bcing chob
i178a1(nyi khri): rim/ gsalang pa bcom ldan 'das don gyi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dang// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi bar/ 
i178a2(nyi khri): tu phyind pa la bslabs shing myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar na
i178a3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslabs pa ltar/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslabs par
i178a4(nyi khri): bgyi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ste/ phung po lnga po de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba sha stag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 
i178a5(nyi khri): de ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la bslabs shing // rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das dan
i178a6(nyi khri): myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar phung lnga po rnams ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmyigasu ma mchis so// 
i178a7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems te/ rmyi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
i178a8(nyi khri): pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol po bcom ldan de ni myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rmyi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te
i178b1(nyi khri): dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmyigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lod pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems sgyu ma lta bu dang // sgra brnyan lta bu dang
i178b2(nyi khri): myig yor lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang smig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lta po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid
i178b3(nyi khri): du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsold pa bcom ldan 'das de ni myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sgyu ma'i skyes bu dngos pa'i rang bzhin/ sgra brnyan ni
i178b4(nyi khri): dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin myig yor ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin chu zla ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin smig rgyu ni dngos po ma mchismra ba'i rang bzhin
i178b5(nyi khri): sprul pa ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin ni dmyigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de de ni 'di
i178b6(nyi khri): ltar gzugs ni rmi lam lta bu/ tshor ba ni myi lam lta bu// 'du shes ni rmyi lam lta bu 'du byed ni rmi lam lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rmyi lam lta bu ste rnam par shes pa gang
i178b7(nyi khri): yan pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// rab 'byorang gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu'o// tsher ba dang ka 'du shes dang 'du byed dang // rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ rnam par
i178b8(nyi khri): shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// rab 'byord gzugs ni sgra brnyan lta bu tshor ba dang rta/ 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgra brnyan lta bu ste/ 
i179a1(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// rab 'byor du gzugs ni myig yor lta bu// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ 
i179a2(nyi khri): myig yor lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// rab 'byorang gzugs ni chu bzla lta bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par
i179a3(nyi khri): shes pa ni chu zla lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// rab 'byor gzugs ni smig rgyu lta bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam
i179a4(nyi khri): par shes pa ni smig rgyu lta bu ste// rnam par shes pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// rab 'byor gzugs ni sprul pa lta bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
i179a5(nyi khri): ni sprul pa lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar kyi phyir myi dmyig so// 
i179a6(nyi khri): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de la ma lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas bstand pa 'di thos nas 'jigs shing / snang ba dang / 
i179a7(nyi khri): skrag par myi 'gyur legs grang gra bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa / rab 'byor da ga khyate byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa yang yin la/ shes
i179a8(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la thabs kyang myi mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gi lag du'ang myi 'ongs na// 'jigs shing sdang ba dang / skrag par yang 'gyur ro// gsold pa bcom
i179b1(nyi khri): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstand pa 'di thos na myi 'jigs myi sdang myi skrag par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa 'di dag lags bcom ldan
i179b2(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' sA la pa ka rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe myerje rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sos
i179b3(nyi khri): kyis gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste de myi dmyigs so// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da de ni byang chub seMs
i179b4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
i179b5(nyi khri): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste de myi dmyigs so// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes/ 
i179b6(nyi khri): bya bar rtog ste de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs bdag myed ces bya bar rtog ste/ de myi dmyigs so// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / 
i179b7(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog ste/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste de myi dmyigs so// tshor ba
i179b8(nyi khri): dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de myi dmyigs
i180a1(nyi khri): nor pa dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar rtog ste ka de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzug
i180a2(nyi khri): mtshan ma myed ces bya bar tig ste de myi dmyigs so// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar rtog ste de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad
i180a3(nyi khri): mkhyend dang ldan pa'i sems myi kyis gzugs smon pa myed ces bya bar rtog ste de myi dmyigs so// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa myed ces bya bar rtog ste
i180a4(nyi khri): de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mngon par 'du bya bar rtog ste de myi dmyigs so// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam
i180a5(nyi khri): par shes pa mngon par 'du bya bar myed ces bya bar rtog ste de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend cad pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs dben zhes bya bar rtog ste de myi dmyigs// 
i180a6(nyi khri): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar rtog ste ka de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
i180a7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa la thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor nga grazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
i180a8(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs myi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de myi dmyigaso// 'i/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid deng ldan pa'i
i180b1(nyi khri): yod sa bye smra/ tshor ba dang 'dug sa dang 'du byang dang / rnam pa dgas pa mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byung / da myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dadu ldan pacwa ma
i180b2(nyi khri): la bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de de myi dmyigs so// tshor po 'du shes 'du byed dang // rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de de myi dmyigs
i180b3(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas// gzugs bdag myed ces rnam par rtog par byed de de myi dmyigs so// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / 
i180b4(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa bdag myed pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas // gzugs zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ 
i180b5(nyi khri): de myi dmyigs so// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / du rnam par shes pa zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
i180b6(nyi khri): pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de
i180b7(nyi khri): de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de myi dmyigs so// tshor ba dang 'du shes
i180b8(nyi khri): dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan mo myed pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs
i181a1(nyi khri): smond pa myed pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de myi dmyigs so// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa smond pa myed pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de myi
i181a2(nyi khri): dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed do de myi dmyigs so// tshor ba dang 'du shes
i181a3(nyi khri): dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
i181a4(nyi khri): gzugs dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de myi dmyigs so// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba rnam par rtogs par byed de de myi dmyigs
i181a5(nyi khri): rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
i181a6(nyi khri): de ltar rtog pa 'di snyam du sems te ga/ sems can thams cad la myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston to// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par
i181a7(nyi khri): shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stonang // gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang // bdag myed pa dang / zhi ba dang stong pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed
i181a8(nyi khri): mngon par 'du bya ba myong ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stonod to// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / 
i181b1(nyi khri): bdag myed pa dang / zhi ba dang stong pa dang // mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa 'du bya ba myed pa dang / dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gas
i181b2(nyi khri): chos stond to snyam mo// rab 'byor da 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi 'jigs
i181b3(nyi khri): myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur ro// rdo// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid
i181b4(nyi khri): la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ gzugs gang gi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed de/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang
i181b5(nyi khri): myi ldan pas tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa myi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed de/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
i181b6(nyi khri): kyi yid la bya ba dang / myi ldan pas gzugs gang sdug bsngal ba dang bdag myed pa dnga'i zhi ba dang stong pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya
i181b7(nyi khri): ba myed pa dang / dben pa'o rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i chul gis yid la byed do// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang
i181b8(nyi khri): bdag myed pa dang zhi ba dang stong pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par shes par yod la byed pa de myi
i182a1(nyi khri): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis srid la byed do// rab 'byor 'dilta ste ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshu la khrims kyi pha ma rang tu phyin pa rnams pa myong ba ste/ 
i182a2(nyi khri): de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi 'jigs myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
i182a3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe / chos de dag la myi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag myed pa'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang
i182a4(nyi khri): mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa dang ka dbyen pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa dang rta bzod pa dang / mos pa de ni
i182a5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha ra lad tu phyind pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur
i182a6(nyi khri): rab 'byorarang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha ro ltad tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'od dang ldan pa'i
i182a7(nyi khri): yid lo bya zasagazugs myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rab tu rnyog go// tshor ba dang 'dugs dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces
i182a8(nyi khri): bya bar de dmyigs pa'i tshul gas rab tu dag go/ gzugs pa snre la zhes bya ba dang // bdag myed ces bya bi dang / zh-i zhes bya ba dang / song nas bye ba da
i182b1(nyi khri): mtshan ma myang ces bya ba dang / smanang pa myang ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa dang rlaben zhes bya ba de dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rab tu rtog go// tshor ba dang / 
i182b2(nyi khri): 'du shes dang 'du byed dang na rnam par dges pa myi tog ces bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / ta bdag myod ces bya ba dang / zhe zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / 
i182b3(nyi khri): mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya ba da mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba dang ka da na zhes bya ba de dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rab tu rtog ga
i182b4(nyi khri): de ltar de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan bI'i yid la bya bas myi rting zhing bairtson 'do pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i 'grus kyi
i182b5(nyi khri): pha rold tu phyind pa ste / de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byord gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
i182b6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tsheste/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / 
i182b7(nyi khri): bdag myed pa dang ga zhi bla dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang smond pa myed ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba dang / 
i182b8(nyi khri): dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rtog cing nyan thos dang gi rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba'i chos de ma yin pa byang chub gi bgyeg/ 
i183a1(nyi khri): 'gyur ba gzhan rigs go sgo 'byung ba dang na tshor ba dang 'i nas dang 'dri byed dang / rnam pa shes pa m+b+hi ga zla ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba da
i183a2(nyi khri): bdag myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang / smanod pa myed ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed nas bya ba dang
i183a3(nyi khri): dben zhes bya ba dang de dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba ma yin pa byang chub kyi dgyegs su 'gyur// gzhan
i183a4(nyi khri): gi go myi 'byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa ste de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dmyigs pa'i
i183a5(nyi khri): tshul gas myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur ro// / shes rab bam po// // rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind
i183a6(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya byas rnam pa thams cad 'di ltar rab tu rtag ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ 
i183a7(nyi khri): gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ma yin ga/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes
i183a8(nyi khri): pa'o// myig stong pa nyid ni myig snang pa nyid ma yin gi/ myig nyid kyang stong ba nyid stong pa nyid kyang myig go sharna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyang stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa mya
i183b1(nyi khri): yin go yod kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gi gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra dang hrI/ 
i183b2(nyi khri): dang ro dang reg dang chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos stong pa nyid ma yin gyi/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid dog stong pa nyid kyang chos so// shAmyig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis// myig gi
i183b3(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang myig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa
i183b4(nyi khri): dang lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ma yin gi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong
i183b5(nyi khri): pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyis// myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ma yin gi/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sto
i183b6(nyi khri): ba nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus
i183b7(nyi khri): te reg pa stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa ma yin gi / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus teg pa'o// myig gi 'dus te
i183b8(nyi khri): rig pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gi/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 
i184a1(nyi khri): ge stong pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus kyi rig pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg par shes pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / lu'i 'dus
i184a2(nyi khri): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyu nad kyis cho
i184a3(nyi khri): ba ma yin gi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i stong pa nyid kyis
i184a4(nyi khri): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa ma yin pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar kyi stong pa nyid kyis
i184a5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa ma yin gi/ sangs rgyas kyi mi 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// chos nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub
i184a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ rab 'byor 'do ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas
i184a7(nyi khri): pa'o// thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind ni bstan pa 'di thos ni myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag pa myi 'gyur ro// 
i184a8(nyi khri): dbye 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gis yongasu zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bstan pa
i184b1(nyi khri): 'di thos nas// myi 'jigs myi sdug skrag par mya 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bkon gnyen de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba
i184b2(nyi khri): bshes nyen ni gang de la gzugs myo rtag ces bya bar de dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
i184b3(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
i184b4(nyi khri): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug ste/ rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
i184b5(nyi khri): chen po'i dge ba'i gshen nyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i gshes nyen ni gang de la gzugs sdug sngal zhes bya bar de dmyigs pa'i
i184b6(nyi khri): tshul gis chos stond pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / gzugs myed ces bya
i184b7(nyi khri): bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya bar de dmyigs pa'i chos stond pa dang / gzugs zhi zhes
i184b8(nyi khri): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / 
i185a1(nyi khri): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / gzugs mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyig

i185a3(nyi khri): ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang ka rnam par shes pa smand pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa
i185a4(nyi khri): gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba de dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs

i185a6(nyi khri): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor myi 'jug pa ste/

i185a8(nyi khri): gang de la myig myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / na ba dang sna dang khre dang lus dang / yid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i chos stond pa dang kamyig sdug/ 
i185b1(nyi khri): zhes bya ba myi dmugs pa 'dul bas ldan pa dang na pa dang ska dang sa dang lus dang / gang sdug bsal zhes bya bar dbya gas pa'i sul gam chos sand pa nga/ rdzus pa
i185b2(nyi khri): byed ces bya bar da dmyigs pa'i tshus gos chos garing ba dang / rna ba dang sgra dang khwa dang lus dang / yang bdag srid ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i mul gas chos gnang pa dang / myig gi zhes bya ba/ 
i185b3(nyi khri): de myi dmyigs pa'o tshul gis chos stond pa dang / rna ba dang sA dang khre dang lus dang / yid zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / myig stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pang
i185b4(nyi khri): chos stond pa dang / rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / myig mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gris
i185b5(nyi khri): chos stond pa dang / rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / myig mtshan ma myed ces bya ba deng dmyigs pa'i tshul
i185b6(nyi khri): gos chos stond pa dang karna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stonod pa dang / myig mngon par 'du bye ba myed ces bya bar de myi
i185b7(nyi khri): dmyigs pa'i tshul gris chos stonang pa dang / rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / myig dben zhes
i185b8(nyi khri): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gris chos stond pa dang / rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang ga yid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i chu lu gis chos stonod pa dngang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de
i186a1(nyi khri): dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
i186a2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpalan pa'i dge ba'i bshin nyan ni gang de la gzugs mye tog ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
i186a3(nyi khri): nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor myi 'jug pa dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang / chos myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston
i186a4(nyi khri): pa dang / dge ba'i thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de
i186a5(nyi khri): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stonang pa dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang / chos sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / gzugs bdag myed ces bya ba
i186a6(nyi khri): myu myigs pa'i tshum ga pa padang / nga nga ga sa sa kyi sa stan rdzogs pa gis chos da pa dang / drug pa
i186a7(nyi khri): da'i dusagos rdul gis rgyas snanang pa dang / sA dang dri dang da ga nga / rgyas kyi m+b+ha ba rjid myi dmyigs pa'i du gas rnaMs sod pa dang / gzugs snang sa ts+tsha na
i186a8(nyi khri): ston pa dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang / chos stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stonod pa dang / gzugs mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos
i186b1(nyi khri): smond pa dang / skra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang / chos mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i rdul gis chos stonod pa dang / gzugs smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
i186b2(nyi khri): gis chos sonod pa dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang / chos skonang pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos sonod pa dang gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dbyis/ 
i186b3(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gris chos stond pa dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang / chos mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang // gzugs dben zhes bya bar de myi
i186b4(nyi khri): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang chos dben zhes dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stonang pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
i186b5(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
i186b6(nyi khri): po'i dge ba'i gshes nyon ni gang de la myig gi rnam pa shes pa myi rtag ces bya ba de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gos chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
i186b7(nyi khri): sa dgas par can rdzas kyis 'ab rang sangs rgyas kyis mang su stor ste 'dug pa dang / nA ba'i rnam par gas pa dang sna'i rnam padags pa dang ga slo'i rnam pa gas pa dang / 
i186b8(nyi khri): kyirnam pa shes pa dang / maud kyi rnam pa gyes pa mye rtag ces bya bar myi dbyigs pa'i tshug gis chos pan pa dge 'dzim ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
i187a1(nyi khri): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// myig gi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i chos
i187a2(nyi khri): gis chos sonod pa dang garna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sA'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang yod kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya
i187a3(nyi khri): bar myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces par de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stonod pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang // 
i187a4(nyi khri): sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / 
i187a5(nyi khri): myig gi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stonod pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam
i187a6(nyi khri): par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa
i187a7(nyi khri): dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang tu lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa
i187a8(nyi khri): tshul gis chos stonod pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stend pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang
i187b1(nyi khri): lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar do myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gos chos stonod pa dang ka myig gi rnam par shes pa smon/ 
i187b2(nyi khri): pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / khre'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi
i187b3(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston
i187b4(nyi khri): pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
i187b5(nyi khri): nus nas chos po da pa dang / byeg gnas pa gas pa dben zhes bya ba dang myi dmyigs pa'i rdul gso sonod pa dang / rna pa'i rnam brnyanas pa dang / sA'o rnam par gos pa dang / sgo'i rnam po
i187b6(nyi khri): pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stonod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan
i187b7(nyi khri): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor nga 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes nyen ni gang de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa
i187b8(nyi khri): myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing tu dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
i187b9(nyi khri): ra'anor bzhin yang nga sems dpa'i sems dpan chenang po dag
i188a1(nyi khri): sang yongs pas skye lagru dang / rna pa'i 'du rig pa dang / snad 'dus te dag pa dang / wa'i 'dus tu rnag pa dang rna lus kyi 'dus te nges pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te dag pa/ 
i188a2(nyi khri): rtag ces bya bar de myi dbyings pa'i tshul gis chos sonod cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mo
i188a3(nyi khri): 'jug pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stonod pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang
i188a4(nyi khri): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stonod pa da ka myig gi 'dus te reg pa bdag myed ces bya bar myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
i188a5(nyi khri): gis chos stond pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus te reg pa reg pa dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs
i188a6(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gis chos stonod pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nod pa dang klan ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / snga'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te
i188a7(nyi khri): reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs pa'i
i188a8(nyi khri): tshul gis chos gnod pa dang phra na ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / bu'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de myi
i188b1(nyi khri): jugasas nas sto pa dang / smon pa'adus ga pa sta nA pa smad dus rmugs pa dus gas nas smras pa / na pa 'dus tu ga du dang / sngams
i188b2(nyi khri): po da sgo'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te rig pa dang / yid kyi 'dus kyi reg pa mdzan mi myang ces bya bar dri myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rgyas mnang pa dang namyig gi 'dus te ga
i188b3(nyi khri): smod pa myed ces bya bar dmyi dmigs pa'i rdul gas chos stonang pa dang kun pa'i 'dus te rig pa dang / sna'i 'dus te rig pa dang / khro'i 'dus rje theg pa dang gi lus kyi 'dus te rlag pa
i188b4(nyi khri): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/
