i188b6(nyi khri): bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stond pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg
i188b7(nyi khri): pa dang lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus te reg pa reg pa dang // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
i188b8(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rdzogs pa nyan thos kyi sa 'amag rang sangs rgyas kyi ser yongasu bsun myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
i189a1(nyi khri): chen po lho dge ba'i bshes nyen gang de la/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i byung ba'i tshor ba myo rtag ces bya bar myi dmyigs pa'i mul gas chos stond nang // dge ba'i ba thams cad kyang
i189a2(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus
i189a3(nyi khri): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i las byung ba'i rkyen kyis
i189a4(nyi khri): tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
i189a5(nyi khri): rgyas kyi sar yongasu myi 'jug go// myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung
i189a6(nyi khri): ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang kau/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi reg pa las
i189a7(nyi khri): byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigasla pa'i tshul gis chos ston pa dang myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis
i189a8(nyi khri): chos stond pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg par los byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sI'i 'das te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang ka lce'i 'dus te rog pa las byung ba'i tshor baM dang / lus kyi 'dus
i189b1(nyi khri): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg par shes las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gris chos stond pa dang / myig gi gi 'dus te reg
i189b2(nyi khri): ba las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 
i189b3(nyi khri): lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gi
i189b4(nyi khri): chos stond pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /

i189b6(nyi khri): bu'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar dri myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos sond pa dang ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul/ gas chos
i189b7(nyi khri): stond pa dang / na ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus
i189b8(nyi khri): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung po'i tshor ba mtshan mi myed ces bya myi dmyigs pa'i chos gis chos sonond pa dang / myig gi 'dus te
i190a1(nyi khri): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos smond pa dang na rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las/ 
i190a2(nyi khri): byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa myed ces bya ba
i190a3(nyi khri): da myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / rna ba'i
i190a4(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshong ba dang / lce'i 'dus te rog pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid
i190a5(nyi khri): kyi 'dus te reg pa lngas byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de
i190a6(nyi khri): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stonod pa dang ga na ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te rag pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 
i190a7(nyi khri): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshul ba dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba
i190a8(nyi khri): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyis khyim rla sangs rgyas kyo sar yongasu sngor myo 'jug pa'o// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub
i190b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' dzin pos dag pa'i bags gnyen na gang de lta byang chub kyi ts+tsha smra rnams kyi byar du / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stonod pa dang // sug bsngal zhes bya ba dang
i190b2(nyi khri): bdag myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / song zhes bya ba dang mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang ka smon pa myed ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba dang gi dben zhes bya bar de
i190b3(nyi khri): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
i190b4(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am ka rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnaMs kyi bar du myi rtag ces bya bar de
i190b5(nyi khri): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed
i190b6(nyi khri): ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa sgom pa'i phyir/ de myi dmyigs
i190b7(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gis chos stond pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar du sgom pa'i phyir/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos gnod pa dang / byang chub kyi bdu sgom pa'i phyir de myi
i190b8(nyi khri): dmyigs pa'i tshul gas chos gnod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi ser yongasu bsngod myi
i191a1(nyi khri): 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes nyen du shes par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes nyen des yongasu zin pa'i byang chub seMs dpa'
i191a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di thos na myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byord kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs
i191a3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bstand pa 'di thos na 'jigs shing sdang la skrag par myi 'gyur zhing thabs myi mkhas te/ sdig
i191a4(nyi khri): pa'i grogs po'i sug par ltung zhing dge ba'i bshes nyin gis yongasu spangs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa// rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
i191a5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom zhing dmyigs te/ shes rab kyi
i191a6(nyi khri): pha rold tu phyind pa des rlom semasu byed pa dang / bsam gten gi pha rold tu phyind pa sgom zhing dmyigs te/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa des rlom sem su byed pa dang / brtson
i191a7(nyi khri): 'grus gi pha rold tu phyind pa sgom zhing dmyigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa des rlom sem su byed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa sgo zhing dmyigs te
i191a8(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa des rlom semasu byed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom zhing dmyigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa des rlom semasu byed pa dang / sbyin
i191b1(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sgom zhing dmyigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa des rlom su byed pa de lta bu ni/ rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
i191b2(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
i191b3(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ gzugs po myed pa'i
i191b4(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ 
i191b5(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmyigs/ phyi stong pa
i191b6(nyi khri): nyid de yang dmyigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmyigs lag stong pa nyid de dag kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// myig nang stong pa zhes bya
i191b7(nyi khri): bar yid la byed de/ phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ myig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ myig dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus
i191b8(nyi khri): dang yid nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed// yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byedayid dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed
i192a1(nyi khri): tsang dmyigs pa'i tshul gos nang stong pa 'dri de yang dmyigs / phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmyigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmyigs// dngos pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dam
i192a2(nyi khri): la stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom semasu byed do// gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzug
i192a3(nyi khri): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed do// sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang / chos nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ chos phyi nang
i192a4(nyi khri): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmyigs/ phyi
i192a5(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid de yang dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmyigs la stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// myig gi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid
i192a6(nyi khri): la byed pa/ myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ myig gi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ myig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
i192a7(nyi khri): bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi
i192a8(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes
i192b1(nyi khri): bya bar yid la byed cing dbyings pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmyigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmyigs/ stong pa nyid de dag
i192b2(nyi khri): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed dang/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po myed
i192b3(nyi khri): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sI'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nang stong
i192b4(nyi khri): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la bye dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po myed pa'i ngog
i192b5(nyi khri): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmyigs pa'i tshul kas nang stong pa nyid de yang dmyigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmyigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmyigs pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo/ 
i192b6(nyi khri): nyid stong pa nyid par de yang dmigs la stong pa nyid de dag kyang rlom sems su byed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ myig gi 'dus te reg par
i192b7(nyi khri): rkye nad kyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid lnga/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba phyi nang stong po zhes bya bar yid la byed/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dngos po mye de pa'i ngo botad
i192b8(nyi khri): stong par zhes bya bar yid la byed // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
i193a1(nyi khri): ka rkye nad kyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor nang song ba zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
i193a2(nyi khri): byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed dmyigs pa'i tshul gri
i193a3(nyi khri): nang stong pa zhes de yang dmyigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmyigs phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmyigs dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmyigs ka stong pa nyid kyi
i193a4(nyi khri): de dag kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// sa'i khams nang stong po nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed
i193a5(nyi khri): sa'i khams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khris
i193a6(nyi khri): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig po nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed// ma rig pa phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa dngos po
i193a7(nyi khri): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang // reg pa dang nor ba dang / srod pa dang len pa dang
i193a8(nyi khri): srid pa dang skye ba dang / rga shi nang stong po zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rga gI phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ na shi phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba
i193b1(nyi khri): nyid kyi bar zhes bya ban yid la byed cing / dmyigs pa'i tshul gas nang stong pa nyid de yang dmyigs// phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmyigs/ phyi nang song ba nyid de yang dmyigs kyi dngos po myed pa'i ngo
i193b2(nyi khri): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la de dmigs la ma stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom semasu byed do// / rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
i193b3(nyi khri): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom ste dmyigs pa'i tshul gas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de
i193b4(nyi khri): dag kyang dmyigs la / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag gas kyang rlom sems su byed do// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub
i193b5(nyi khri): kyi yan lag rnams dang // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang ka 'phags pa'i bden phra ba rnams dang go masam gtan rnams dang / chad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms/ 
i193b6(nyi khri): par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par tha dad pa brgyad dang the mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i smos par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang mngon par shes
i193b7(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / ting rdo r+Ni DA rnams dang / gzungs gi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / myi 'jigs pa'i bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang
i193b8(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ sangs rgyas gi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gis kyang / 
i194a1(nyi khri): rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar thabs myi mkhas pas ni/ 
i194a2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di bstan pa 'di thos na 'jigs shing sdang la skrag par 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs
i194a3(nyi khri): pos yongasu zin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di thos na 'jigs shing sdang la skrag par 'gyur zhing ga sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par ltung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
i194a4(nyi khri): po rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa mos par byed cing zlog par byed de/ bsam gtan gi pha rold tu
i194a5(nyi khri): phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa mos pa myed cing
i194a6(nyi khri): zlog par byed pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa yin te/ 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin kyis 'di la slab par bya ba myi cha'o// mdo'o sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste/ 
i194a7(nyi khri): 'di dgra ni mnyan par myi bya'o// bzung bar myi bya'o// bcang bar myi bya'o// klog par myi bya'o// kun chub par myi bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la myi bya'o// 'di dag ni gzhan la bstan par myi bya'o zhes zer
i194a8(nyi khri): ba 'di ni rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o sdig pa'i grogs po
i194b1(nyi khri): ni 'di ltar bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas / pha rol tu phyind pa drug las zlog cing mos pa myed par byed de/ 
i194b2(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya// bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyi nad pa bsgoms pas ci zhig bya// brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa bsgoms
i194b3(nyi khri): pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pas khyod la ci zhig bya / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsgoms
i194b4(nyi khri): pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba 'ong ngo zhes bdud kyi las myi ston / bdud kyi nyes pa myi stonod pa 'di ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' bo'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// 
i194b5(nyi khri): rab 'byor de gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyind te/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo' dang / dbyangs kyis snyad
i194b6(nyi khri): pa dang lung bstand pa dang / tshagasu bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng bzhi dang 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shi nad tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang
i194b7(nyi khri): rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab par bstand pa dag stond to// 'grel to rnam par 'byed do// gsal bar byed do// yong su bdud kyi las rnam par 'di lta bu dag myi smra/ myi stond pa
i194b8(nyi khri): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa'
i195a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i drung du byond te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub kyi sems kyang chung zad kyang myed/ khyod ni phyir myi ldog pa yang ma yin / khyod kyis ni
i195a2(nyi khri): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang myi nus so// zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag myi smra myi stond pa ni/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sos
i195a3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byorang gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas gi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs
i195a4(nyi khri): kyi bu myig ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba dang sna dang lce dang / lus dang yid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg dang / 
i195a5(nyi khri): chos ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // myig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus
i195a6(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis song ngo // na ba'i 'dus te rag pa ni bdag dang / sna dus
i195a7(nyi khri): tu reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te rag pa ba dag gis bdag gis stong ngo // myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag ni/ 
i195a8(nyi khri): stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / lho'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshe
i195b1(nyi khri): ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyend kyis tshar ba ni bdag gam bdag gas skad du// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa na bdag gam bdag gas stong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
i195b2(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong
i195b3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos m+b+ha 'dres pa'i bAr du ni bdag gam stong ngo // bla na myed po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te / yang ci zhog
i195b4(nyi khri): bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi lamaM dag myi smi myi stond pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// Ta rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig
i195b5(nyi khri): can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyi nad te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shar phyogasu ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dpe 9/ byang chub
i195b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba myed do// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang yod do// nyan thos zhes bya ba yang myed do// lho dang nub dang byang dang / byang
i195b7(nyi khri): shar dang / shar lho dang lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste
i195b8(nyi khri): 'di la ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang myed do// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang myed do// nyan thos zhes bya ba yang myed do// zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dang myi smra myi stonod
i196a1(nyi khri): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byord gzhan yang bdud to can dag/ nyan thos kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems
i196a2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyind te rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzlog cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'dems pa dang / 
i196a3(nyi khri): rjes su stond pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag myi smra myi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdud kyi sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan bdud sdig
i196a4(nyi khri): ti can mkhan po dang / sleb slob dpon gi cha byad du byas shing sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o drung du phyind te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las zlog cing / rnam pa thos
i196a5(nyi khri): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas zlog cing / dran pa zhi bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rdzas
i196a6(nyi khri): dang stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang / ston pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pI dang bar
i196a7(nyi khri): gi chos gi chos rnams la sbyor zhing / de ltar rigs kyi bu khyod kyis snyoms la nyan thos kyi sa la mngon du byos shig/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig/ 
i196a8(nyi khri): bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi lus dag myi spu mI stond pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig
i196b1(nyi khri): to can dag pa dang ma'i cha byad du byas shing // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyind te/ 'di skad du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya
i196b2(nyi khri): pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ de'i don du ni bskal pa tshad myed pa grangs par 'khor zhing / rga lug dang 'gro bcad tshad myed pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gis/ gang la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon
i196b3(nyi khri): du byar yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa de la brtson
i196b4(nyi khri): par gis shig ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag myi smra mya ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang
i196b5(nyi khri): bdud sdig can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyind to / gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stonod pa dang // gzug
i196b6(nyi khri): sdug sngal ba dang / bdag myed pa dang / zhi ba dang stong pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes 'du bya ba myed pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gis
i196b7(nyi khri): stonod pa dang // tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar stonod pa dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang bdag myed pa dang zhi ba dang stong pa dang
i196b8(nyi khri): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gis so nad pa dang / myig myi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang bdag/ 
i197a1(nyi khri): myed pa dang zhi ba dang stong pa dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smonod pa myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stond pa dang / na ba dang sna dang / 
i197a2(nyi khri): lce dang lus dang / yid myi rtag ces bya bar dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag myed pa dang / zhi ba dang stong pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang mngon par 'du bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba
i197a3(nyi khri): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stond pa dang / gzugs myi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag myed pa dang / zhi ba dang stong pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon po myed pa dang ka mngon par
i197a4(nyi khri): 'du bya ba myed pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stond pa dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang / chos myi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag myed pa dang / zhi ba dang stong pa
i197a5(nyi khri): pa dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stond pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar dang / 
i197a6(nyi khri): sug sngal ba dang / bdag myed pa dang / zhi ba dang stong pa dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gris sgom
i197a7(nyi khri): pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal
i197a8(nyi khri): dang bdag myed pa dang / zhi ba dang stong pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par bya ba myed pa dang bya dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gos sonod pa dang / myig gi 'dus
i197b1(nyi khri): rnyorig pa mye rtag ces bya ba dang / srog bsngal ba dang bdag myang ba dang ni zhi ba dang spang pa dang ga mtshan ma myed pa dang / sman pa myong pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myang ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyig
i197b2(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gos smonod pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / bu'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myi rtag pa myi ngag
i197b3(nyi khri): ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag myed pa dang / zhi ba dang stong pa dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa dang / dbyen zhes bya bar dmyigs pa
i197b4(nyi khri): tshul gis stond pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug zhes bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang blazhi ba dang stong pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang
i197b5(nyi khri): smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gis smond pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
i197b6(nyi khri): kyis tshor ba dang / khro'i 'dus te reg po'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi rtag ces bya ba dang
i197b7(nyi khri): sdug bsngal ba dang bdag myed pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gas
i197b8(nyi khri): smind pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag rnams kyi bar du myi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag myed pa dang zhi ba dang kastong pa dang mtshan myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya
i198a1(nyi khri): ba myed pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stond pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshe sa maH sbyi rnams kyi bar du myi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang bdag myed
i198a2(nyi khri): pa dang zhi ba dang stong pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa dang / dben zhes bya bar myi dmigs pa'i tshul gsuM stonod pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las rnam
i198a3(nyi khri): par dag pa myi smra myi stond pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po dag du rig par bya'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sdig pa'i
i198a4(nyi khri): grogs po dag du rig par bya ste/ de ltar shes rab yongasu spang bar bya'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u bdun pa'o// / de nas tshe
i198a5(nyi khri): dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'di'i doni gang logs/ de skad/ 
i198a6(nyi khri): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni tshig gi don myed pa'o// 
i198a7(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na byang chub sems kyang ma skyes kha/ sems can yang ma skyes pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor nga byang chub la yang tshig myed/ sems can la yang tshig myed pas/ de'i phyir byung
i198a8(nyi khri): chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni tshig gi don myed pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na// nam mkha' la bya'i rjes myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig don myed/ 
i198b1(nyi khri): rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na rmi lam la gnas myong ngo // rab 'byorade de bzhin du byang chub seMs dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma la gnas myed do/ 
i198b2(nyi khri): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na smig rgyu la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed/ 
i198b3(nyi khri): rab 'byor du 'di lta ste dper na chu zla dang sgra brnyan dang / myig yor dang gzugs rnyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig
i198b4(nyi khri): gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na// de bzhin
i198b5(nyi khri): nyid la gnas myed do// mi nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang // chos skyon myed pa nyid la gnas myed do// 
i198b6(nyi khri): rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la gnas myed do// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam pa
i198b7(nyi khri): shes pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gos rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// ra
i198b8(nyi khri): 'byor nga 'di la ste dper na/ sgyu ma'o skyes bu'i myig la gnas myed do// rna ba dang sA dang khre dang lus dang / snod la gnas meng // rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rnan po
i199a1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyad pa'i cha/ rma byang chub sems dpe'i tshig gi don myed do// rlab rang 'di lta ste dper nasgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs kha gnas myed do// sgra dang
i199a2(nyi khri): dri dang ro dang reg dang / chos la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'ag
i199a3(nyi khri): 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i myig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas myed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang lus kyi rnam par she
i199a4(nyi khri): pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor da de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig
i199a5(nyi khri): gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i myig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang ga lho'i 'dus te reg pa dang / 
i199a6(nyi khri): lus kyi 'dus te reg po dang / yid kyi 'dus te ga pa la gnas myeng ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen pog shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod du
i199a7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i myig gi 'dus te reg te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba la gnas myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
i199a8(nyi khri): kyis tshor ba dang shA sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tsho ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
i199b1(nyi khri): kyis char ba la gnas myed do// rang 'byur de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rang 'byer
i199b2(nyi khri): 'di lta ste dper ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i ma rig pa la gnas med do// 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang tshor ba dang / sred pa dang skye ba dang / 
i199b3(nyi khri): len pa dang srid pa dang ma ni shi la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed
i199b4(nyi khri): rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// gre tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa
i199b5(nyi khri): dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ga bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems
i199b6(nyi khri): nanga' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// / shes rab bam po// / rab 'byor 'di la se dper na/ sgyu ma'i
i199b7(nyi khri): skyes bu nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// phyi stong pa nyid dang ka phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshig gi don
i199b8(nyi khri): myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dbe na/ 
i200a1(nyi khri): sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spang ba rnams dang // rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang ba rnams dang / spobs rnams dang sa byang chub kyi yan la/ 
i200a2(nyi khri): rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnas dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis
i200a3(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang ting nge 'dzinid rnams dang / gzugs gi rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs cu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 
i200a4(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byord de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu
i200a5(nyi khri): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gi gzugs la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
i200a6(nyi khri): gzugs de myod ba'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen poshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor
i200a7(nyi khri): 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
i200a8(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa de dmyigs pa'i phyir zhe// rab 'byorang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ma
i200b1(nyi khri): sa nga / bdidi gagags pa na pa 'a dug pa rdugs pa bya mam sa kyig su gnas sbyang du sa bya bye nan/ skye bye pa byad// rab bya
i200b2(nyi khri): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen dang / shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' tshig gi don myod do// rab 'byor de 'di lta skye dper na/ de bzhin ga ne/ 
i200b3(nyi khri): po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi na ba dang sA dang lce dang lus dang yid la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na ka yid la de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
i200b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom
i200b5(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs de myed pa'i phyir teka rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
i200b6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste de bar na shi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
i200b7(nyi khri): rgyas kyi sgra dang / dri dang ro dang reg dang / chos la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de myed pa'i phyir ta / rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi/ 
i200b8(nyi khri): pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
i201a1(nyi khri): kyi myig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na bla myig gi rnam par shes pa de myed pa'i phyir te rab 'byorang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' shes rab
i201a2(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba'i rnam
i201a3(nyi khri): par shes pa dang / sna'i rna par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa de med/ 
i201a4(nyi khri): pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di
i201a5(nyi khri): lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi myig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na myig gi 'das te reg pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ 
i201a6(nyi khri): rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na// de bzhi
i201a7(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi
i201a8(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen poshes rab kyi pha rol
i201b1(nyi khri): tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na ka de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi myig gi 'dus te/ 
i201b2(nyi khri): rig pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myig gi reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba de myed pa'i phyir te sa rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
i201b3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
i201b4(nyi khri): rgyas kyi rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba dang / 
i201b5(nyi khri): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor nga yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byord de bzhin du byang chub sems
i201b6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
i201b7(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ma rig pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma rig pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
i201b8(nyi khri): rold tu phyind pa la spong ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'du
i202a1(nyi khri): byed dang rnam par shes pa dang / myong dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / rigo ba dang tshor ba dang / sred pa dang lend pa dang srid pa dang skye ba dang rga shi la gnas myed
i202a2(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rga shi de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi
i202a3(nyi khri): don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i
i202a4(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin byang sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
i202a5(nyi khri): dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i
i202a6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang kau shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshi ga gnas myed do
i202a7(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byorang de bzhin du byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
i202a8(nyi khri): sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang spong ba nyid lto gnas myed do// 
i202b1(nyi khri): rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ nang stong pa nyid de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
i202b2(nyi khri): dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
i202b3(nyi khri): la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol
i202b4(nyi khri): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ byang
i202b5(nyi khri): chub kyi phyogs kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang ga 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyos par 'jug pa rnaMs
i202b6(nyi khri): dang / rnam par tha da pa brgyad dang / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams
i202b7(nyi khri): dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs gi sgo rnas dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas
i202b8(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa'
i203a1(nyi khri): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings la/ 'dus byas
i203a2(nyi khri): kyi khams kyi gnas myed do// rab 'byor de 'dus byas kyi khams la 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings gi gnas myed do// rab 'byorarang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po shes rang dang
i203a3(nyi khri): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na skye ba myed pa'i gnas myed do// 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa de
i203a4(nyi khri): rnam par bya ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya myed pa dang ga'abyung ba myed pa dang dmyigs pa myed pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha
i203a5(nyi khri): ro lang tu phyi nad pa la smod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// gsold pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi skye ba ma mchis pa la gnas ma mchis gang gi 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun
i203a6(nyi khri): nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ma mchis pa dang / 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / gang gi myi dmyigs pa la gnas ma mchis pa legs/ bcom/ 
i203a7(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ rab 'byorod gzugs skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// gzugs 'gag pa myed pa dang / gzugs kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / gzugs rnam par byang ba me
i203a8(nyi khri): pa dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa dang / gzugs 'byung ba myed pa dang / gzugs myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba myed
i203b1(nyi khri): gnas myang ngo do// rnam par shes pa 'gag pa myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa dang / rnam par shes
i203b2(nyi khri): pa 'byung ba myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// skye mched dang / khams dang rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'dre
i203b3(nyi khri): par 'byung ba 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// byang chub kyi phyor
i203b4(nyi khri): kyi chos rnams kyi bar dang / 'phags pa'i 'den pa rnams rlung / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang // gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar da pa brgyad dang
i203b5(nyi khri): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang
i203b6(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
i203b7(nyi khri): 'dres pa rnams 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab
i203b8(nyi khri): 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs shin tu
i204a1(nyi khri): rnam par dag pa la mtshan me'i gyanas myed do// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa shi nang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub
i204a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel
i204a3(nyi khri): par 'byung ba shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sres dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
i204a4(nyi khri): tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bar du sha nid tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dang
i204a5(nyi khri): dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnaMs dang / 
i204a6(nyi khri): gzugs myed pa'i ltos par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i smos par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnaMs dang / 
i204a7(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhini gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shi nad tu rnam par dag pa
i204a8(nyi khri): wa mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor/ 
i204b1(nyi khri): 'di lta ste dper na bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// sems can dang srog dang / 'gro ba dang gso ba dang skyes bu dang / gang zug dang shed can dang shed bdag dang / byed pa po/ 
i204b2(nyi khri): dang tshor ba po dang shes pa po dang / mthong ba po myed pa'i phyir/ sems can dang srog dang / 'gro ba dang gso ba dang skyes bu dang // gang zag dang shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang tshor ba
i204b3(nyi khri): po dang shes pa po dang / mthong ba po shi nang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyospod pa'i
i204b4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'tshar ba'i tshe mun pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du bya ngardo rje khyi chub seMs dpa'o sos
i204b5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ skal pa'i tshe 'bar ba'i tshe/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams
i204b6(nyi khri): cad kyi gnas myed do// rab 'byor nga de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ 
i204b7(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la tshul khrims ngan pa'i gnas myeng ngo do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
i204b8(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go don myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i rgyas kyi ting
i205a1(nyi khri): 'dzind la 'khrug pa'i gnas myed do// rab 'byorang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang bra la spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i chas
i205a2(nyi khri): don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shes rab la shes rab 'argyal pa'i gnas myed do// rab 'byung da de bzhin du bya
i205a3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'od lta ste dper ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya
i205a4(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba la rnam par grol ba'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen poka shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la/ 
i205a5(nyi khri): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i
i205a6(nyi khri): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma gzigs pa'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig
i205a7(nyi khri): gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa lta
i205a8(nyi khri): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na ga gza' dang skar ma dang nor bu rin po che dang / glog gi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor nga de bzhin du byung
i205b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la
i205b2(nyi khri): gnas myong ngo // sum cu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang
i205b3(nyi khri): tshangs tshon dang / 'og myin gi bar lha rnams kyi bar la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
i205b4(nyi khri): dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnams kyi 'od dang gnas med do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
i205b5(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ 
i205b6(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na sha rab 'byorang 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan
i205b7(nyi khri): yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs myed pa bsta nang du myed pa thogs pa myed pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed pa ni mtshan nyid gcig bag sngags/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sas dpa
i205b8(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi myed pa yang dag pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad rig par bya'o// gsol pa bcom
i206a1(nyi khri): ldan 'das chos thams cad na gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos na ma mchis pa'i yang dag pa nyid la ji ltang bsla
i206a2(nyi khri): par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pA ka/ rab 'byor nga chos thams cad ces bya bar ni
i206a3(nyi khri): dge ba dang myi dge ba dang / lung bstand pa dang / lung ma snyand pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rtend las 'das pa dang / zag pa bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus
i206a4(nyi khri): ma byas dang / kha na ma tho dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba myed pa dang / thun mong dang thun mong dang ma yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya bar ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
i206a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos de dag thams cad skye ba myed pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang po bar bya ba yang chos thas
i206a6(nyi khri): cad po de dag nyid do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig pa'i dge ba'i chos gang legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rtend pa'i chos dge ba ni zhes bya
i206a7(nyi khri): ba ni phar 'du shes pa dang sha mar 'du shes pa dge sbyong du 'du shes pa/ bram zer 'du shes pa// rigs kyi nang na rgan pa la rim 'gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi
i206a8(nyi khri): dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi dngos po dang / nyam su blang ba dang ldan pa'i dngos po dang ga dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 
i206b1(nyi khri): 'jog rten pa'i 'du shes dgu ste/ 'di ltar rnam par bam pa'o 'du shes dang / 'bu tsan gi 'du shes dang / rnam par po rnags pa'i 'du shes dang rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos
i206b2(nyi khri): pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam pa de zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam khar 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang 'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dang bsam gtin
i206b3(nyi khri): bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i smos par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang 'jig rtend pa'i rjesu dran pa bcu ste ka 'di ltar sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa dang / 
i206b4(nyi khri): chos rje su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / rtong ba rje su dran pa dang / lha rje su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang kalus rjes su
i206b5(nyi khri): dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjesu dran pa steng de dag ni 'jig pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos myi dge ba'i chos gang lags
i206b6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'angs kyis bka' su khad pa myi dge ba bcu'i lus kyi lam dag ste/ 'di ltar rab 'byor nga srog gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos myi dge ba'o// me byin par len pa dang 'dod pas
i206b7(nyi khri): log par g.yo rdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang zhe gcod pa dang / tshig khyal pa dang / chags sems dang gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang / khro ba dang 'dun pa dang / 'ja nid pa dang 'chang ba dang / 
i206b8(nyi khri): 'tshig pa dang / 'tshe ba dang 'phra ma dang / ser sna dang nga rgyal dang log pa'i nga rgyal te/ rab 'byor de de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos myi dge ba'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das lung bstan pa'i chos
i207a1(nyi khri): gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lus kyi las ni lung ma bstand dri'o// ngag gi las ni khung ma bsten pa la// yid kyi l+les ni lung ma bres nad pa'o// dru
i207a2(nyi khri): ba chen po bzhi ni lung ma bstanang pa'o// dbang po lnga ni lung ma bstand pa'o// skye mched drug ni lung mi bsta nad pa'o// gzugs myed pa bzhir skyes pa ni lung mo bstan pa'o// phung po dang khrims dang / 
i207a3(nyi khri): skye mchod drug ni lung ma bas nad pa'o// rnam par smind pa thams cad ni lung me bstand pa'o// rab 'byor de de dag ni lung ma bstand pI'i tshi su shes par bya'o// gsold pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig
i207a4(nyi khri): rton pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ rab 'byor nga 'jig rtend pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni phung po dang / skye mched khams dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi le dang / 
i207a5(nyi khri): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i ltos par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma rtogs par de ma yin pa'i 'jig rten
i207a6(nyi khri): pa'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag ni 'jig rtend pa'i chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
i207a7(nyi khri): 'byord 'jig rtend las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang
i207a8(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa yongasu shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang / 
i207b1(nyi khri): yongasu shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongasu shes pa rtogs pa'i dbang po dang / rtogs pa dang brnyes pa dang / dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang kau rtogs pa la dpyod pa tsam gi
i207b2(nyi khri): de 'dzi nid dang / rtog pa myed ci dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa dang / reg pa dang rnam par grol ba dang // dran pa dgyes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin du yid la dang / rnam par tha pa badzad
i207b3(nyi khri): brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs dang ldan pas gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa dang po'o// nang gzugs myed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas/ pha rold kyi gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam
i207b4(nyi khri): par thar pa gnyis pa'o// sdug par mos par 'gyur ba 'di ni rnam par tha rad ba gsum pa'o// gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyurd cing
i207b5(nyi khri): sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yod la myi byed pas// nam mkha' ya so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye marnyed la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thas cad
i207b6(nyi khri): du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yis skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs gnas pa 'di ni rnam par tha dad pa lnga cwo
i207b7(nyi khri): de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag pur 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgribs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thard pa drug pa'o// 
i207b8(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mchod la nye bar bsgrubs yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'dushes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnaM par tha rad pa bdun pa'o// 
i208a1(nyi khri): de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes myed 'du shes myin skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par tha radad pa brgyad pa'o// 
i208a2(nyi khri): rnam par tha rad pa brgyad po de dag dang // mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'dod pas dben sdug to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang
i208a3(nyi khri): bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtanA dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongasu dang ste
i208a4(nyi khri): sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyu rad pas/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa/ rnam par dpyod pa myed pa ka tIng nge 'dzin de las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtanA~M gnyis pa laM nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 
i208a5(nyi khri): de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bsaM/ dran paM dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyomasu gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong ba 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par smid
i208a6(nyi khri): pu btang skyes pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid myi
i208a7(nyi khri): dade ba snga nas kyang nub las byed pa yang myed/ sug bsngal ba yang med pa btang snyoms dang / dran pas yongasu dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thas rtse
i208a8(nyi khri): drug thugs kyi rdzo gas las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams thub par gyur ci / sna rigs kyi 'du shes rnams yod la byeng bas/ nam mkha' mtha rnams sa nas
i208b1(nyi khri): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad nam mkha' mtha' yis skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam shes mtha' yusau so zhes rnam shes
i208b2(nyi khri): mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas s+ho// de rnam pa thams cad rnam shes mtha' yis mtha' skye mched las yang dag par 'das te// cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad myed pa nye bar smra / 
i208b3(nyi khri): gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang drag par 'das te// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar sbubs te gnas so// rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes myed 'du
i208b4(nyi khri): shes skyed myin skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de ltar mthard kyis gnas pa'i skyes par 'jug pa dgu po de dag dang nang stong
i208b5(nyi khri): pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid dang // phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par
i208b6(nyi khri): rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang lags
i208b7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ rab 'byor zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ phung po dang zhes dang skye mched dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang // gzugs myed pa'i smos par 'jug
i208b8(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / mngon pa shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya'o// gsold pa bcom ldan 'das zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
i209a1(nyi khri): to/ pa rab 'byor nga zag pa myed pa'i chos ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spang ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang // byang chub kyi yan lan/ 
i209a2(nyi khri): bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang // rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan myed
i209a3(nyi khri): pa dang smond pa myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'dzags pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen
i209a4(nyi khri): po dang snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos zhes bya'o// gsold pa bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas kyi chos gang la gsag bcom ldan
i209a5(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor nga 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ning / 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams dang / gzhan yang de ma yin pa'i 'dus byas
i209a6(nyi khri): su rtogs pa'i chos rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi su cu rtsa bdun dang NA sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan
i209a7(nyi khri): 'das 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa// rab 'byor 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni gang la skye ba myed cing 'jig pa myed pa dang / gnas pa las
i209a8(nyi khri): gzhan du 'gyur ba myed pa sde/ 'dod chags zad pa dang / zhe sdang zad pa gti mug zad pa de brji nyid ma nor pa de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin pa chos nyid chos kyi dbyings nyid chos skyo
i209b1(nyi khri): myed pa nyid bsam gas myi khyab pa'i dbyings yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'dus ma byas gi chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das thun mong gi chos gang lags / bco rna
i209b2(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ rab 'byo rang thun mong gi chos zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang
i209b3(nyi khri): de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang thun mong gi chos zhes bya'o// gsal de pa bcom ldan 'das thun mong ma lags pa'i chos gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de thun mong/ 
i209b4(nyi khri): ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpe'
i209b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad pas rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la rtog pa myed pas chags par myi bya'o// chos thams cad gnyi su myed pa'i tshul gas
i209b6(nyi khri): rtog pa myed pa'i rnam par rtog pa myed pa'i phyir chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang
i209b7(nyi khri): 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de ci'i slad du// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su khad pa/ rab 'byor de sems can
i209b8(nyi khri): gi phung po nges pa'i phul byed par 'gyur ba sa twa/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sems can gi phung po des de lta bu'i phul// byang chub
i210a1(nyi khri): sa sems dpa' sems dpa' bgyid par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gi phung po nges pa ni gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byo rang spos can gi phung po/ 
i210a2(nyi khri): zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste ka rigs kyi sa dang brgyad pa'i sa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang bskyed dri/ 
i210a3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dang / phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag ste rab 'byor de de dag ni sems can+d+ra gi phung po nges pa zhes bya ste byang chub sos/ 
i210a4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i phul byed par 'gyur ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos// rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de sems can gyi phung po nges pa'i phul zhe
i210a5(nyi khri): bya'o// gas yod pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i si ma ste bskyed pa gang lags ka bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su yid pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
i210a6(nyi khri): ltar sems bskyed do// 'khor ba dpag tu myed par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go nA bgo bar bya ste/ bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongasu btang bar bya'o// bdag gis
i210a7(nyi khri): sems can thams cad la sems nyid mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gis yongasu mya ngan lngas bzla bar bya'o// de ltar sems can thams
i210a8(nyi khri): nang mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems tsad gang yang yongasu ma ngan las bzlas pa myed pas chos thams cad skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa bdag gis shes par bya'o// bdag gos
i210b1(nyi khri): mi 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems kyis// pha rol tu phyind pa drug ma spyad par bya'o// bdag gis chos rtogs pa thams cad kyi rjesu 'gro ba/ phun sum chags pa la/ 
i210b2(nyi khri): bslab par bya'o// bdag gis chos kyi tshul cag tu bsgrubs pa khyong du chud par bya'o// bdag gis chos dpag tu myed pa thams cad yongasu bsgrubs par bsla ba par bya'o ste du sems bskyed de// rab
i210b3(nyi khri): 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de de le gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gi phung po chen po dra
i210b4(nyi khri): pa'i phul myi/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gso byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol
i210b5(nyi khri): song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug bsngal ba nyam su myong bar gyurd pa'i sdug bsngal gi tshor pa de dag thams cad sems can de dag gi dom du bdag
i210b6(nyi khri): gis nyam su myong bar bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed do// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gong du sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste// bdag gis sems re re'i don du yang
i210b7(nyi khri): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por sems can gang yang phung ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu mya ngan las bzla ba'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de
i210b8(nyi khri): dag kyang bdag gis nyam su myong bar bya'o// zhes thabs de lta bus sems can thams cad kyi don du sems can thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu ma
i211a1(nyi khri): yongasu mya ngan las ma bzlas pa'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad kyang nyam su meng bar bya'o// de nas 'dod bdag gi don du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed de/ ska
i211a2(nyi khri): pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas byang chub kyi tsho gas mang po bstsags te/ khrin myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par
i211a3(nyi khri): rab 'bor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur pa de la
i211a4(nyi khri): bu'i sems rlabs po che bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni sems dang po bsnyed phyi nad cad 'dod chags kyi sems myi bsnyed zhe sdang gi seMs
i211a5(nyi khri): myi bskyed gti mug gi sems myo skyed/ gtse ba'i sems myi skyed/ nyan thos kyi sems dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyang myi skyed pa steka 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i seMs
i211a6(nyi khri): rlabs po che'o// des sems can thams cad kyi phul byed kyang / des sems rlabs po che des rlom sems myi bya'o// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos myi sku
i211a7(nyi khri): ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ste ga de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi skul khri nau ma pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed cing des rlom sems su ma
i211a8(nyi khri): ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi skul ba'o// sems can thams cad kyi phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis 'gyu ro// rab 'byor du gzhan yang bang na
i211b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po skams can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i sems skyed por bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems ni// sos tsam
i211b2(nyi khri): thams cad skyob cing / sems can thams cad yongasu myi gtong la ngas semasu 'gyur ba myed pa ste// rab 'byor nga 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems
i211b3(nyi khri): de la gnas shing sems can gyi phung po// nges pa'i phul myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu rgyun myi chad par chos 'dod
i211b4(nyi khri): par bya'o// chos la dga' bar bya'o// chos la mos par bya'o// chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o// de la chog gang zhe na chos thams cad dper myed pa ste/ 'di ni chos zhes bya'o// 
i211b5(nyi khri): de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la 'dod cing mas pa ste/ 'di ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o// de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na gang chos de la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste// 'di ni rgyas
i211b6(nyi khri): la dga' ba zhes bya'o// de la chos la mos pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la yon tan du lta ba ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa zhes bya'o// de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor de la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de
i211b7(nyi khri): nyid la sgo zhing mang du byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor de la brtson pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
i211b8(nyi khri): la spyod pa 'as/ sems can gi phung po nges pa'i phul myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gas byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen pos/ gis rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la smod pI
i212a1(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid la gnas phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas te sems can gyi phung ba chen po nges pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya
i212a2(nyi khri): rab 'byorarang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems phyogs kyi chos rnams la gnas/ 'phags
i212a3(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang na rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i
i212a4(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshe
i212a5(nyi khri): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mya 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gan
