i212a6(nyi khri): te/ sems can gi phung po ngas pa'i phul du myi dmyigs pa'i tshul du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
i212a7(nyi khri): spyod pas dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas/ rnam par grol zhing gos pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gi bar la gnas te/ sems can gi
i212a8(nyi khri): phung po nges pa'i phul du myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor nga chos de dag la gnas shing ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
i212b1(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa'i sems cad gi phul du byed pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan dag ru dwa ti'i bus ma ldan 'das 'di skad ces gsom
i212b2(nyi khri): to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spobs pa smra'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lang pa/ sha ra dwa ta'i/ 
i212b3(nyi khri): bu de lta spobs pa skyed cig ga ga ri'i bus gas yod pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can du blta ba dang / srog du lta ba dang / gang zag du lta ba dang / gso ba dang skyes bu
i212b4(nyi khri): dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang shes pa po dang mthong ba por lta ba dang gi chad par lta ba dang rtag par lta ba dang / yid par lta ba dang myed par lta ba dang
i212b5(nyi khri): phung por lta ba dang / khams su lta ba dang / skye mched du lte ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba dang / pha rol tu phyind pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su
i212b6(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta ba dang / sems can yongasu smyin par bya bar lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par bya bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs rgya su lta ba dang
i212b7(nyi khri): chos su lta bu dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba dang / yongasu mya dran las 'ad ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos stond par bgyid kyang / de myi
i212b8(nyi khri): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di skad ces bka'
i213a1(nyi khri): gagasu lang to// tshe dang ldan pa shA rA yA tI'i bu ci'i phyir na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugasu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par
i213a2(nyi khri): bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mya ngan 'das pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ smras pa me dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
i213a3(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs la dmyigs shing / dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta bo bskyed do// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmyigs shing dmyigs pI/ 
i213a4(nyi khri): tshul gis lta ba bskyed do// skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brelang par 'byung bar dmigs shing / dmyigs pa'i tshul gas lta ba bskyed do// pha rol tu phyind pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid
i213a5(nyi khri): thams cad dang dran pa nye bar gzhog pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dang dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 
i213a6(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i lam ldan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dngag bsam gtan rnams dang 'a tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i ltos par dmyigs shing dmyigs
i213a7(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gis lta ba bskyed do// rnam par thard pa brgyad dang / mtha cad kyis gnasaM pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stod pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smonod pa myed pa dang mngon par
i213a8(nyi khri): shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzinid dang gzungs gi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang
i213b1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmyigs shong dmyigs pa'i rdul gsal ba bskyed do// yengasu mya ngan 'da' ba'o bar dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis la ba bsnad do// mdang
i213b2(nyi khri): bai rab 'byord de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa gzugasu lta bar 'gyur ba yin tshor ba dang 'du shes dpa'adu byed dang / rnam par shes pa lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yongasu mya
i213b3(nyi khri): ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe ga thabs mkhas pas lta ba'i rnam pa de
i213b4(nyi khri): ngag spang ba'i phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gas stond to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub sos
i213b5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spongs pa skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa me pa/ rab 'byord kyis spobs pa skyed cig bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi
i213b6(nyi khri): sems myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang la thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems de lta bu la yang chags pa ma mchis pas de'i slad du byang chub
i213b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du ne na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems ni zag pa ma mchis shing / khongasu chud pa ma mchis paste/ de ltar thos
i213b8(nyi khri): nga mkhyenang pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsuMg khungs chud pa ma mangs pa'i sems de la yang rang bzhin song ba nyid kyi srad du/ chags pa ma mtshas pas de ma
i214a1(nyi khri): ldan 'das bdag gi stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmyigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bsam
i214a2(nyi khri): gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmyigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / 
i214a3(nyi khri): chos rje su dran pa dang / dge 'dun dran pa dang / tshul khrims rje su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dang / skye ba rjes su dran pa'i 'brel ba dang 'grib
i214a4(nyi khri): pa ma dmyigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa myi dmyigs yang dag par rjesasu mthong / bcom ldan 'das bdag gi
i214a5(nyi khri): myig lnga dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'phel
i214a6(nyi khri): ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmyigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa myi dmyigs yang dag par rjes
i214a7(nyi khri): su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la mying du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das mying de yang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis/ byin gis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
i214a8(nyi khri): mying de ma mchis pas// de ltar na mying de gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis/ byin gis rlabs pa ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rmyi lam lta bu'i nye ba'i len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel bang
i214b1(nyi khri): 'grib pa ma dmyigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dben pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmyigs yang dag par rje su mthong // skye ba dang sgra rnyan dang / myog yor lta bu dang
i214b2(nyi khri): gzugs snyan lta bu dang / smyig rgyu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang // 'grib pa ma myigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong zhi ba dang skyo ma mchis pa
i214b3(nyi khri): 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang // kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang garnam par byang ba mchis pa 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmyigs yang dag par
i214b4(nyi khri): rjes su ma mthong / bcom ldan 'das bdag gi chos kyi dbyings kyi 'phel ba dang // 'grib pa ma dmyigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong / de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang chos kyi gnas
i214b5(nyi khri): nyid dang / chos kyi skyon myed pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'gri ba yang dmyigs yang dag pa re rje su ma mthong / bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dge ba'i dang myi dge ba'i chos kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa dmyigs
i214b6(nyi khri): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / 'jigs rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmyigs yang dag par rjes su mthong / 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi 'phel ba
i214b7(nyi khri): dang / 'grib pa ma dmyigs yang dag par rje su mthong / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmyigs yang dag par rje su myi mthong / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs
i214b8(nyi khri): pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmyigs yang dag par rjes su myi mthong // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'das pa ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang ma 'ongs ma
i215a1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i grangasu mchi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da la 'di skad ces smras so// mye dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sas
i215a2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin rab 'byord kyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i du
i215a3(nyi khri): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chems dpa' chen po sems dang skyed phyind cad chos gang yang skye bar yang dag par rjesu myi mthong / 'gag pa dang 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa dang 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang kun na
i215a4(nyi khri): nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par rje su myi mthong ste tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang la skye ba myed cing 'gag pa myed pa dang 'phel ba 'grib pa myed pa dang / 'ong ba myed cing 'gro ba
i215a5(nyi khri): myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed cing rnam par byang ba myed pa de nyan thos kyi sems med do// rang sangs rgyas kyi sems myed do// byang chub sems dpa'i sems myed do// yang dag par rdzogs pa'o/ 
i215a6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi sems myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nyidadi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos kyi sems myed do// rang sangs rgyas kyi
i215a7(nyi khri): sems myed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems zag pa myed pa
i215a8(nyi khri): khongasu chud pa myed pa de lta bu'i sems la yang chags pa myed do// zhes smras pa ni de la ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da de bas gzugs kyang chags pa myed do// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed
i215b1(nyi khri): dang rnam par shes pa la chags pa myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar lho yang tshogs pa myed do// smras po che dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin te// gzugs kyang chags pa myangar
i215b2(nyi khri): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do// skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang chags pa myed do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi ba 'i/ 
i215b3(nyi khri): yang chags pa myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang chags pa myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa myed do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ 
i215b4(nyi khri): khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems de yang zag pa myed pa'i khongasu chud pa myed do// zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ me ldan pa rab 'byor dor yang mi zad pa byis so so'i skye'o rnams
i215b5(nyi khri): kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed pa myed cing khongasu chud pa myed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang / 
i215b6(nyi khri): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongasu chud pa myed do// rab 'byord kyis smras pa de yin te/ tshor ba dang byis bri so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa sgyus
i215b7(nyi khri): cing khongasu chud pa myed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems can 'di bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag po myed cing khong su chud pa myed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin song
i215b8(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongasu chud pa myed do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la yin na/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khong su chud pa myed do// tshor pa
i216a1(nyi khri): dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyiraka zag pa myed cing khongasu chud pa myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar yang rang
i216a2(nyi khri): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongasu chud pa myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongasu chud pa myed do// rab 'a
i216a3(nyi khri): kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongasu chud pa myed do// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang
i216a4(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongasu chud pa myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongasu
i216a5(nyi khri): chud pa myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa'i bar yang bzhon stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongasu chud pa myed do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du ses
i216a6(nyi khri): myed pa'i phyir te/ sems de la yang chags pa myed do// zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de der yang ma zad de gzugs myed pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do// 
i216a7(nyi khri): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes myed pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa myed do// byang chub seMs dpa'i chos rnams kyi bar du myed pa yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnaMs la chags pa/ 
i216a8(nyi khri): myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du myed pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar du myed pa yang rnam pa
i216b1(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la chags pa myed do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin te/ gzugs myed pa yang gzugs la chags pa myed do// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam pa / 
i216b2(nyi khri): shes pa myed pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa myed do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du myed pa yang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos/ 
i216b3(nyi khri): ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du myed pa yang sangs rgyas kyi ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar du myed pa yang thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la chags pa myed// 
i216b4(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / 
i216b5(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang chos thams cad la dmyigs pa myed pa'i rul gos rlom semasu 'gyur ba myed do// mngon par chags par 'gyur ba myed pas
i216b6(nyi khri): de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams pa gang gi bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du
i216b7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spabs pa skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ gang po khyod kyi spobs pa skyed cig/ gang pos gsolang pa
i216b8(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ni go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can lagasi te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par sems can lags la de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag
i217a1(nyi khri): ga par gnas pa'i sems can gang lags pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de gang gi bu la 'di skad ces
i217a2(nyi khri): smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go che chen po bgos pa zhes bya / gang pos smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub seMs
i217a3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po ni sems can nyung zad nyi tshe zhig gi don du sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas shing sbyin pa yongasu rtong pa ma yin gi sems can thams kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
i217a4(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa yongasu rtong ngo // sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa la gnas shing / tshul khrims srung ba ma yin gi don du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
i217a5(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims srung ngo // sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas shing / bzod pa sgom pa ma yin gyi sems can thams kyi don du bzod pa'i
i217a6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas spyad cing bzod pa sgom mo// sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ brtson 'grus gi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gagasos/ 
i217a7(nyi khri): can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / bas
i217a8(nyi khri): gtan skyed pa ma yin gi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du byas ma gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa spyod cing / bsam gtan skyed pa'o// sems can nyung zad myi che'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol
i217b1(nyi khri): tu phyind pa laM gnas shing shes rib sgom pa ma yin go sems can thams cad gi drin du shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyin/ pa la spyod tsang shaMs ra ba~M sgom mo// byang chub skyes dpa' sems dpa'i chen
i217b2(nyi khri): ni sems can 'od snyed cig phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan khas bzla bar bya'o// sems can ci snyed cag ni yongs mya ngan lus bzla bar bya'o zhe 'am
i217b3(nyi khri): ni snyoms can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub sems dpa' dgod par myi bya'o zhes sems can yongasu dpag pas go cha myi gyon gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams
i217b4(nyi khri): kyi don du go cha chen po gyon to// de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyar
i217b5(nyi khri): bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha ro khad tu phyind pa dang ga brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi
i217b6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyind pa yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rolan tu phyind pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang
i217b7(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam rten rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang nigazugs myed pa'i spros par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang gzugs myed pa'i smos
i217b8(nyi khri): par 'jug pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par
i218a1(nyi khri): shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams dang // gzungs gi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas
i218a2(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la gnas myed do// sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o// zhes bya bar sems bstod de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de tsam gis
i218a3(nyi khri): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// // shes rab bam po// / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
i218a4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa gang yongasu gtong ba de dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang
i218a5(nyi khri): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongasu gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sos
i218a6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongasu gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha rA dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
i218a7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongasu gtong zhing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du yongasu myi sngo ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rtse
i218a8(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa/ l-i spyod pa// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin du pa yongasu gtong ba'i tshul+le khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dA ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub seMs dpa
i218b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa dang // rten pa 'di ni byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
i218b2(nyi khri): phyind pa la spyod cing // ston pa yongasu rtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang po'i go tsa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongasu rtong pa'i tshe
i218b3(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus nyams par 'gyur myi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
i218b4(nyi khri): sman pa rjong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cheni blo sbyin pa yongasu gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams
i218b5(nyi khri): cing ma ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig du byed cing // de la dmyigs pa gcig pos nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mya 'byed pa 'don
i218b6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongasu rtong pa'i bsam gtan kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pI la spyi go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
i218b7(nyi khri): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongasu rtong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thas cad
i218b8(nyi khri): sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ sbyin pa yang myi dmyigs/ rtong pa yang myi dmyigs/ len pa yang myi dmyigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
i219a1(nyi khri): tu phyind pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa yongasu gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i go cha ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
i219a2(nyi khri): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol tu phyind pa de dag la mtshan mar myi byed cing myi dmyigs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i go cha ma
i219a3(nyi khri): po bgos par shes par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chen tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
i219a4(nyi khri): ston pa gang yongasu rtong pa de dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yongasu sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ses
i219a5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims
i219a6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa spyod cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la mos pa skyed na so so'i sa la lta smos kyang myi smos pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyin/ 
i219a7(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
i219a8(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing chos de dag lnga bzod pa dang / mos pa dang rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i/ bzod pa'i
i219a9(nyi khri): la spyod pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa'o// 
i219b1(nyi khri): rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa/ 
i219b2(nyi khri): brtson 'grus nyam par myi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
i219b3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i gnas pa'i tshe// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go myi 'byed cing dge ba'i rtsa
i219b4(nyi khri): bo de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol de tu phyind pa la
i219b5(nyi khri): spyod pa'i bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa thos
i219b6(nyi khri): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / tshul khrims des rlom semasu mi byed de
i219b7(nyi khri): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshul khrims de yang myi dmyigs shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sngo ba 'di ni// byang chu

i222b6(nyi khri): dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnams kyi go myi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad thun mong du byas te bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sngo ba 'di ni/

i222b8(nyi khri): po bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes dang gnas te bsam gtan des kyang rlom sem su myi byed cing / bsam gtan des myi dmyigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa/ 
i223a1(nyi khri): ci yang sems can thams cid dang dzi ming du rgyas zhing ldan myed pa yang drag 'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po thamam can gi pa
i223a2(nyi khri): phyind pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa ga ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa kha de ltar spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin/ 
i223a3(nyi khri): pa drug po thams cad yang su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go chen po bgos zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa la

i223a5(nyi khri): dag pa'i rtsa ya yangasam sanA dang r+dz+nyAn mang du byas pa // rgyun stong pa 'ang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang sus pa dzin khyang chub sems dpa' sems na po/ 
i223a6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha ro lad tu phyin pa'o// mi dang ldan pa ga ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ra lang tu phyind pa la so hrI

i223b6(nyi khri): byas te// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sngo ba 'di ni ka/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i ga brtson 'grus ga pha rol/ 
i223b7(nyi khri): tu phyi nad pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la
i223b8(nyi khri): bya bas ma yin go kA rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse cig tu byed cing / dge ba'i brtsa ba de yang sems cad thams cad dang thun mong du byas te// bla na myed
i224a1(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyin do// 
i224a2(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nid pa la spyod cing chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ nyan thos/ 
i224a3(nyi khri): dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rlom semasu myi spyod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa
i224a4(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa
i224a5(nyi khri): sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag dang / sems can dang byang chub la mtshan mar myi
i224a6(nyi khri): byed myi dmyigs pa 'di ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa drug gi go cha chen pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar
i224a7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rold tu phyind pa re re la gnas shing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub

i224b1(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ro yang myong bar myi byed do// bsam gtan dang tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang myi 'phrogs te/ bsam gtan dang tshad myed pa dang / gzugs
i224b2(nyi khri): myong pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang myi skye'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la thabs mkhas pa dang 'grogs pa'o//

i224b7(nyi khri): byang shur dang shar lho dang lho nub dang / nub byang dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs rnams
