i229a3(nyi khri): dang // zag pa myed pa dang / 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dang / chos rnams kyang myi shes pa myed pa ste ka tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sos
i229a4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa glang po ji tsam gos na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gnas zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa tshe dang ldan pA sha ra dwa ti
i229a5(nyi khri): bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' depa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha yod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag par gnas kyang des sbyin pa la myi/ 
i229a6(nyi khri): dmyigs/ smon pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang myi dmyigs/ len pa yang myi dmyigs/ yid la bya ba yang myi dmyigs te// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
i229a7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du tu phyind pa dang / rtson 'grus
i229a8(nyi khri): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des dge ba'i cho
i229b1(nyi khri): kyang myi dmyigasamyi dge ba dang 'jig rtend pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa'i chos kyang myi dmyigs shing bshes rab kyang
i229b2(nyi khri): myi dmyigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang myi dmyigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang myi dmyigs te de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
i229b3(nyi khri): mya dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinod pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
i229b4(nyi khri): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'i don du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres
i229b5(nyi khri): pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'i don du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'ongs pas bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'i don du
i229b6(nyi khri): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma 'dres pas sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'i don du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ dngos
i229b7(nyi khri): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar du sgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom
i229b8(nyi khri): brnam thar sgom pa'i don du de myo dmyigs pa'i tshul gos bya da kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma 'dres pas sgom pa rnam thar ma / 
i230a1(nyi khri): don du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed nams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par/ 
i230a2(nyi khri): tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa'i myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind skom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
i230a3(nyi khri): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'i don du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rag
i230a4(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// 
i230a5(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmyig su myed pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe
i230a6(nyi khri): bya ba 'di ni tha snyad du zad do zhes bya bar shes so// gzugs dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir gzug so zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmyig su myed
i230a7(nyi khri): pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dmyig su myed pa'i phyirarten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du/ 
i230a8(nyi khri): byang ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmyig su myed pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// tshul khrims kyi pha ro khod tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
i230a9(nyi khri): rje pra zhes mkhyernam nyid dang ldan bI lI la bya ba ma 'du mas bsgom pa ni ts+lim shrI don d+ha de kyi dmyigs bI tshul gyis mngon pa she pa rnaMs dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams skom smo
i230b1(nyi khri): phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dmyig su myed pa'i phyir// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya
i230b2(nyi khri): ba ni mying tsam du zad do// nang stong pa nyid dmyig su myed pa'i phyir ka nang stong pa nyid dmyigs ces bya ba 'di na mying tsam du zad do// phyi sang pa nyid dmyig su myed pa'i phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni myang
i230b3(nyi khri): tsam du zad do// phyi nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmyig su myed pa'i phyir/ dngos po myed
i230b4(nyi khri): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying du zad do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dmyig su myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// 'phags
i230b5(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa rnaMs dang / gzugs kyi myed pa'i skyes par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par tha rad pa rnams dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
i230b6(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rjes
i230b7(nyi khri): dang myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmyig su myed pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya ba 'di na
i230b8(nyi khri): myongasam du zad do// de bzhin nyid dmyig su myed pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying du zad do// ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dong / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbying
i231a1(nyi khri): dang chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myeng pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba de na mying du zad do// byang chub dmyig su myed pa'i
i231a2(nyi khri): phyir byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la/ 
i231a3(nyi khri): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang ldan po bskyed pa
i231a4(nyi khri): nas snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa thams cad yongasu rtogs par byas shing / sems can yongasu smin par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / rim 'gro bya ba'i tshul/ 
i231a5(nyi khri): gang la gang 'os pa de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rami 'gro bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / sti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan/ 
i231a6(nyi khri): 'das de dag las kyang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to// de byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa'i theg pa de la gnas te// sangs rgyas kyi zhi
i231a7(nyi khri): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasasu dag par byed/ sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed kyang de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi 'du shes kyang myi 'byung // sems can kyi 'du shes kyang myi 'byung
i231a8(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang myi 'byung ngo // de gnyis su myed pa'i sa la gnas shing / lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu' yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing yong su 'dzind to// 
i231b1(nyi khri): de nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma gyur to// theg pa de dang nam du yang myi 'bral te / des rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
i231b2(nyi khri): thams cad dang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dro ze dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mya 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gis bskor bar myi nus pa'i 'khor lo
i231b3(nyi khri): rab tu skor ro// de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs
i231b4(nyi khri): po rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gi khams che ge mo zhig du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa
i231b5(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob ste// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sprog pad dbyangasu brjod do mdzad do// lho dang nub dang byang dang / byang shang dang shang
i231b6(nyi khri): dang lho nub dang nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing
i231b7(nyi khri): 'dzag rten gi khams che ge mo zhig du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thos
i231b8(nyi khri): cad mkhyend pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor bar byed do// zhes grags sgrog cing dbyangasu brjod pa mdzad do// de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang
i232a1(nyi khri): dag par gnas zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po dgos so zhes bgyi na bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gri
i232a2(nyi khri): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po gos zhes bgyi ba lags/ de skad ces ga sold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
i232a3(nyi khri): rab 'byorarod 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'i go ca gon tsang 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i go cha bgos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang / bzod pa
i232a4(nyi khri): pha rold tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i go cha bgos// nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos phyi stong// 
i232a5(nyi khri): pa nyid gi go cha bgos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gri go cha bgos/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i go cha bgosapa/ yang dag par spong ba dang rdzu 'phrul gi
i232a6(nyi khri): rkang pa dang / dbang po dang skabs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gau go cha bgos// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i sbas par 'jug pa rang gi rnam
i232a7(nyi khri): par tha dad pa dang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin
i232a8(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gi go cha dgos / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi go cha bgos
i232b1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khyams 'di snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas
i232b2(nyi khri): rgyas par 'gyengs so// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang shar lho dang / lho nub dang nub byang dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung
i232b3(nyi khri): gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gyengs so// stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di rnam pa 'di drug tu rab tu bskyed do// shar phogs kyi 'jag rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
i232b4(nyi khri): rnam pa drug du rab tu skyed do// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang nub byang dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i glang gi
i232b5(nyi khri): bye ma snyed rnam pa drug du bskyed do// des snyom gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cag yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gsheg
i232b6(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag dang sangs rgyas kyi sgra nas dga' ba
i232b7(nyi khri): dang bde ba thob ste/ de dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas/ rno bar langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang / 
i232b8(nyi khri): de dag du skye'o// de bzhin du byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can dam rnams dang gshini rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams de dag par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin
i233a1(nyi khri): rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag du skye'o// rab 'byor
i233a2(nyi khri): 'di lta ste dper na sgra mi'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ ske bo mang po'i tshi gos kyi mdun du seMs nA na dmyal ba dang byal
i233a3(nyi khri): gi ske gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag cig mngon par sprul la de ltar mngon par sprul nas/ ngan song gi sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun go sgra sgrog
i233a4(nyi khri): par 'gyur te/ de dag sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gi sgra des sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song song gi ske gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas
i233a5(nyi khri): langs par gyur nas/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sos can gang yang sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin
i233a6(nyi khri): rdo de dang rnam par ldang ba yod dam/ gsold pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu'i
i233a7(nyi khri): 'dzag rtenang gi khams tshad myed grangs myed pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gsuM lus yongasu bkrol kyang sems can gang yang yongasu grol bas byas pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da sgyu
i233a8(nyi khri): ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byorade de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgos zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub
i233b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen go cha chen po bgos pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa lha gnas shing / stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams bye du rgya'i rgyu lngas byung ba mngon par spru'o
i233b2(nyi khri): pa byed do// de ltar bye du rgya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgya khwa srid mngon par sA la par byed do// de ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid mngon par sprul nas zas 'dod
i233b3(nyi khri): pa rnams zas kyi sbyin pa byed do// sgom 'dod pa rnams la sgom/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnaMs la bzhon pa// gos 'dod pa rnams la gos ka me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog/ 'phreng ba 'dod pa la nas/ 
i233b4(nyi khri): la 'phreng ba/ spos 'dod pa rnams la smos// byug pa 'dod pa rnaMs la byug pa/ mal na 'dod pa rnams la mA la cha/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim / 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba/ yo byad 'dod
i233b5(nyi khri): pa rnams la yo byad/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad 'dod pa rnams yo byad/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad kyi sbyin pa khyod do// nor dang 'bru dang mu tig dang bye du rgya dang dung dang ka man shelnga dang byi ru dang gser dang / 
i233b6(nyi khri): dngul 'dod pa rnams la/ nor bu dang mu tig dang bye dUr+ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang dngul dang // smyon pa byin cing myi'i yo byad gang tsa yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin pa byed de/ des de
i233b7(nyi khri): ltar zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ myo'i yo byad gang ni ying rung ba'i bar du byin nas sems can de dag la 'di lta ste// pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstand pa 'di nyid kyi chos
i233b8(nyi khri): stonan to// sam su can de dag gis kyang chos bstan pa de thos nas// bla na myed pa myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon pa rdzogs pa sangs rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu byon pa drug da
i234a1(nyi khri): nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gos lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste skye bo mang mang po'i / 
i234a2(nyi khri): kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs zhig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ myi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar du byin nas rab 'byor nga de la ji snyam du sems sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am sgyu ma'i
i234a3(nyi khri): mkhan pa'i mtshan bu mkhas pa des sems can gang la yang byin pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom lda ni 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang
i234a4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid mngon par sprul te// zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin myi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin yang sems can gang yang ci
i234a5(nyi khri): byin pa byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de de ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu nye bar bzung nas chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor da de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
i234a6(nyi khri): bo ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ ched du bsams te skye ba yongasu
i234a7(nyi khri): bzung bas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigasu skye zhing des 'khor los smra ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/ sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i lam la rab tu 'god do// bsam gtan bzhi dang
i234a8(nyi khri): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / rnam
i234b1(nyi khri): bar tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang 'phags pa'i bden pa dang // ting nge 'dzind dang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
i234b2(nyi khri): bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu 'dod de/ sems can de dag kyang bla na myed pa
i234b3(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur du chos stond pa de nam yang bral bar myi 'gyuraro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am
i234b4(nyi khri): sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshon bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang ba'i tshogs kyi shig mngon par sprul te/ sems can de
i234b5(nyi khri): dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bkod na// rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am / sgyu ma'i
i234b6(nyi khri): mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa des sems can gang yang dge bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa yod dmasangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bkod pa yod dam
i234b7(nyi khri): gsold pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi la
i234b8(nyi khri): la rab tu bkod de kasangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la rab tu bkod kyang sems can gang yang de yang de dag la bkod pa myed do// rab 'byor da de ci'i phyir zhe na
i235a1(nyi khri): de ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu nye bar bzung ba chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis/ de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byord de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa'
i235a2(nyi khri): chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// // bam po// // rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol
i235a3(nyi khri): tu phyind pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sbyor zhing rab tu 'god do// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po bzod
i235a4(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'ged pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub seMs dpa' sems
i235a5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ brgya la sems can thams cad bdag la rdo dang dbyig pas rdeg cing mtshan gis 'debs kyang de bdag gis 'khrug
i235a6(nyi khri): pa'i sems 'ga' ba ma yang bstod par myi bya'o// zhes go cha gyon cing sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de 'dra ba rab tu 'god de/ rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i ma
i235a7(nyi khri): po'am sgyu ma'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug sa/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du spyi bo mang po'i tshogs shing mngon par sprul to/ bzod po'i pha rol
i235a8(nyi khri): tu phyin zi la sbyar ba dang / rab tu dgod par byas na/ rab 'byor de dza snyam bus paso// sgyu mo'i mkhan po 'am sgra mkhan po'i mtshan du mkhas pa des ni/ sems can gang yang ba
i235b1(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das de ni mA mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa ka rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
i235b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad myed grangs myed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bkod kyang sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol da tu phyind pa bkod pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
i235b3(nyi khri): rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bag
i235b4(nyi khri): pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byorard gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha
i235b5(nyi khri): rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing
i235b6(nyi khri): sems can thams cad brtson 'grus gi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ni
i235b7(nyi khri): po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la sems bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad lus kyi dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par skal zhig gzhog go 'god do// 
i235b8(nyi khri): rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhon po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tsho gos kyi mdun du skye ba'i chog
i236a1(nyi khri): shig mngon par sprul te/ lus sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod na// rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i 'khan po 'am sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang lus
i236a2(nyi khri): dang sems dang brtson 'grus la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol de pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa'
i236a3(nyi khri): chen pos sems can thams cad tshad myed grangs myed pa lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
i236a4(nyi khri): rab 'byor de de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid de bzhin pa'i phyin te/ rab 'byor de de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// 
i236a5(nyi khri): rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas shing ka/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa la yang dag par/ 
i236a6(nyi khri): skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor da dza ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gi pha rol
i236a7(nyi khri): tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi chos nyid la gnas shing / chos gang la ya
i236a8(nyi khri): 'khrug pa 'am/ 'khrug pa myed par yang dag par rjes su myi mthong na// bsam gau tan gi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad bsam gtan gi pha rol tu
i236b1(nyi khri): phyind pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog pa dang 'god pa byed de/ de ltar yang dag par skul ba rnams kyang nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas
i236b2(nyi khri): kyi bar du/ nam yang bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa dang bral bar myi 'gyuraro// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis
i236b3(nyi khri): lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye ba mang po'i tshigs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shing mngon par sprul te/ bsam gtan gi pha royid tu phyind pa la bkod ma / rab 'byor/ de
i236b4(nyi khri): la ji snyam du sems sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la bkod pa yod dam gsol de pa bcom
i236b5(nyi khri): ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor du de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad bsam gtan gi pha rol/ 
i236b6(nyi khri): tu phyind pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa la bkod pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnam
i236b7(nyi khri): kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni// go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
i236b8(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas yang dag par skul lo// gzhog go// 'god do// 
i237a1(nyi khri): rab 'byan rje skar n+yas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang/ 
i237a2(nyi khri): dag par skal pa dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang la yang skye bde
i237a3(nyi khri): 'am 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ tshu rold tam/ pha rol tu myi dmyigs te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
i237a4(nyi khri): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang shes d+hib kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byord 'di lta
i237a5(nyi khri): ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ sa
i237a6(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul te/ gzhog cing 'god na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan du ngas
i237a7(nyi khri): sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gas yod pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la da pa rab 'byorard de bzhin du
i237a8(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la bkod kyang sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la bkod pa myed do// de ci'i phyir/ 
i237b1(nyi khri): na/ rab 'byor de de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor da de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni che chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// 
i237b2(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzhan/ yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shong shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig go khams dag du song zhing
i237b3(nyi khri): ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par
i237b4(nyi khri): skal zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang / bsam gtan go pha rol tu
i237b5(nyi khri): phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yA/ 
i237b6(nyi khri): dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// 'di lta ste pha rold tu phyind pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos nyid kyang stond to// sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
i237b7(nyi khri): byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyuraro// lho dang nub dang / byang dang byang shar dang / shar lho dang lho nub dang / nub byang dang 'og dang
i237b8(nyi khri): steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'dzag rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag du song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
i238a1(nyi khri): 'i bar la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul na
i238a2(nyi khri): gzhog go 'god do// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol de tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha ra lod tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan go pha rol tu phyind pa
i238a3(nyi khri): deng / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// 'di la ste pha rol tu phyi nad pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang stond te/ sems can de dag kyang chos de
i238a4(nyi khri): thos nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyi nad pa drug dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgra ni
i238a5(nyi khri): mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste / skye bo mang po'i mdun du skye mo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ pha rol tu
i238a6(nyi khri): phyind pa drug pa yang dag par skul zhing bzhag ste bkod par gyur na/ rab 'byor da de la ji snyam du sems sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang
i238a7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyinid pa drug la yang dag par skul zhing bzhag ste/ bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor/ 
i238a8(nyi khri): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho dang nub dang byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang lho rub dang
i238b1(nyi khri): nub byang dang / 'og dang / seng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug la na
i238b2(nyi khri): kyang / sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyinang pa drug la bkod pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na kA rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i
i238b3(nyi khri): phyir te/ rab 'byord de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go chen po go chen po bgros pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po go cha chen po 'gro/ 
i238b4(nyi khri): pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par spyod cing / sems skyed pa gzhan gi go myi 'byed de tshe// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cag ni sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa
i238b5(nyi khri): la bgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par myi bya'o// de dag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
i238b6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par myi bya'o// bdag gis sems can
i238b7(nyi khri): 'di snyed cig ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la dgod par ba'o// 'di snyed cig ni bgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis 'di snyad cig ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgya
i238b8(nyi khri): kyi bar la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par myi bya'o// bdag gis 'di snyed cig ni rgyun tu zhugs po'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par myi bya'o// bdag gi seMs
i239a1(nyi khri): gcan 'di snyed cig ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par myi bya'o// 
i239a2(nyi khri): bdag gis sems con 'di snyed cig ni rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod
i239a3(nyi khri): par myi bya'o// zhes bya bar sems bskyed pa'i go myi 'byed kyi de 'di snyam du sems te ge bdag gis sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la dgod par bya
i239a4(nyi khri): bdag gisi sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan
i239a5(nyi khri): gi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dgod par bya'o// nang stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// phyi stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// phyi ning stong pa nyid la dgod/ 
i239a6(nyi khri): par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la bgod par bya'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su mo cu rtsa bdun la dgod par bya'o// 'phags pa'o bden pa bzhi dang / 
i239a7(nyi khri): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i smos/ par 'jug pa bzhi dang // rnam par tha dad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i ltos par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam
i239a8(nyi khri): par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang ba mngon par shes pa lA dang / ting ngo 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang la dgod par bya'o// 
i239b1(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so sa yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la dgod par bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
i239b2(nyi khri): 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang lnga phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// rang byang chub kha dgod par bya'o// rnam pa rnams
i239b3(nyi khri): cad mkhyend pa nyid la dgod par bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis le po na'i
i239b4(nyi khri): bzhi mdor 'dug su/ skye bo mang po'i tsho gas kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ 'di ste du bdag sems can tshad myed grangs pa 'di dag pha rol tu phyind pa drug
i239b5(nyi khri): la dgod par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed par gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am
i239b6(nyi khri): sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa des sems can gang yang pha rold tu phyind pa drug la dkod par gyu rad pa yod dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar la bkod par byas
i239b7(nyi khri): po yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems
i239b8(nyi khri): cad tshad myed dregs myed pa pha rold tu phyi nad pa drug dang / rnam pa thos cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bur la dgod par sems bskyed kyang / sems can gang gi don du yang sems skrod pa myed
i240a1(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byorade sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
i240a2(nyi khri): chen po go cha chen po bgros zhes bya'o// ri ba 'byord kyis gsol da ma/ bcom ldan+da 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' ses
i240a3(nyi khri): dpa' chen pos ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i slad du go cha chen po bgos par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs gis stong ngo // 
i240a4(nyi khri): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ngo // myag myig gis stong ngo // rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yod yid gis stong ngo // gzugs gzugs
i240a5(nyi khri): kyis stong ngo // sgra dang dri dang po dang reg dang / chos chos kyis skong ngo // myig gi rnam par shes pa myig gi rnam par shes pas stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang // sA'i rnam par shes pa
i240a6(nyi khri): dang lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo // myig gi 'dus te reg pa myig gi 'dus te reg pas stong / 
i240a7(nyi khri): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yod kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo // myig gi
i240a8(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba gi myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor bas stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nid kyis tshor ba dang / sde'i 'dus te reg reg pa'i rkyen kyis
i240b1(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du she su dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis chod pa dang lus kyi 'dus te reka pa'i rkyend kyis nor ba deng/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus
i240b2(nyi khri): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol de tu phyind pas song ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol dri tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa
i240b3(nyi khri): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rolan tu phyind pa dang bla shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ka shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pas stong ngo
i240b4(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi b.rag/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
i240b5(nyi khri): sum cu rtsa bdun/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gso stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
i240b6(nyi khri): pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang
i240b7(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'ja ni dang gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang myi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang ka sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres
i240b8(nyi khri): baM rnaMs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo // bcom ldan 'das byang chub sem+b+has dpa' seMs dpa' stong ngo // go cha chen po yang go mchen pos stong sa/ bcom ldan 'a
i241a1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen mchis pa'i go cha chen bgos par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor da rdza
i241a2(nyi khri): skad du smras pa de bzhin de/ de de bzhin te de de bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang ma byas// mngon par ma byas / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
i241a3(nyi khri): pos gang gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas so// gsold pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
i241a4(nyi khri): ma bgyis/ rnam par ma bgyis/ mngon par ma bgyis pa lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gis don du go cha bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ci'i slad du ma bgyis
i241a5(nyi khri): rnam par ma bgyis/ mngon par ma bgyis pa lagasabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lud pa/ rab 'byor de byed pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma byas// rnam par
i241a6(nyi khri): ma byas mngon par ma byas so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas so// de ci'i phyir
i241a7(nyi khri): zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di ltar gzugs myi byed/ rnam par myi byed mngon par myi byed do// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa myi byed rnam par myi byed/ mngon par myi byed do// rab 'byor
i241a8(nyi khri): myig myi byed/ rnam par myi byed/ mngon par myi byed do// rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid myi byed/ rnam par myi byed mngon par myi byed do// rab 'byor gzugs myi byed/ rnam par myi byed mngon par
i241b1(nyi khri): myi byed do// sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang chos myi byed/ rnam par myi byed/ mngon par myi byed do// rab 'byor dmyig gi rnam par shes pa myi byed/ rnam par myi byed mngon par myi byed do// rna ba'i rnam par
i241b2(nyi khri): shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa myi byed mngon par myi byed do// rab 'byoradamyig gi 'dus te reg pa
i241b3(nyi khri): myi byed/ rnam par myi byed/ mngon par myi byed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myi
i241b4(nyi khri): byed rnam par myi byed/ mngon par myi byed do// rab 'byor da myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba myi byed/ rnam par myi byed/ mngon par myi byed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
i241b5(nyi khri): ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
i241b6(nyi khri): tshor ba myi byed/ rnam par myi byed// mngon par myi byed do// rab 'byor da ni myi byed de/ rnam par myi byed mngon par myi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shi nang tu myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro// 
i241b7(nyi khri): rab 'byor de sems can ni myi byed/ rnam par myi byed/ mngon par myi byed de nga / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin du myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro// gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / 
i241b8(nyi khri): shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po myi byed rnam par myi byed/ mngon par mi byed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shi nad du myi dmyigs
i242a1(nyi khri): pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nga stsol ma ni myi byed/ rnam par myi byed mngon par myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor
i242a2(nyi khri): sgyu ma dang smra brnyan dang / myig yod dang gzugs brnyan dang / smyig rgyu dang / smrab pa ni myi byed rnam par myi byed/ mngon par myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shi nang du ma
i242a3(nyi khri): dmyigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni myi byed/ rnam par myi byed/ mngon par myi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin du rnam par myi dmyigs pa'i phyir
i242a4(nyi khri): rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes
i242a5(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni myi byed rnam par myi byed mngon par myi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shi nang du myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro// shA rab 'byor nga nang stong pa nyid ni byed
i242a6(nyi khri): rnam par myi byed/ mngon par myi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shi na tu myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar myi byed/ rnam
i242a7(nyi khri): rnam par myi byed mngon par myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shi nang du rnam par myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor dade byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su ma bcu rtsa bdun ni myi byed
i242a8(nyi khri): rnam par myi byed/ mngon par myi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na// de shi nang du myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshud myed pa
i242b1(nyi khri): rnams dang / gzugs myed pa la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang karnam pa mtha rad pa brgyad dang / mthad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo so
i242b2(nyi khri): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 
i242b3(nyi khri): myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad na myi byed/ rnam par myi byed/ mngon par myi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu
i242b4(nyi khri): myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de de bzhin nyid ni myi byed/ rna bar myi byed mngon par myi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de sha nid du myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma
i242b5(nyi khri): yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang // chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gas myi khyab pa'i dbyings ni myi byed
i242b6(nyi khri): rnam par myi byed/ mngon par myi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shind tu myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de byang chub ni myi byed/ rnam par myi byed/ mngon par myi byed de/ de shin du myi dmyigs
i242b7(nyi khri): pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni myi byed/ rna bar myi byed mngon par myi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shi nad du myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de rnam grangs des na/ 
i242b8(nyi khri): de 'di ltar rnam par thams cad mkhyend pa nyid de ma byas/ rnam par myi byed/ mngon par ma byas par rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go chen po bgos pa'i seMs
i243a1(nyi khri): can de dag kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po go na chen po bgos
i243a2(nyi khri): pa ni/ ga ma chen po bgos rba zhes bya'o// gsolang pa bcom ldan 'angs bdag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i ngan 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni bcings ma gol
i243a3(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / bcings ma grol ba'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams pa'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byorang la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan
i243a4(nyi khri): pa rab 'byor nga gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// yin nam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin te/ tshe dang
i243a5(nyi khri): ldan pa gong po gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar ma
i243a6(nyi khri): btsongs ma grol ba'i gzugs gang yin/ de ltar ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di rmi lam lta bu'i
i243a7(nyi khri): gzugs de dag ni ma bcings ma gol ba'o// gang 'di rmi lam lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nim bcings ma grol ba'o/ gang 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu
i243a8(nyi khri): dag rgyag sangs su nga / gdugs nas su sa phyi m+bu'i ming/ gi bu grus po rnam pams mthal pas/ ga dul bas su yang nga / 'dugs
i243b1(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa de ni ma bcings ma grol bar/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni bcings
i243b2(nyi khri): ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gzugs ni ma bcings ma gol ba'o// ma 'dris pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grolan
i243b3(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa gang po da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhen
i243b4(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs myed pa'i phyir/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma
i243b5(nyi khri): grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa ma
i243b6(nyi khri): bcings ma grol ba'o// gzugs ma skyes pa'i phyir/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa ma
i243b7(nyi khri): bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa glang po drage ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dge ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes po ni ma bcings ma grol ba'i/ tshe dang / 
i243b8(nyi khri): ldan pa gang ba myi dge ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// myi dge ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byad dang / rnam par shes pa nam bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po lung mu bsdu
i244a1(nyi khri): gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// lung du ma bstan pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'i// tshe dang ldan po glang po 'jig rten pa'i gzu
i244a2(nyi khri): ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// 'jig rten pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma
i244a3(nyi khri): grol ba'o// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po zag pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol
i244a4(nyi khri): zag pa dang bcas pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po zag pa myed pa'i gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// zag pa myed pa'i
i244a5(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs myed pa'i phyir/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 
i244a6(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang 'du she
i244a7(nyi khri): dang / 'du byad dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes byas bcings ma grol ba'o// gzugs ma skyes pa'i phyir/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed do
i244a8(nyi khri): rnam pa lags pa ma bachis ma grol ba'i/ me dang ldan pa gang ba rgyas thams cad / ngam pa sa ma nyel bu'o/ myong nga'i phyir ma ba sa ma grol bya'o// dben pa'i phyi ma sangs ma grol byar/ ma smras
i244b1(nyi khri): ma cings ma grol dag/ dang l+h+wan pa yang basbyin pa pha rol du phyin pa rnam bcings ma grol pa'o// nul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / kyi
i244b2(nyi khri): tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa ni me bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang po myed pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bcang
i244b3(nyi khri): ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// myed pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson
i244b4(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma grol ma bcings pa'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir
i244b5(nyi khri): ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po nang stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// phyi stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dngos po myed po'i ngo bo nyid kyi
i244b6(nyi khri): bar yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po myed pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma gol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// myed
i244b7(nyi khri): pa'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir phyi nang stong ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'i phyir/ myong pa'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma
i244b8(nyi khri): grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// myed pa'i phyir dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyi mo bcis
i245a1(nyi khri): grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir myed bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa glang po byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po
i245a2(nyi khri): myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun ma bcings ma grol ba'i/ dben pa'i phyir ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin gsheg
i245a3(nyi khri): pa'i stobs bcu'i bar dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po myed pa'i phyir/ 
i245a4(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar/ 
i245a5(nyi khri): du ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po myed pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings me grol lo// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma go/ 
i245a6(nyi khri): pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' yang ma bcis ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po myed pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol bar/ ma skyes pa'i phyir
i245a7(nyi khri): ma bcings ma grol bar/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// me nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos
i245a8(nyi khri): gnas nyid dang / chos sbyin myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i rnapa yang ma bcos ma bral ba ga/ ni dang ldan pa gang po snang par phyir/ dpazhin nyid ma ngas sa grol bar// dben pa'i phyirnam pa
i245b1(nyi khri): ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// myed pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha'i ban du ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings
i245b2(nyi khri): me ga la ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa glang po 'dus byas kyi khams kyang ma btsongs ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po myed pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byas ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma po cings ma gro
i245b3(nyi khri): ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma gol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mo bcings ma grol ba'ozhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo ste/ de ni sbyin
i245b4(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol
i245b5(nyi khri): tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' ma bcings ma grol ba'o// 
i245b6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid
i245b7(nyi khri): chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o// 'dus ma byas ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ tshul khris kyi
i245b8(nyi khri): pha rol du phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ 
i246a1(nyi khri): ma bzhings ma grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la gnas/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i de bzhin nyid la gnas/ ma bcings ma gol ba'i ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / ma bamangs
i246a2(nyi khri): ma grol ba'i gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos kyi dbyings dang / ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos skyon myed nyid dang / ma bcings ma grol ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas/ ma
i246a3(nyi khri): bcings ma grol ba'i 'dus ma byas la gnas te/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams ya su smin par byed de/ ma btsongs ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed dade/ ma bas ma
i246a4(nyi khri): grol ba'i dam bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed do// ma bcings ma grol po'i de ma brtsis ma grol ba'i chos nyan to// ma bcings ma grol ba'i ngo mo bcings ma
i246a5(nyi khri): lci ba'i bangs rgyas bamam ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba'i dam bcings ma grol ba'i mngon par gas pa rnas dang rnam yang bral bar mye 'gyung gi bcings ma
i246a6(nyi khri): bral ba dem bsos ma rgyal ba'i myog lnga dang nam yang sprul bar myi 'gyur ro// ma bsres ma kIl bdum brtsis ma grol pa gdus rnams dpa sa yang bral par myi 'gyur// ma tshangs sa sa
i246a7(nyi khri): rjes pa sum thas pa do na rnam sa da ma yang bres par skye gyur/ sa bas sa sbrel bdum pas sus klas pa'i rnamam sa sang mkhyen pa byed sgrung bar rgyu / satshamam ma
i246a8(nyi khri): bdam paci sa mgul sa rnam kyi kyis sang ma khyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs pa pa myeng na ra gyur / sa bsam ma tshul ba'i nas kyi sa na nga hrI / ma gas ci
i246a9(nyi khri): mkhacad tsha ma gros na decir sa mi grol lam kye rnam nas nyid smra 'gyu
i246b1(nyi khri): ma gol ba'i sems can rnams theg bla gsum la rab tu 'god par 'gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa chen po ma bcings ma gul du/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa mang kyi
i246b2(nyi khri): ma grol ba myed pa dang / dben pa dang / skye ba myed pa nye bar bzung zhing / chos thams cad khong du chud pa myed do// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma bcings ma gol bI
i246b3(nyi khri): theg pa chen po'i go cha bgos par rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg
i246b4(nyi khri): pa chen po ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das tsam gris na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par rig par bgyi ba lags/ theg pa de ni gang nas byung ba
i246b5(nyi khri): lags/ theg pa de ni gang du gnas par 'gyur ba lags/ theg pa des ni su zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsolang pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'di skad ces bka
i246b6(nyi khri): stsalang to// rab 'byorang gang khyod de skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po gang zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor pa ral tu phyind pa drug ni ni byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen
i246b7(nyi khri): po'i theg pa chen po ste/ drug gang she na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
i246b8(nyi khri): gtan gi pha ra lang du phyind pa dang / nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ngas
i247a1(nyi khri): du sa sgyu sa nas/ sa ma kyang du bu mang du bas byed / blan myed pa mang dag zer rdzogs pa byang mu rgya
i247a2(nyi khri): tshul zhes ya suM stsos pa 'don byung chub sems dpa'i sems dag rten pa'i sbyin pa'is mang du na pa'o// gas meng po bcom ldan 'das byang chubs sa dpa' sems dpa chen pa/ tshu
i247a3(nyi khri): kyi pha rolang phyin pa gang legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems skyed
i247a4(nyi khri): pas/ bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas na/ sems can te/ ra lang sa dag pa bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas na/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis
i247a5(nyi khri): yang dag par skul ba dang / gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongasu ma nyams pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'du/ 
i247a6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po/ 
i247a7(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ bdag kyang bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin la/ gzhan yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis bzod pa la yang dag par skul ba
i247a8(nyi khri): 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rolang du phyinang pa'o// gsald pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin
i247b1(nyi khri): gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkan su yang pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ bdag kya
i247b2(nyi khri): rolung tu phyind pa drug la brtson par myi 'dor zhing / gzhan yang pha rol tu phyind pa drug la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis sbyor ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha
i247b3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa'o/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byar
i247b4(nyi khri): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po bdog kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ bsam gtan rnams la thabs mkhas par mnyam par gzhog kyang de dag
i247b5(nyi khri): dbang gyis myi skye zhing / gzhan yang bsam gtan rnams la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yang dag par skul ba 'di/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam rten gi pha rold tu phyin pa'o// 
i247b6(nyi khri): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sas
i247b7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ bdag kyang chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa myed par chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmyigs pa
i247b8(nyi khri): pa myed pa'i tshul gis rtogs par myi byed cing / sems can rnams kyang chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa myed pas dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba myi dmyigs pa'i nul gyi
i248a1(nyi khri): yang dag par skul zhing / gnog pa dang rab tu 'god pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha ral du phrind pa ste/ rab 'byor nga byang chub seMs dpa' ses pa
i248a2(nyi khri): chen pa'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dag phyi nong stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid sa
i248a3(nyi khri): nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / ngan dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang mi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / 
i248a4(nyi khri): ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid sngang
i248a5(nyi khri): mnyid dang / dngas pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de/ de la nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ nang gi chos zhes bya ba ni/ myig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lci dang / lus dang / yid dang / de la myi rtag myi 'jig
i248a6(nyi khri): m+b+hi m+b+han gas seng nga/ dang suman/ na yin phy-ir ba/ myo gA 'angs pa'i phyog ni dang / sna ga tu dang / sus dang / mau kyis snang na/ 
i248a7(nyi khri): na po po / ngan na ma pa nyid/ das byung ba dag na/ phyis sa b+ta hU~M/ zugs d+hA m+b+ha hA/ d+hi dang / ra ga dang / ma rnam / das rkye pa gang+gAms pan
i248a8(nyi khri): kyi nga go phyo na/ 'a na sbyin pa byo / ba du sa kyi 'ag phyir sna dang / dri nga dang ra dang / sa cas kyis da / pyo bya da/ du 'ang ban
i248b1(nyi khri): pa'i phyir to// 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid zhes bya'o// de la phyi nang stong pa nyid gang zhen nang kyi skye mched drug dang / 'di dag ni phyi nang gi chos zhes bya ste/ de la myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i nang gi chos rnams phyi'i chos
i248b2(nyi khri): kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir/ chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid ga
i248b3(nyi khri): yin pa de stong pa nyid de stong pa nyid kyis stongango // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la chen po stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir
i248b4(nyi khri): shar phyogs shar phyogs kyis stong ngo / lho phyogs lho phyogs kyis stong / nub phyogs nub phyogs kyis stong ngo // byang phyogs byang phyogs kyis stong ngo / 'og gi phyogs 'og gi phyogs kyis stong / 
i248b5(nyi khri): steng gi phyogs steng gi phyogs kyis stong / phyogs 'tshams rjes phyogs 'tshams rnams kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la don
i248b6(nyi khri): dam pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid gang zhe ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang / mya ngan las 'das pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i
i248b7(nyi khri): rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams dang / #
i248b8(nyi khri): myeng pa'i khams te/ dol mye rtag myi 'jig pa byor/ 'dod pa'i khams dong pa'i khams kyis stodang / gzugs kyi khoms gzugs kyi khams kyis stong ngo // gzugs myed pa'i khams gzugs sa
i249a1(nyi khri): khams kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zhes bya ba na
i249a2(nyi khri): gang la skye ba myed pa dang 'gag pa myed pa'i dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myed pa 'ang ni 'dus ma byas zhes bya ste/ myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir te/ 'dus ma byas de ni 'dus ma byas kyis stong ngo / de ci'i phyir
i249a3(nyi khri): zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la mtha' myi dmyigs pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa ste/ myi rtag myi 'jig pa
i249a4(nyi khri): phyir/ mtha' las 'das pa mtha' las 'das pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ 
i249a5(nyi khri): gang la thog ma myi dmyigs shing / tha ma yang mi dmyigs pa de la 'gro ba yang myi dmyigs 'ang ba yang myi dmyigs te/ myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma myed pa thog ma dang tha myed pa stong ngo // de ci'i phyir / 
i249a6(nyi khri): 'ang bzhin du yin pa'i phyir te/ 'don thug sa da tha ma skyed pa snang pa nyid ces bya'o// la ngar ba myed pa stong nyid gang ni na gang la yang dang bamyang ba ste/ myi rtag myi 'jig par phyir dor bskyed pas song // 
i249a7(nyi khri): phyir na/ 'a po na yin par / don snyed pa gang ba kyi skyes bya/ dal ba na snang ba nyid gnan/ lus byas sam// rgyas ma sa kyang du ste/ sa pa
i249a8(nyi khri): ma sa gakyisas bya/ sas su rloms shesas gyis sa sa sa smra
i249b1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas te/ myi rtag myi 'jug pa'i phyir nga bzhin gis slong ngo // de ci'i phyir nan kyin so ma nyid du min pa'i phyir te// 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la nus thos cings
i249b2(nyi khri): dang zhe na// chos thams cad ces bya ba ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'dugs dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / myig dang na 'a du / sna dang / spyi dang / lus dang / yod dag/ zug pa
