i249b4(nyi khri): kyi rnam par shes pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang
i249b5(nyi khri): skyes gi 'dus te rig par rkyend kyis chur ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyan gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i nind kyi tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dag/ lus kyi 'dus
i249b6(nyi khri): rnyeg pa'i rkyend kyis tshar po dang / yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / gzugs yod pa'i chos dang / gzugs myed pa'i chos dang / dus bya smra dang / dus ma byas kyi chos dang / 'di dag ni chos thams
i249b7(nyi khri): s+ho/ sa sbyor/ sa thams pa smras mas sa snang/ de Sh+T+ri A/ de nga na du ra / 'di na lam nga ba sa skye// gas
i249b8(nyi khri): las yomacan nga byung ba las kyid/ jus sa ni na rgya / bre na mu tu bya / rnas pags na
i250a1(nyi khri): pa'i phyir 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid de dag gis chos de dag zhes cad stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gi
i250a2(nyi khri): bzhin ni de yin pa'i phyir ro// 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la myi dmyigs pa gang zhe na/ gang la 'das pa myi dmyigs pa dang / ma 'ongs pa myi dmyigs pa dang / da ltar byung ba gnas myi dmyigs pa ste/ myi rtag myi 'jig pa
i250a3(nyi khri): myi dmyigs pa myi dmyigs pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ chos thas cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
i250a4(nyi khri): phyir/ 'dus pa'i ngo nyid myed de/ myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir / 'dus pa 'dus pas stong / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// / bam po
i250a5(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzhan yang dngos po ni dngos pos stong ngo // dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas stong ngo // rang bzhin ni de'i rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gzhan gi dngos po ni dngos pos stong ngo // de la dngas po das
i250a6(nyi khri): zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ phyung po lnga ste/ phung po lnga po de dag kyang phung po rnams kyis stong pas/ de ltar dngos po dngos pos stong ngo // de ji ltar dngos po myed pa dngos po myed stong na na/ dngos po myed pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas
i250a7(nyi khri): 'dus ma byas de yang 'dus ma byas kyis stong pas/ de ltar na dngos po myed pa dngos po myed pas stong ngo // ji ltar rang bzhin rang bzhin gis stong zhe na/ rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid ma nor ba ste/ de ltar stong pa nyid gang yin
i250a8(nyi khri): de ni shes pas ma byas/ mthong bas ma byas te/ 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// de la gzhan gi dngos po grong zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos kyi gnas
i250b1(nyi khri): nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / mu nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i ni de bzhin du gnas te/ de ltar chos de dag gi gzhi
i250b2(nyi khri): gis stong pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan gi dngos po stong pa nyid ces bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po
i250b3(nyi khri): saM skye seM/ rab bar dag pa zhes bya ba'i titing 'dzin dang / rin cen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sing ge'i rnam par bamin zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba bzang ba zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i rgyal
i250b4(nyi khri): dpal zhes pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
i250b5(nyi khri): kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya
i250b6(nyi khri): lha rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting dzin dang / dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin dang / nges pa'i
i250b7(nyi khri): tshig la gdon myi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshig bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yong su 'dzin pa
i250b8(nyi khri): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyam pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / nam mkha' rgyas par 'gyengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
i251a1(nyi khri): rtso lwa ba myed pa zhe bya ba'i rting nge 'dzind dang
i251a2(nyi khri): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyun nos bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rkyen gyi rjesu song ba zhes bya ba'i ti
i251a3(nyi khri): nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rno bar bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snrel gzhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas pa
i251a4(nyi khri): la rten pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma myed pa'i sgron mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
i251a5(nyi khri): 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma myed pa zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi sgron ma zhes
i251a6(nyi khri): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zang myi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / myi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi' brjod yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / zad pa dang bral ba'i zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
i251a7(nyi khri): g.yo' ba zhes ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
i251a8(nyi khri): 'dzin dang / snang ba'i gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes
i251a9(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin dang / sems gnas pa nas bya ba de 'dzin dang / kun tu stong ba zhes bya ba'i tid nge 'dren sa rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting ngo 'dzin dang / rin can mam shes bya ba'i ting nge dzin dang / 
i251b1(nyi khri): dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dag 'bru spong ba zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par tha
i251b2(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bye ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba'i zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
i251b3(nyi khri): dmyigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa myang par zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mying nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas
i251b4(nyi khri): myed par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab rib myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / g.yo ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
i251b5(nyi khri): dang / yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems myed pa gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing
i251b6(nyi khri): gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
i251b7(nyi khri): chos thams cad las 'dar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yong su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nom nur rnam par selang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang sa sa zhes pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rga gyi ma sa
i251b8(nyi khri): las zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'dor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtogs pa srid pa
i252a1(nyi khri): gzhi thams cad khod du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brda' dang sgro la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dbyangs yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgron ma 'bar bzhes
i252a2(nyi khri): ting nge dzin dang / mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par dmyigs pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal
i252a3(nyi khri): thams cad la zad pa myi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gal
i252a4(nyi khri): dang sheg pa thams yang dag pa rgyal bzhis byang badzin dang / mthun pa dang la byung pa zhes bya la ma nga/ 'dus myed pa gas bya ba stong pa na / 
i252a5(nyi khri): 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma myed par rgyas pa'i 'o ces bya ba ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtun mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen du'ang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de// 
i252a6(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul myed cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs
i252a7(nyi khri): pa dang sa pa thams cad can mongs pa snyed par yang dag pa rogasas te zhes bya ba tong nge 'dzin da/ gnas dmyigs su myed pa la brtson pa zhes bya bya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems myed pa
i252a8(nyi khri): bya co na dang / sus kyi rgyan da da khye sa nas bya ba badzin dang / dag sa tan sna dag par rjig pas rnam sa pa ltar da pa zhes bya ba dzin du/ rang rnam star ga
i252b1(nyi khri): la byu chu gro ba zla ba'i ting nge 'dzun rna tid du 'dzin de ni/ 'dzin rdzas kyi spyod mal la skyed pa ste/ 'di ni dpa' 'gre'i zhes bya ba'i tri nge 'dzin de nyi
i252b2(nyi khri): rnam par grol zhang gos pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rin cen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod yul la spyod pa tshe/ 'di ni dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya
i252b3(nyi khri): 'dzin to// de la rin cin phyag rgya nas bya ba'i tong nge 'dzin gang shA na/ ting nge 'dzin des ting nga 'dzin thams cad rgyas btan bulta bur 'gyur bste/ 'din na sbyin phyag rgya zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin tu/ de la seng ge rnam
i252b4(nyi khri): rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam par brtse ba ste/ 'di ni seng ge rnam par brtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de la zla ba bzang po zhes pa'i ting nge 'dzin
i252b5(nyi khri): nen ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa ste ni'adi ni zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin to// de la zla ba rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na// ting nge 'dzin du la granas
i252b6(nyi khri): na rnams pa ma mdun na pa ste/ 'don rgyal man dang zhes bya ba na to/ sa rdzas rnams padasas shin du phags pags bya ba pod pa dzin ga zhan/ na pa
i252b7(nyi khri): rten thams ca kyi ma na par zhags pa ste/ din nas rnams cad las shin tu pags pa zhes bya ba'i ting pe na to/ de la spyi bcug rnam pa gaganas pa / nga lan ga na na// nga badzin la
i252b8(nyi khri): rgyas rgyartags papa ma kyi byasas byonas pa ba gyi / de se pa'i na 'i shing tu ba sto rjon ga na
i253a1(nyi khri): nges par 'dzin ste// 'di ni nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thas cad 'jig par 'gyur ba
i253a2(nyi khri): 'di ni rdo rje nas bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang shi na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya la 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni ces thams cad
i253a3(nyi khri): kyi phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas
i253a4(nyi khri): pa ste/ 'di ni ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la 'od zer rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting te 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thas cad kyi 'ad zer
i253a5(nyi khri): rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bye ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stabs rnam par bkod pa ste/ 'di ni dpung rnam
i253a6(nyi khri): bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// da la yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhen/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad cang yang dag par 'phags par 'gyur ba ste/ 'an
i253a7(nyi khri): yang dag par pags pa nas ba nas/ das nges pa chog mo gdan gyin par dzug panas pa bstong ba can pa/ ral tshig bla sa pa yang dag par jug pas rgya da
i253a8(nyi khri): byags rnasu ma rna ma nas bya ba spong napa na/ dag sa nga / nga jom mam par kyi gas ma pa sa paste/ dzin gas rnam na rgya nga po ga/ 
i253b1(nyi khri): rgya yong su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la nyam pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting ngo 'dzin ga she na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad nyam par myi 'gyur ba ste/ 'do na nyam pa myed pa na
i253b2(nyi khri): nga badzin te/ de sa thams yang ya dag par brgya rnam mo smras rgyas na da na na das gnas ga pa na mas pa tshun la na
i253b3(nyi khri): di ni sa nas 'ang yang dag pa bcub rgya mtsho'i phyag d+hag nas bya ba dzin to// des nam ma rgyas par tshangs pa zhes bya ba'o/ na ga na na/ ting lani la gnas shing
i253b4(nyi khri): thams cad kyis nam mkhar rgyas par 'grengs pa ste/ 'di ni nam mkha' rgyas par 'byings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas
i253b5(nyi khri): shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yongasu 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni rdo rje dgal 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ga she na/ ting nge 'dzin da la gnas
i253b6(nyi khri): nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma rab tu sel ba ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa spang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'don gang she na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin
i253b7(nyi khri): cad lham me ldan ne ltung nger byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rgol pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos gang yang tshol ba myed pa sa
i253b8(nyi khri): 'don tshol ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la gnas kyi chen po myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ga na na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos gang la yang gnas pa chen par yang rjes su myi mdzang
i254a1(nyi khri): dun na shin pa myang pashes byu / nga lan/ das sems myang byanas bya ba spyod 'dzin dug na/ nga ba dzin pa laganas dog/ sems cadas 'byung/ sems las zung
i254a2(nyi khri): khyu na tu nga sgyus smra na na pa gan ma ma kyi rna ma ngas rgya
i254a3(nyi khri): ni dum myong ba'i spyan mgos bya ba dong dzin/ des 'ang mthar mos pa zhes bya ba'i dzin ga nan/ nga lan de la gnas shing / 'das thar yas par byud pa ste/ 'du ma rnamatha'ams man
i254a4(nyi khri): nga nge 'dzin te/ de la'ang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin 'di thob ma thag tu/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od byed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting
i254a5(nyi khri): 'dzin te/ de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni kun du snang ba zhes bya bar nga
i254a6(nyi khri): 'dzin to// de la dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba dong ti 'dzin gang zhe nA/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thob pa ste/ 'di ni rig pa bo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de la 'od dri ma myo
i254a7(nyi khri): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang she na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thas cad kyi dri ma spel ba ste/ 'di ni 'od du ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa
i254a8(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dga' banyas su myong ba 'gyur ba ste/ 'don dga' ba byed pa zhes pa po'i tshong nge 'dzin to// de la glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gasbyin na/ ting
i254b1(nyi khri): gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgron ma byed pa ste/ 'di ni glog gi skyon ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la zang myi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang shen/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas
i254b2(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad shes pa/ zad myi shes pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ 'di ni zad myi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la gzi' brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la
i254b3(nyi khri): gang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi gzi'i brjid dang / dpal gis 'bar bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni gzi'i brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin
i254b4(nyi khri): glanas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad myi shes par rjes su mthong nas/ rdul tsam yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba de ltar mthong bya ste/ 'di ni zad pa dang bral ba zhes pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la myi g.yo
i254b5(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad myi g.yo myi 'gul rab tu myi 'byed/ rlom sems su myi byed pa ste/ 'di ni myi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dro la
i254b6(nyi khri): pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gad+hA shi nA/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig par yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni 'jig pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la nyi ma'i sgron
i254b7(nyi khri): zhes byas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgro snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de l-i zla ba de ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'a
i254b8(nyi khri): byang shi na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad mun pa myed par byed byaste// 'di ni zla bya drim myed pa zhes bya ba tong po chen te/ de la snang bags pa pazhes bya ba'i dang po dzin d+hi/ du la snang ba gsal
i255a1(nyi khri): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rab tu thob pa ste/ 'di ni snang ba gsel ba zhes byar ting nge 'dzin te/ 
i255a2(nyi khri): de la snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgra snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni snang bar byed ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin // de la bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba/ 
i255a3(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi bya ba rnams byed pa ste/ 'di ni bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ 
i255a4(nyi khri): nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dpa' yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de la rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'a
i255a5(nyi khri): brgyas shing / ting de tshan rnams sa pa nyid nga lan da yang dag pa mu sa sbyimamapa yang dun pa byed pa ste/ don thas smranas bya na/ de la sems gnas pa nas bya / 
i255a6(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / sems myi g.yo' ba rnam par myi ldog/ yongs su yi chud par myi 'dzin nyams su myi bde' ba myed de// de la sems zhes bya ba ni/ 'di yin zhes byar
i255a7(nyi khri): sems myi 'byung ba ste/ 'di ni sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar yang dag pa
i255a8(nyi khri): rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting pa dzin te/ de la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ti nge 'dzi
i255b1(nyi khri): thams cad la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de lta na cen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thas cad rin cen
i255b2(nyi khri): mtha' shes bya ba ting nge 'dzin to// de la chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba ting bye 'dzin gang she na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad phyag rgya myed pa'i rgyas btab pa nye bar bzung bar byag/ 
i255b3(nyi khri): btab pa zhes 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te// de la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos gang yang mnya
i255b4(nyi khri): nyid du ma chud pa myed par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing
i255b5(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad kyi dga' ba spong ba ste/ 'di ni dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la chos kyi 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos
i255b6(nyi khri): thams cad kyi mun pa sel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni chos kyi 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
i255b7(nyi khri): gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad rnam par 'thor ba ste/ 'di ni rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang
i255b8(nyi khri): zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la yi ge mnyam par dgodang / 
i256a1(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob ste/ 'di ni yi ge mnyam par dgod par bya
i256a2(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin to// de la yi ge dang bral ba zhes pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge gcig kyang dmyigs pa myed pa ste/ 'di ni yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ti
i256a3(nyi khri): nge 'dzin to// de la dmyigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dmyigs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni dmyigs pa gcod pa zhes bya
i256a4(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin to// de la 'gyur ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad 'gyur myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni 'gyur ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de la rnam
i256a5(nyi khri): pa myed pa zhes bya ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing // chos thams cad kyi rnam pa tsam yang dmyigs pa myeng pa ste/ 'di na rnam pa myeng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de la gnas myed par
i256a6(nyi khri): spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi gnas dmyigs pa myed pa ste/ 'di ni gnas myed par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de lo rab rig
i256a7(nyi khri): myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi rab ribu sel ba ste// 'di ni rab rab myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting / 
i256a8(nyi khri): nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'od spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la g.yo' ba myeng pa zhes
i256b1(nyi khri): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na// ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad g.yo' ba myed par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni g.yo ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la yul las
i256b2(nyi khri): rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod yul las yang dag par 'da' ba ste/ 'di ni yul las rgol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la yon tan thas
i256b3(nyi khri): cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yon tan gi tshogs rjes su thob pa ste/ 'di ni yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs
i256b4(nyi khri): su gyurar pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la sems myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la sems myi 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni sems myed par gnas pa
i256b5(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dge bya'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba rab tu thob ste
i256b6(nyi khri): 'di ni dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ tshe la spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la gnas
i256b7(nyi khri): shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi byang chub kyi yan lag rab tu thob pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge
i256b8(nyi khri): 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spobs pa mtha' yas pa rab tu thob ste/ 'di ni spobs pa mtha' yas pa rab tu thob tu thob ste/ de la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge/ 
i257a1(nyi khri): 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa rab tu thob pa ste/ 'di ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la chos thos /

i257a3(nyi khri): ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la yong su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyad mthong ba ste/ 'di ni yongs su gtsad pa zhes bya ba'i

i257a5(nyi khri): rab tu thob pa ste/ 'di ni nem nur rnam par som ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la gnas su bya ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi gnas yang dag pa rjes
i257a6(nyi khri): su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni gnas su bya ba myed pa zhes bye ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin na gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos gang yang gnyis su yang
i257a7(nyi khri): bar rjes su myi mthong ngo // 'di ni gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad dang ting
i257a8(nyi khri): 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rnam pa gcig tu gyur ba zhes pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ 
i257b1(nyi khri): 'dzin de la gnas shib/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam pa yang dag par rdzogasu myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rnam par 'dor ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang

i257b3(nyi khri): khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad rtogs par byed pa'i ye shes la zhugs nas// de la zhugs pa'i phyir khong du chud pa gang yang myed pa ste/ 
i257b4(nyi khri): 'di ni rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi

i257b6(nyi khri): thams cad yi ge dang dral bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni sgra dbus kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la snyan ma 'bar bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gduzhan/ ting 'dzin de la
i257b7(nyi khri): gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad gzi' brjid kyis lham me lha ne lha der byed pa ste/ 'di ni spyan ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la mtshan nyid yongasu sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ 
i257b8(nyi khri): nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi mtshan nyid yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni mtshan nyid yongasu sbyong bar zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la mngon par dmyigs pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
i258a1(nyi khri): 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon par dmyigs pa myed par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni mngon par dmyigs pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i

i258a5(nyi khri): tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad du zung bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni zad myi shes pa'i za ma tog zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
i258a6(nyi khri): de bzugs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / gzungs thams cad yong su 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de lta yang dag pa dang logs
i258a7(nyi khri): thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag pa dang / log pa thams cad yang dag pa dang / log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba n+de

i258b1(nyi khri): mthong ba ste/ 'di ni 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la mthun pa dang 'grol ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting

i258b3(nyi khri): gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni 'od de ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// daM l-I snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /

i258b7(nyi khri): shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad du 'ong byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na// ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thas
i258b8(nyi khri): cad la 'khrug pa myi dmyigs/ rtse gcig kyang myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin
i259a1(nyi khri): thams cad canamangs par 'gyur ba ste/ 'din tan mdas pa myed par yang dag par ldanal pa zhes bya ba'i ding nge 'dzin to// de la nyon mongs pa myed pa dang bcas pa thams cad can mongs pa skyed pa yang dag pa
i259a2(nyi khri): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang nan/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ba ste// 'di na nyon mongs pa thams cad nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par ga
i259a3(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la gnas dmyigs su myed pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi kun gzhi nye bar myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni gnas dmyig su myed pa la
i259a4(nyi khri): brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la de bzhin nyid la gnas shing / sems myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las phyir myi ldog pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin nyi/ 
i259a5(nyi khri): la gnas shing / sems myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi skyon myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni la
i259a6(nyi khri): kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pa pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thas cad kyi ngag gi las myi dmyis
i259a7(nyi khri): pa ste/ 'di ni ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la nam mkha' ltar chags pa myed pas rnam par grol zhing / gos pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de
i259a8(nyi khri): gnas shing / chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar chags pa myed pas/ rnam par bral bzhing gos pa mang pas thob pa ste/ 'di nam mkha' ltar rtags pa myed pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa myang pa nas bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ rab 'byor
i259b1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u porje brgya
i259b2(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzhan yang bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa zhen pa'i thag pa can po ni 'das ste// ngan nye 'a bra nag bu bzhi ste/ bani gang she na/ lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / tshor badran pa ba
i259b3(nyi khri): pa dang / sems dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / chos dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o// de la lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lus kyi
i259b4(nyi khri): rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gi chags sems dang / yid myi bde' ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang / lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnaMs la rnam par

i259b6(nyi khri): chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par myi rtog ga/ phyi nang gi lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lus kyi rjes su lci zhing / brtson 'grus snyan shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas// 'jigs
i259b7(nyi khri): chags seMs dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par bsal shing / rnam par spyad kyang / lus dang ldan pa rnam par rnyog pa rnams sa rnam par myi rtog ga/ nang gi nor ba dang / sems dang / rnaMs la de myi dmyags pa'i tshul gas
i259b8(nyi khri): kyi rje su lha zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas// 'jig rten gi chags sems dang yang myi bder ba rnam par bsam cig rnam par spyad kyang nas dang ldan pa'i rnam byar rtag pa rnaMs su rna ba
i260a1(nyi khri): rtog go// phyi'i tshor ba dang sems dang / chos la myi dmyigs pa'i myu gis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gi chags sems dang / yid bde ba rnam kyi
i260a2(nyi khri): rnam pa byung lta nga sa rnam par rdzog pa rnamapas rnam pa kyi rigs byin ba dang / sems dang sa lang myi dmyigs pa tshul gis sa kyi sa su lha nga / brtson 'grus canags
i260a3(nyi khri): ngan pa dang ldan pas 'jig tan ga chags sems dang ying myi bang ba rnam po rabs sa cing rnam pa spyod kyang / chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par myi rtagag/ rab 'byar ji ltar na bying chub sems dpa' sa
i260a4(nyi khri): dnga' chen po nang gi nI mA la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / rnam par spyod pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byorang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'gro na 'gro'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes sa/ 'greng na 'greng ngo zhes bya bar rab tum
i260a5(nyi khri): so// 'dug na 'dug go zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// nyal na nyal lo// zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ de'i lus nyams bde' ba'am myi bde' ba yang rung / lus ji lta ji ltar gnas pa de lta de ltar rab tu shes so// rab 'byor rje
i260a6(nyi khri): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gi chags so so dang
i260a7(nyi khri): yid myi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyad do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod de de 'gro
i260a8(nyi khri): 'dra yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ lha 'am rnam par lta yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ bskum dam bdu yang shes pa nim du spyod pA yin na lhung bzed 'tshong zhing spyod kyang shas bzhin du spyod pa yin/ zlas dang bya rnas
i260b1(nyi khri): dang 'thungs pa dang / mya pa la yang / sa bzhin du sbyang ba yin/ 1la bu dang ma da kyis mya myo gsal ba s+ya shes bzhin du srung pa yin/ 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / gnyid kyim ma

i266b2(nyi khri): rten thos kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga rga shi de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa skyes myi rtag cing myi brtan sa ther zug ma yon 'gyur ba'i chos can te dngos po skye
i266b3(nyi khri): bas na de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lA ma yin du bcasu pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnon te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te pha rol tu phyind pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos

i267a1(nyi khri): po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam pan sog brgyad pa dngos pa yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos pa myed pa ma yin no// theg pa chen pa 'das

i267b1(nyi khri): dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dngos po yod pa zhig yon ta dngos pa myed pa ma phanan niH/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lci dang mo dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar mya

i270b8(nyi khri): dag mug dang bral pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de ngo bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang 'dud chags dang snyan pa yang ma yin/ 'dod chags dang bral ba yang ma yin/ ne sdang dang ldan pa yang sa yin/ gti mug pa
i271a1(nyi khri): bral ba sang nas nga phyir chug sa ngon po rinam pa rangs ma nas phy-i/ rab 'byon 'dis so dper na/ nam mkha' ni sems dang po bskyed pa nod / gnyis pa myed do// su
i271a2(nyi khri): myed do ba'i pa byeng // sa ba phred do/ drug pa myong do/ 'dun pa mdza ga brgyad pa byed do// dag pa myed da/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa myed do/ rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa tshon po de las sems dang sa nga

i271a5(nyi khri): chags dang bral ba'i sa myed do// byam pa rtogs pa'i sa byed do// rab 'byor nga de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la yang dkar po rnam par mthong ba lis myong ngo // rigs kyis myed do// brgyad pa'i sa myong dza/ mthong ba'i rtsa

i271a8(nyi khri): 'bras bu ma med do// dgra bcom pa'i byar du myed do// de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// 'di sa gas dper na/ nam mkha' la ri nyan thos kyi sa myed do// ngas s+ya trAso+o kyis
i271b1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i sa myed do// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa myed do// de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha'i dong mnyam+b+ha zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i ni gzug/ sgo dang
i271b2(nyi khri): ldan pa yin pa/ gzugs myed pa ma yin/ bstan du yod pa ma yin/ bstan du myed pa ma yin/ thogs pa yod ma yin te thogs pa myed pa ma yin/ ldan pa ma yin myi ldan pa ma yin no// rab 'byor nga de bzhin
i271b3(nyi khri): du theg pa chen po de yang gzugs dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs myed pa yang ma yin no// bstanang du yod pa ma yin/ bstan du myed pa ma yin/ thogs pa yod pa ma yin/ thogs pa myed pa ma yin/ ldan pa
i271b4(nyi khri): ma yin myi ldan pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa chen de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni rtog pa ma yin/ myi rtag pa ma yin bde ba ma yin/ sdug bsngal
i271b5(nyi khri): ba ma yin/ bdag yod pa ma yin/ bdag myed pa ma yin/ sdug pa ma yin/ myi sdug pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang brtag pa ma yin/ myi rtag pa ma yin/ bde ba yin sdug
i271b6(nyi khri): bsngal ba ma yin/ bdag yod pa ma yin/ bdag myed pa ma yin/ sdug pa ma yin/ myi sdug pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na
i271b7(nyi khri): nam mkha' ni stong pa nyid ma yin/ myi stong pa ma yin pa/ mtshan ma yod pa ma yin/ mtshan ma myed pa ma yin/ smond pa yod pa ma yin/ smond pa myed pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa chen po de
i271b8(nyi khri): yang stong pa nyid ma yin/ myi stong pa ma yin/ mtshan ma yod pa ma yin/ mtshan ma myed pa ma yinasmond pa yod pa ma yin/ smond pa myed pa ma yin// de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang ma
i272a1(nyi khri): bzhes bya'o/ rab 'byo nga sa sto bar de/ chom mkha' don buM dang / man po ma yon// 'dzin pa sa yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa chen po de ya rnaM ma ma yid/ dben pa pa yin khyod na
i272a2(nyi khri): mam yin/ de'i phyi'i theg pa rjen pa de rnam mamam mal ba zhes bya zhi// rab 'byor 'dis sa po ni/ rim pa 'di snang ba ma sor dran pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po ro yang / 
i272a3(nyi khri): ba ma yin mun pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga 'di sa ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni dmyigs su yod pa ma yin/ dmyigs su myed pa yang ma yin te/ rab 'byo
i272a4(nyi khri): de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang dmyigs su yod pa yang ma yid/ dbugs pa byed pa yang ma yon/ de'i byor theg pa don ram mkha' mnam nas bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste dper na/ nam mkhan po / 
i272a5(nyi khri): du yod pa yang ma yin/ brjod du myed pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du thog pa chen po de yang brjod du yod pa ma yin pa/ de ni ma mkhri'i dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ rab 'byor de bzhin du rnam grangs nges
i272a6(nyi khri): kyang theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyas pa ste/ 'di ltar ste dper na theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor nga gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ dzis nam mkha' sems can nang myeng gangs sri pa'i go 'byung
i272a7(nyi khri): pa de bzhin du/ theg pa de yang sems can chad myed grangs myed pa'i go 'byed do// zhes smras pa de ni de bzhin no// rab 'byorang ba de bzhin te/ ji skar nam mkha' sems can chad myed grangs myed pa'i go 'dod pa
i272a8(nyi khri): bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang sems can chad pa myed gangs srung ba'i go 'byed pa'o// de ni'i phy-ir ban/ bya 'bir nga sems can myed pa'i phyir nam mkha' skyeng bur bya'o// nam kha' yang bya phyin skyes shin
i272b1(nyi khri): theg pa chen po gang yin pa de dag tham po med kyang / dmyigs su mung pa'i phyir ron rab 'byer nga sems can tshad myeng pa'i phyir nam mkhan mang byur rig par bya'o// nam mkha' char myed para'i phyir/ theg pa chen po mang

i272b7(nyi khri): sa can tshan med pa'i phyir nam kha tshad med rig par

i277b7(nyi khri): ro rnam par zos pa mya gtsang ba/ rnam par rnags pa/ rnam par spangs pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can 'di lta bur
i277b8(nyi khri): chos nyid las ma 'das so shes bya bar nye bar rtog go// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe rkyen pa shes gro kyo ra mong du dra na pa la spyod pa'im/ phyi'i lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi
i278a1(nyi khri): lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gi chags sems dang / yid myi bde' ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyad do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
i278a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shas kyi pha ral tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa keng rus shar ri dang / khrag ra ri chags pa/ rgyus pa dang brengad du 'brel ba mthong ba ri tshe/ de'i lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang
i278a3(nyi khri): sbyor te/ lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin to// 'di lta bur chos nyid las ma 'das pa'i zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha ralang du
i278a4(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la da myi dmyigs pa'i rdul gis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ljang la dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gi chags sems dang yind sems rnam par bsal cing rnam par
i278a5(nyi khri): spyod do// rab 'byor de gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi nus pa kyang rus sha dang khrag myed pa rgyus pa'i gzungs myed pa/ dung gi mdog ltar
i278a6(nyi khri): gyur pa mthong ba ste/ lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyor te/ lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i chos can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go// rab 'byor de ltar
i278a7(nyi khri): mthong ba de'i tshe/ de'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa ngan pa
i278a8(nyi khri): dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags dang / yid mi bden pa rnam par spyod do// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus
i278b1(nyi khri): sa kyis pa rnam / na sa r+b+ba hA/ ts+tsha s+yA r+dz+dza / 
i278b2(nyi khri): snyen 'dims ma las pa nas rgya sa sa dang na byang chubasams sa 'dasasas rkyen sa ngaphyi dus pa bu
i278b3(nyi khri): tshul gos lus kyi rjes su lta da / batshan 'grus canags na dung ldan bdun pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten ga chags sems dang / yid kyis pa la po rnam pa khrims cing rnam para'i byung / 
i278b4(nyi khri): bzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa/ shes rab kyi pha 'i lang tu phyin pa la spyod par tshe/ nam dur chung kyi rus pas la phyogs dang phyogs 'arnams su rnam par 'thar ba/ rkang pa'i rus pa
i278b5(nyi khri): rnams kyang gan du yom/ byen pa'i rnas pa rnams kyang gzhan du yor/ brda dus pa rnams byung gzhan du sa pa/ dpyi'i rus pa rnams stong gzhan du tha~Mr/ tshogs pa nus pa rnams kyang gzhan du
i278b6(nyi khri): ba ma nus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'bar/ dzi pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ mgo'o nus pa rnams kyang gzhan du ba sha mngon/ de lus 'di tshad kyi rnal yang de da bar sbyar te/ lus 'ad sa
i278b7(nyi khri): 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can to// chos nyid 'di lta bu las ma 'das pa'i zhes bya bar nye bar rtog sapa/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po// shes rab kyi pa yang tu phyin
i278b8(nyi khri): la spyad pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lus kyi rjes su lce zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gi chags sems dang / yid myi 'der ba rnam tu
i279a1(nyi khri): ci rnam par spyad do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po sa rab kyi pa lung du na pa la spyod pa'i na/ nam du zang gyi rus pa la du ma len pa 'ang
i279a2(nyi khri): mas bdungs pa dung gi mdog lhor gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe de'i lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das
i279a3(nyi khri): zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lus kyi rje su
i279a4(nyi khri): lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan po dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gi chags sems dang / yid mi bder ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub ses dpa'/ 
i279a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa lo du ma lon pa/ rab ring snang ba sngon por gyur pa/ thi ba'i mdog ltar gyur pa/ zegs pa brul pa/ sa'i rdul da
i279a6(nyi khri): 'dren 'dren du gyur pa mthong ba'i tshe/ de'i lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyor te/ lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i chos can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o// zhes bya bar nye bcus
i279a7(nyi khri): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang gi lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / phyi'i lu dang phyi nang gi lus la de myi dmig
i279a8(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi rlags sems dang / yid myi bde' ba rnam par bsald cing rnam par spyod do// nang gi tshor ba dang / phyi tsher ba
i279b1(nyi khri): dang po'i nang gnon ba deng de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / nang gi sems dang phyi'i sems dang / phyi nang gi sems la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis sas kyi rje su lha/ nang gi chos dang phyi'i nas ngas
i279b2(nyi khri): phyi nang gi chos la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos kyi rjes su lnga zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags seMs dang / yid myi bde' ba rnam par bsal cing rna bar spyod do// 
i279b3(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhen
i279b4(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sdig te myi dge ba'i chos mi skyes pa rnams myi skyed pa'i phyir/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mos pa skyed cing
i279b5(nyi khri): rtsol lo// brtson 'grus tsam mo// seMs kyi mthu skyed do// yang dag par smon lam 'debs so// sdig te myi dge ba'i chos skye ba rnams spang ba'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mos pa skyed cing rtsol lo// rtsen
i279b6(nyi khri): 'grus rtson rtsom mo/ sems kyi mthu skye do/ yang dag par sman lam 'debs so// dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mos pa skyed cing rtsol lo// brtson 'grus tsam
i279b7(nyi khri): sems kyi mthu skyed de/ yang dag par smon lam 'debs so// dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas bye dang / phyir skem pa dang / nyams par myi 'gyur ba dpe / yong su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i
i279b8(nyi khri): gis mos pa skyed cing rtsol lo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems kyi mthu skyed do// yang dag par smon lam 'debs so// rab 'byorang 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor/ 
i280a1(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi ste bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor de lnga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
i280a2(nyi khri): ralang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam pa
i280a3(nyi khri): bas yongs su grub pa sgom mo/ brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spro
i280a4(nyi khri): bas yongs su grub pa sgom mo/ sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdza 'phrul gi rkang pa/ dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rna bar spong
i280a5(nyi khri): bas yongs su grub pa sgom mo// dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa/ dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rna bar spong bas
i280a6(nyi khri): yongasu grub pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i rgyal gos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa rten par// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems sngams chen po'i theg pa rnon po ni 'di
i280a7(nyi khri): dbang po lta ste/ lnga gang zhen dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste// rang 'byor 'di yang da myi dmyigs pa'i
i280a8(nyi khri): tshul gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chug sems dpa' sems dpa chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar spobs lnga s+ho/ lnga gang zhan dang pa'i
i280b1(nyi khri): stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang / rab 'byor de 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ byang chub seMs dpa' ses dpa' chen po/ 
i280b2(nyi khri): theg pa chen po'i/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa
i280b3(nyi khri): 'dod chags dang bral ba/ 'gag pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yangasu grub pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis skam mo// chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang
i280b4(nyi khri): dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag
i280b5(nyi khri): byang chub kyi yan lag lnga gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gos sgom ste/ rab 'byor du 'di yang byang chub
i280b6(nyi khri): sems dang sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'i// rang 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpang sems dpa' chen po rtsig pa rten po ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ba ste/ de mang gang zhen yang dag pa/ 
i280b7(nyi khri): lta ba dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ dgog pa la gnas pa/ rna bar spong bas yongs su grub pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis sgom// yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i
i280b8(nyi khri): kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'dro ba dang / yang dag pa'i tshol ba dang / yang dag de'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas ga rnam par spong ba yongasu grub pa/ 
i281a1(nyi khri): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis sgo ste/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg po ni/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gsu
i281a2(nyi khri): ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid du rtog pa'i tshe/ 
i281a3(nyi khri): sems gnas pa stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/ 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin glang zhe na/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa rtog pa'i tshe/ seMs gnas pa mtshan ma myed pa rnam par
i281a4(nyi khri): tha rad pa'i sgo ste 'di ni mtshan ma myed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la smon pa myed pa'i nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba myed do// zhes mngon par 'du myi byed pa'i tshe/ seMs gnas pa smon pa myed pa rno bar
i281a5(nyi khri): tha rad pa'i sgo ste/ 'di ni smon pa myed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo de dag la zhum pa myed par dran par bya ste rab 'byor 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen
i281a6(nyi khri): po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ shes pa bcu gcig ste/ bcu gcig gang zhe na/ sdug sngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog
i281a7(nyi khri): shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / myi skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rje su rtogs par shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang 'dris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa dang / de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang
i281a8(nyi khri): zhe na/ sdug bsngal myi skye bar shes pa'o// de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na/ kun 'byung ba spang ba shes pa'o// de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'gog par shes pa'o// de la lam shes pa gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i le
i281b1(nyi khri): yan lag brgyad pa'o// de la zad pa shes pa gang zhe na// 'dod chags dang / zhwa sdang dang / gti mug zad pa shes pa'i// de la myi skye ba shis pa gang zhe na/ srid pa'i rlung skye ba myed par shes so// de la chos shos paM gtan na/ thu
i281b2(nyi khri): sgyu mar yongasu rtogs shing shes so// de la rjes su rtogs pa shes pa gang zhe na/ skye mched dang / khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa'o// de la kun rdzob shes pa gang na na/ sems can gzhan dang / gang
i281b3(nyi khri): thig gzhan gi sems sems kyis shes so// de la 'das pa shes pa gang shin// gang gis lam shes pa dang / yongs byang ba shes pa'i/ de la sgra ji bzhin shes pa gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams ca
i281b4(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes te rab 'byor 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di ltar
i281b5(nyi khri): po gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ yongs su ma shes yongs su shes par bya'o// zhes bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang ba'o// dril yongasu shes pa
i281b6(nyi khri): bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po gang zhe na/ slob pa'i dbang po mngon par rtogs par mi gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gi dbang po dang / shes
i281b7(nyi khri): kyi dbang po yongs su snang bar ma gyu rang pa 'di ni/ yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po'o// de la yongs su shes pa'i dbang po dang / gang zag slob pa yongs su shes par ma gyur pa rnams kyi
i281b8(nyi khri): dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi pha dbang po dang hU~M/ 'di ni yongs su shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o// de la yos
i282a1(nyi khri): sugs pas rtogs pa dbang po gzhe na/ rang zag myi slob pa dag pa tsomi bri / 'ang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnaMs kyi dang pa'i dbang po dang / 
i282a2(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gi dbang ba dang // sa rab kyi dbang po ste/ rag yor 'din yongs su shes pas chags pa'i dbang ba zhes byas/ rab 'byur 'di sa
i282a3(nyi khri): dmyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po'i theg pa chen par/ rab 'ar gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rten pa'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar ting 'dzin gsum
i282a4(nyi khri): steng gsum gang na na/ rtog pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa myed pa la spyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa myed cing dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rtog pa dang cas pa'i ting nge 'dzin
i282a5(nyi khri): gang na na/ rab 'byang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa can pa 'dang dus dper/ sdug ta myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa la
i282a6(nyi khri): skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bder ba can bsam gtan rang po dang / nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di na/ reg pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa/ de la chog pa myed pa dpyod pa cam gting nge 'dzin gas
i282a7(nyi khri): non/ bsam gtan dang ba dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar ste/ 'dzin rtog pa myed la spyod gtsam gting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la rtog pa myed cing dpyod pa myang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam gtan
i282a8(nyi khri): gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dag ba'i pa dang / nam mkha'amathar yas su ma dzad da/ rnam shes mthar mas skye mched dang / 'dugs myang 'du byed byer skye mamad dang / 'dugs dang nor ba 'grog rgyu'i rnams
i282b1(nyi khri): 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni myi chog myi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di yid de myi dmyigs pa rdul gas ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rang khyong ldanan rdzoms
i282b2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar dran pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhen 'di lci ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su ngan pa dang / chos rje su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rje su dran pa dang / mu
i282b3(nyi khri): khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyub rjes su ngan pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'tsho ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyo rna ba rje su dran
i282b4(nyi khri): ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshang myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i skyes par 'jug pa
i282b5(nyi khri): bzhi dang / rna bar thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de la bsam gtan buni gang zhe ma/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' rten pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa
i282b6(nyi khri): spyad pa'i tshe/ 'dod pas dben sdig to myi dge' ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde' ba can pas gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas
i282b7(nyi khri): de la rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par spyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yong su dang ste/ seMs kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtag pa myed pa/ dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde can pas gtan gnyis pa
i282b8(nyi khri): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas// de dga' bas 'dod chag dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang skyes su gnas te/ bda' ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde' ba la rnam par spyod pa bang
i283a1(nyi khri): snyoms pa'o// zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam brtan gsum pa nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de la bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid myi bde
i283a2(nyi khri): bsnga nas kyang nub pas// bang ba yang myed sdug bsngal ba yang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nye bar sgrubs shing gnas te/ de dag ni bsam gtan
i283a3(nyi khri): bzhi'o// de la tshad myed pa bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya cheni po shin tu yangs pa/ myi dmyigs/ 
i283a4(nyi khri): pa tshad myed pa gcugs pa myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa lhod pa myed pa yongasu rdzogs pa/ shin tu sgoms pas 'jig rten gi chos kyi dbyings kyis blas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas rdugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ 
i283a5(nyi khri): mos par byas shing myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam par spyad do// snying rje dang ldan dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa gzugs myed pa/ 
i283a6(nyi khri): gnod pa myed pa lhod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas rdugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
i283a7(nyi khri): gis rnam par dpyod do// de dag ni tshed pa bzhi'o// de la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byorarang 'di la byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
i283a8(nyi khri): thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cig/ sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te nam mkha'o mtha' yas skye
i283b1(nyi khri): mad la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'dis te/ rnam shes mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar sbubs te gnas so// rnam
i283b2(nyi khri): thams cad ngu rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod de zhes cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam thas cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las/ yang dag par 'dra
i283b3(nyi khri): te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de dag ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'o// de la rnam par tha rad pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gis gzugs rnams mthong ba/ 
i283b4(nyi khri): 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang pa'o// nang gzugs myed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ phyi rol gi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// bzang po mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// de rnam pa shes cad
i283b5(nyi khri): du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas// nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar
i283b6(nyi khri): sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thas cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam shes mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par thas/ 
i283b7(nyi khri): cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'dra
i283b8(nyi khri): te 'du shes myed 'du shes srid myin skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa'i bar la de
i284a1(nyi khri): myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de dag ni rnam par tha rad pa brgyad do// de la mthar da gas gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa'
i284a2(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pas dben sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam rten
i284a3(nyi khri): dang po nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam por rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongasu dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyurd pas rtog pa myed pa dpyod pa myod pa'i ting nge 'dzind las skyes pa'i dga' ba
i284a4(nyi khri): dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin tu btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnas
i284a5(nyi khri): kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing
i284a6(nyi khri): yid byud ba dang yid myi bde ba snga nas nub pas/ bude yang myed sdug bsngal ba myed pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa/ brasam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs
i284a7(nyi khri): kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur da cing ni sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar sgrub
i284a8(nyi khri): tra gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mchod las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yos so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mche de la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa
i284b1(nyi khri): thams cang du rnam shes mtha' yis skye mchid las yang dge par 'das te/ cung zod ma yod de zhes cung zad myed pa'i skye mchod la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mchod las yang/ 
i284b2(nyi khri): dag par 'das te/ 'du shes tshor ba 'gog pa myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam po thams cad du 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched las yang dag par 'das te// 'du shes dang
i284b3(nyi khri): tshor ba 'gog pa'i bar la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nye bar sgrubs shing gnas te/ de dag ni mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di
i284b4(nyi khri): ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gnas la yang gnas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
i284b5(nyi khri): rab shes so// gnas ma yin pa yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dag nga ltar byung ba'i las dang las yongs su len pa'i rjes par sbyin pa gnas kyi rnam
i284b6(nyi khri): dang / rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du shes so// 'jig rten gyi khams ni sna tshogs can te/ 'jig rten gi khams ni du ma'o zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sems can bzhan dang gang
i284b7(nyi khri): zag bzhan gi mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dbang po dang / stobs dang / sems can bzhan dang gang zag bzhan gi dbang rab dang tha ma shes par bya ba yang yang dag pa
i284b8(nyi khri): bzhin du rab tu shes so// kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dbang po dang / stobs dang na byang chub kyi yan lag dang bsam gtan dang / rnam par thard pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par
i285a1(nyi khri): 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mar sngon gi gnas rjes su dran no// tshe rangs gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/ rnam pa/ 
i285a2(nyi khri): dang bcas/ sa me la dang bcas gtan tshigs dang bcas pa'i bar du rnam pa du mar sngon gi gnas rjes su dran no// lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba yang dag pa ji/ 
i285a3(nyi khri): lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zag pa zad pa'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba gang zag pa myed pa'i rang mngon par shes pas mngon byar byas te/ nye bar bsgrubs shing rna bar
i285a4(nyi khri): spyod do// bdag gi skye ba ni zad do// bdag ni tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad do// bya ba ni byas so// rnam pa 'di lta bu gzhan ni myed do zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ rab 'byor de de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis byang
i285a5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar myi 'jigs pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na bdag gis
i285a6(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na de la chos 'di rnams mngon par sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am bzhan
i285a7(nyi khri): su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag gi bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba
i285a8(nyi khri): myed pa thob pa dang / myi 'jigs pa thob pa rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnasu dam bca'o// 'khor gi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrog go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten dge sbyong ngam bram ze
i285b1(nyi khri): 'amaHlha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan pa skor bar myi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yong
i285b2(nyi khri): su zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am/ bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag
i285b3(nyi khri): par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag byed ba thob pa dang / phyag chab myed pa thob pa dang / myi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas
i285b4(nyi khri): dam bca'o// 'khor gri nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrog go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am gzhan sus kyong rung ste/ chos dang ldan par skor bar myi/ 
i285b5(nyi khri): nus pa/ bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstand pa de dag bstan na/ bar chad kyi chos su myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas myed de/ de'i phyir bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ 
i285b6(nyi khri): bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rje su mthong na
i285b7(nyi khri): bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba myed pa thob pa dang / myi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khru mchog rlabs po'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrog go// tshangs pa
i285b8(nyi khri): 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha'i bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar myi nus pu bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag
i286a1(nyi khri): sAg gags lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba ma rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan byas na/ sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par
i286a2(nyi khri): 'gyur bar myi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba de lta bu'i gnas myed de/ de'i phyir bdag la dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan
i286a3(nyi khri): rgol bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas// de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag cha ba myed pa thob pa dang / myi 'jigs pa zung
i286a4(nyi khri): par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gi nang du seng ge'i skra sgrog go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na/ dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ 
i286a5(nyi khri): tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par skor bar myi gnus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ rab 'byor de de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis byang chub seMs dpa' sems
i286a6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i thog pa chen po'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i thag pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na don so so yang dag par rig
i286a7(nyi khri): ba dang / chos soso yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshogs sa yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa sos yang dag par rig pa ste/ rab 'byer 'di yang de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis / byang chub seMs dnga' dzas
i286a8(nyi khri): depa chen de'i sdig pa chen po'o// dang 'khyod pa nan yang byang chub skams dpa'i sems dpa' chen ldan 'dri ltar sangs rgyas kyi ngas pa 'dres pa co brgyad de/ coM brgyad gang zhen// gang gi rnam la zhi sa
i286b1(nyi khri): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / ngag gi nam l-I lha dang darnas pa'i 'jig rten bdud dang bcas pa dang chings pa dang / dge sbyong ngam bram ze re ces pa'i skye rgyu/ 
i286b2(nyi khri): dang / lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba'i lam gi rjes su bstan to// phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang/ 
i286b3(nyi khri): bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la khrul pa myi mnga'i// dgongs pa nyams pa myi mngango // 'du gas sna tshogs myi mnga'o// thugs mnyam par ma gzhag pa myi mnga'o// ma rtags pa btang snyoms myi mnga'o// mos
i286b4(nyi khri): pa yong su nyams pa myi mnga'o// brtson 'grus yong su nyams pa myi mnga'o// dgongs pa yongasu nyes pa myi mnga'o// ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'o// shes rab yongs su nyes pa myi mnga'o// rnam par gro/ 
i286b5(nyi khri): ba yongs su rnams po mi ma mo// rnam par grol ba'i migs gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa kyi ma 'o// sku'i 'phrin pas thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro ba ste legs kyi srin du rdzas su 'byung ngo // 
i286b6(nyi khri): gsung gi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // thugs kyi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // 'das pa'i dus la
i286b7(nyi khri): mthugs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug gi// ma rmongs pa'i dus nam thigs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa la 'jug go// da ltar byung ba'i dus nam thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gcigs
i286b8(nyi khri): po 'jug ste/ rab 'byor nga 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen por// rab 'byor nga bzhan yang byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po ba the
i287a1(nyi khri): pa chen po ni 'dri ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams te/ de yang yi ge mnyam pa nyid dang / brjod pa mnyam pa nyid dang / yi ge'i sgo dang yi ge la 'jug pa stani dwe lu yi ge'i sgo la 'jug pa gang zhe na/ a zhes bya ba'i sa skyes pa'i/ 
i287a2(nyi khri): phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor// ra shes bya ba ni rdul dang dral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// ba zhes bya ba ni don dam po stong pa nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// na zhes bya ba ni 'chi 'pho dang skye ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ 
i287a3(nyi khri): chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// na zhes bya ba ni mying dang bral ba'i phyir mying gi rang bzhin ma thob ma stor bas chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// la zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das shing sred pa'i khri shing dang / rgyu dang rkyen yang dag par bcom pa
i287a4(nyi khri): phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// nga zhes bya ba ni dul ba dang dul ba'i gnas su yongs su nges pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// baM zhes bya ba ni bcings pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// Da zhes bya ba ni bkrug
i287a5(nyi khri): ma dang brab nga'i phyir chos thams cadas ste/ sa nas bya ban chags pa myi dmyigs pas chags par myi 'thud pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi smo// ga zhes bya ba ni dag gi lam dang sgra yang dag pa rang pa'i phyir chos thos ca / 
i287a6(nyi khri): sgo'o// ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// ya zhes bya ba na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// swA zhes bya ba ni khengs pa dmyig
i287a7(nyi khri): myed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// ka zhes bya ba ni byed pa po myi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// sa zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// ma zhes bya ba ni bdag gi
i287a8(nyi khri): bya ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi ske'o// ga zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// k+Sha zhes bya ba ni gnas dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// dza bris bya ba ni/ 
i287b1(nyi khri): skye ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi ste'o// shwa zhes bya ba ni dbugs dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// d+ha zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ches thams cad kyi stes/
